Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The warrior makes three attacks, using Greatsword or Longbow in any combination.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: m 9, reach 5 ft. on hit: 19 (4d6 + 5) Slashing damage. The warrior also creates one of the following effects:

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: r 9, range 150/600 ft. on hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) Piercing damage, and the target's Speed|XPHB decreases by 10 feet until the end of the target's next turn.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The warrior has Advantage|XPHB on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warrior's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated|XPHB condition.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: m,r 3, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) Piercing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The warrior makes two Greatsword or Heavy Crossbow attacks.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Slashing damage.

HeavyCrossbow.name: HeavyCrossbow
HeavyCrossbow.description: r 3, range 100/400 ft. on hit: 12 (2d10 + 1) Piercing damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The yuan-ti has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The yuan-ti makes two Scimitar attacks.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: m 3, reach 5 ft. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) Slashing damage.

PoisonRay.name: PoisonRay
PoisonRay.description: r 4, range 120 ft. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) Poison damage.

BenignTransportation(RechargesafterMaliv.name: Benign Transportation (Recharges after Malivar Casts a Conjuration Spell of 1st Level or Higher)
BenignTransportation(RechargesafterMaliv.description: As a bonus action, Malivar teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that he can see.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage

InvisibleinWater.name: Invisible in Water
InvisibleinWater.description: The big water slurpent is invisible while fully immersed in water.

WaterBound.name: Water Bound
WaterBound.description: The big water slurpent dies if it leaves the water to which it is bound or if that water is destroyed.

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description: mw 5 to hit, one target. on hit: 13 (3d6+3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 13) and pulled 5 feet toward the big water slurpent. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, the big water slurpent tries to drown it, and the big water slurpent can't constrict another target.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: Birdsquirrel has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the Birdsquirrel's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Birdsquirrel makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4+2) slashing damage.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The Boontu monkey has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the boontu monkey's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 1 (1d4 - 1) piercing damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The merfolk can breathe air and water.

SirenSong.name: Siren Song
SirenSong.description: Lovely singing voices charm every humanoid or giant within 300 feet. The targets must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed until the song ends.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 2 to hit, one target. on hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage.

NimbleEscape.name: Nimble Escape
NimbleEscape.description: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

Catchmeifyoucan!.name: Catchmeifyoucan!
Catchmeifyoucan!.description: Dum-Dum Goblins will opt to run and hide before fighting! A DC 15 Dexterity check must be made before they can be attacked.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: mw 4 to hit, one target. on hit: 3 (1d6 +2) slashing damage.

Shortbow.name: Shortbow
Shortbow.description: rw 4 to hit, one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

DwarvenResilience.name: Dwarven Resilience
DwarvenResilience.description: They have advantage on saving throws against poison, and they have resistance to poison damage.

Shortbow.name: Shortbow
Shortbow.description: mw 3 to hit, one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The worm makes two attacks:

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 14 to hit, one target. on hit: 22 (3d8) piercing damage. Target must make a DC 19 Dexterity save, or be swallowed by the worm!

TailStinger.name: TailStinger
TailStinger.description: mw 14 to hit, one creature. on hit: 19 (3d6 + 9) piercing damage Target must make a DC 19 Constitution save, or take 42 (12d6) poison damage.

LimitedTelepathy.name: Limited Telepathy
LimitedTelepathy.description: The otyugh can magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within 120 feet of it that can understand a language. This form of telepathy doesn't allow the receiving creature to telepathically respond.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The otyugh makes three attacks:

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage. Target must make a DC 15 Constitution save, or take 6 (1d10) poison damage until cured.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage. Target must make a DC 19 Constitution save, or take 42 (12d6) poison damage.

Slam!.name: Slam!
Slam!.description: Target must make a DC 14 Constitution save, or be grappled.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes two greatclub attacks.

Greatclub.name: Greatclub
Greatclub.description: mw 8 to hit, one target. on hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 8 to hit, one target. on hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The couatl's weapon attacks are magical.

ShieldedMind.name: Shielded Mind
ShieldedMind.description: The couatl is immune to scrying and to any effect that would sense its emotions, read its thoughts, or detect its location.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage. Target must make a DC 13 Constitution save, or fall unconscious. Another creature can use an action to shake the target awake.

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. Target is grappled (escape DC 15). The couatl can constrain only one target at a time.

ChangeShape.name: ChangeShape
ChangeShape.description: The couatl magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than its own|bestiary|Challenge Rating=[&0;&4]|type=beast;humanoid, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the couatl's choice).

AuraofHate.name: Aura of Hate
AuraofHate.description: While Arkhan isn't incapacitated, he and all fiends and undead within 30 feet of him deal 4 extra damage whenever they hit with a melee weapon attack (already factored into Arkhan's attacks). This extra damage is of the same type as the weapon's damage type.

HandofVecna.name: Hand of Vecna
HandofVecna.description: The Hand of Vecna has 8 charges and regains 1d4 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. Arkhan can cast the following spells from the hand by expending the specified number of charges (spell save DC 18): finger of death (5 charges), sleep (1 charge), slow (2 charges), and teleport (3 charges).

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Arkhan wields Fane-Eater|BGDIA and wears a suit of Obsidian Flint Dragon Plate|BGDIA. The armor gives Arkhan advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to avoid or end the grappled condition on him.

darkvision.name: darkvision
darkvision.value: 60 ft. (can see invisible creatures out to the same range)

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Arkhan makes three weapon attacks.

Fane-Eater(Battleaxe).name: Fane-Eater(Battleaxe)
Fane-Eater(Battleaxe).description: mw 13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (1d8 + 12) slashing damage, or 17 (1d10 + 12) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 9 (2d8) cold damage. If the target is a creature and Arkhan rolls a 20 on the attack roll, the creature takes an extra 9 (2d8) necrotic damage, and Arkhan regains an amount of hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage, plus 4 piercing damage and 9 (2d8) cold damage if the javelin was used to make a melee attack.

FearAura.name: Fear Aura
FearAura.description: Any creature hostile to Bel that starts its turn within 20 feet of him must make a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw unless Bel is incapacitated. If the save fails, the creature has the frightened condition until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to Bel's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Bel fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Bel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Bel attacks twice with his Greatsword and once with his Tail.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (4d6 + 9) slashing damage plus 21 (6d6) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being held or worn, it catches fire.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 25 (3d10 + 9) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 23 Constitution saving throw or have the stunned condition until the end of its next turn.

AuraofTerror.name: Aura of Terror
AuraofTerror.description: When a hostile creature within 5 feet of the black gauntlet makes an attack roll or a saving throw, it has disadvantage on the roll. Creatures that are immune to the frightened condition are immune to this trait.

TacticalDiscipline.name: Tactical Discipline
TacticalDiscipline.description: The black gauntlet has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The black gauntlet makes two attacks with its mace.

Mace.name: Mace
Mace.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.

GuidingBolt(1st-LevelSpell;RequiresaSpel.name: GuidingBolt(1st-LevelSpell;RequiresaSpellSlot)

value.value: Guiding Bolt (1st-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)

GuidingBolt(1st-LevelSpell;RequiresaSpel.description: rs 7 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 14 (4d6) radiant damage, and the next attack roll made against the target before the end of the black gauntlet's next turn has advantage. If the black gauntlet casts this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.

Adhesive.name: Adhesive
Adhesive.description: The bone whelk can cause Medium or smaller objects to adhere to it. A Medium or smaller creature that touches the bone whelk is grappled by it (escape DC 10).

DeathScream.name: Death Scream
DeathScream.description: When the bone whelk dies, it emits a blood-curdling shriek than can be heard out to a range of 120 feet. This shriek causes nonmagical, organic material within 10 feet of the bone whelk to rot. Each creature within 10 feet of the bone whelk when it dies takes 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The bone whelk can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: Crokek'toeck can breathe air and water.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Crokek'toeck has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SecureMemory.name: Secure Memory
SecureMemory.description: Crokek'toeck is immune to the waters of the River Styx as well as any effect that would steal or modify its memories or detect or read its thoughts.

StandingLeap.name: Standing Leap
StandingLeap.description: Crokek'toeck's long jump is up to 60 feet and its high jump is up to 30 feet, with or without a running start.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 44 (10d6 + 9) piercing damage.

DisgorgeAllies{@recharge}.name: DisgorgeAllies{@recharge}
DisgorgeAllies{@recharge}.description: Crokek'toeck opens its mouth and disgorges 1d4 barlgura||barlguras, 3d6 gnoll||gnolls led by 1 gnoll fang of Yeenoghu, 6d6 dretch||dretches, or 1d3 vrock||vrocks. Each creature it disgorges appears in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of Crokek'toeck's mouth, or the next closest unoccupied space.

AuraofMurder.name: Aura of Murder
AuraofMurder.description: As long as the death's head is not incapacitated, hostile creatures within 5 feet of it gain vulnerability to piercing damage unless they have resistance or immunity to such damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The death's head has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The death's head uses Stunning Gaze and makes two dagger attacks.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

StunningGaze.name: StunningGaze
StunningGaze.description: The death's head targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

DarkDevotion.name: Dark Devotion
DarkDevotion.description: Thalamra has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Thalamra can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, out to a distance of 120 feet.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Thalamra uses eldritch blast twice or makes two unarmed strikes.

EldritchBlast(Cantrip).name: EldritchBlast(Cantrip)
EldritchBlast(Cantrip).description: rs 6 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) force damage.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 bludgeoning damage.

Berserk.name: Berserk
Berserk.description: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 100 hit points or fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points. If the golem's creator is within 60 feet of the berserk golem, the creator can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The golem must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a DC 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check. If the check succeeds, the golem ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 100 hit points or fewer, the golem might go berserk again.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

LightningAbsorption.name: Lightning Absorption
LightningAbsorption.description: Whenever the golem is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine or silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine or silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine or silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The golem makes two slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

TacticalDiscipline.name: Tactical Discipline
TacticalDiscipline.description: The fist of Bane has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.

Mace.name: Mace
Mace.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 2 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Gideon regains 10 hit points at the start of each of his turns. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Gideon is destroyed only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Gideon attacks twice with his fists.

Fist.name: Fist
Fist.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

WitheringGaze.name: WitheringGaze
WitheringGaze.description: Gideon targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The hellwasp's weapon attacks are magical.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hellwasp makes two attacks: one with its sting and one with its sword talons.

Sting.name: Sting
Sting.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the target is also paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

SwordTalons.name: SwordTalons
SwordTalons.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

AuraofInvulnerability.name: Aura of Invulnerability
AuraofInvulnerability.description: An invisible aura forms a 10-foot-radius sphere around the hollyphant for as long as it lives. Any spell of 5th level or lower cast from outside the barrier can't affect creatures or objects within it, even if the spell is cast using a higher level spell slot. Such a spell can target creatures and objects within the barrier, but the spell has no effect on them. Similarly, the area within the barrier is excluded from the areas affected by such spells. The hollyphant can use an action to suppress this trait until its concentration ends (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell).

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The hollyphant's weapon attacks are magical.

Tusks.name: Tusks
Tusks.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage.

Trumpet(3/Day).name: Trumpet(3/Day)
Trumpet(3/Day).description: The hollyphant blows air through its trunk, creating a trumpet sound that can be heard out to a range of 600 feet. The trumpet also creates a 30-foot cone of energy that has one of the following effects, chosen by the hollyphant:

TrumpetofBlasting.name: TrumpetofBlasting
TrumpetofBlasting.description: Each creature in the cone must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 17 (5d6) thunder damage and is deafened for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't deafened. Nonmagical objects in the cone that aren't being held or worn take 35 (10d6) thunder damage.

TrumpetofSparkles.name: TrumpetofSparkles
TrumpetofSparkles.description: Creatures in the cone must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d8 + 4) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Evil creatures have disadvantage on the saving throw. Good creatures in the cone take no damage.

TacticalDiscipline.name: Tactical Discipline
TacticalDiscipline.description: The iron consul has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The iron consul makes one attack with its spear and can use its Voice of Command ability.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage when used with two hands to make a melee attack.

VoiceofCommand.name: VoiceofCommand
VoiceofCommand.description: The iron consul selects up to two allies within 90 feet of it that can hear its commands. Each ally can immediately use its reaction to make one melee attack.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Kostchtchie fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Kostchtchie has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Kostchtchie makes two melee attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 18 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 13 (1d6 + 10) piercing damage.

Matalotok(Warhammer).name: Matalotok(Warhammer)
Matalotok(Warhammer).description: mw 18 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (2d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage, or 21 (2d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands, and the weapon emits a burst of cold that deals 10 (3d6) cold damage to each creature within 30 feet of it.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: Krull can hold his breath for 1 hour.

InescapableDestruction.name: Inescapable Destruction
InescapableDestruction.description: Necrotic damage dealt by Krull's spells ignores resistance to necrotic damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

+1Maul.name: +1Maul
+1Maul.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

ShellDefense.name: ShellDefense
ShellDefense.description: Krull withdraws into his shell. Until he emerges as a bonus action, he has a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in his shell, Krull is prone, his speed is 0 and can't increase, he has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, he can't take reactions, and the only action he can take is to emerge from his shell.

LimitedMagicImmunity.name: Limited Magic Immunity
LimitedMagicImmunity.description: Mahadi can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower unless he wishes to be. He has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

piercingfrommagicweaponswieldedbygoodcre.name: piercing from magic weapons wielded by good creatures

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Mahadi makes four claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage, and the target is cursed if it's a creature. The curse takes effect whenever the target takes a short or long rest, filling the target's thoughts with horrible images and dreams. The cursed target gains no benefit from finishing a short or long rest. The curse lasts until it is lifted by a remove curse spell or similar magic.

SummonErinyes(1/Day).name: SummonErinyes(1/Day)
SummonErinyes(1/Day).description: Mahadi summons Ilzabet, an erinyes bound to him by an infernal contract. The erinyes appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of him, acts as his ally, and can't summon other devils. The erinyes remains for 10 minutes or until Mahadi dismisses it as an action. If the erinyes dies, Mahadi loses this action option.

GraveMagic.name: Grave Magic
GraveMagic.description: When the master of souls cast a spell that deals damage, it can change the spell's damage type to necrotic.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The master of souls attacks twice with its flail.

SilveredSkullFlail.name: SilveredSkullFlail
SilveredSkullFlail.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) necrotic damage, and the target has disadvantage on all saving throws until the end of the master of souls' next turn.

ChillTouch(Cantrip).name: ChillTouch(Cantrip)
ChillTouch(Cantrip).description: rs 6 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 13 (2d8) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the master of souls' next turn. If the target is undead, it has disadvantage on attack rolls against the master of souls for the same duration.

RayofSickness(1st-LevelSpell;RequiresaSp.name: RayofSickness(1st-LevelSpell;RequiresaSpellSlot)

value.value: Ray of Sickness (1st-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)

RayofSickness(1st-LevelSpell;RequiresaSp.description: rs 6 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 9 (2d8) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of the master of souls' next turn. If the master of souls casts this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

ScorchingRay(2nd-LevelSpell;RequiresaSpe.name: ScorchingRay(2nd-LevelSpell;RequiresaSpellSlot)

value.value: Scorching Ray (2nd-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)

ScorchingRay(2nd-LevelSpell;RequiresaSpe.description: rs 6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target per ray (3 rays if a 2nd-level spell slot is used, 4 rays if a 3rd-level spell slot is used). on hit: 7 (2d6) fire damage per ray.

Indomitable(2/Day).name: Indomitable
Indomitable(2/Day).description: Mortlock can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Mortlock makes two attacks with his greatclub.

Greatclub.name: Greatclub
Greatclub.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage, plus 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage if Mortlock has taken any damage since his last turn.

HeavyCrossbow.name: HeavyCrossbow
HeavyCrossbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

SkullFlail.name: SkullFlail
SkullFlail.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage.

ClawsoftheGrave.name: ClawsoftheGrave
ClawsoftheGrave.description: rs 5 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) necrotic damage.

AuraofMurder.name: Aura of Murder
AuraofMurder.description: As long as the night blade is not incapacitated, hostile creatures within 5 feet of it gain vulnerability to piercing damage unless they have resistance or immunity to such damage.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

CunningAction.name: Cunning Action
CunningAction.description: On each of her turns in combat, Nine-Fingers can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

DaggerThrower.name: Dagger Thrower
DaggerThrower.description: Nine-Fingers adds double her proficiency bonus to the damage she deals on ranged attacks made with daggers (already factored into her attacks).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Nine-Fingers attacks three times with her daggers.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage, plus 6 piercing damage if it's a ranged attack.

AuraofMurder.name: Aura of Murder
AuraofMurder.description: As long as the reaper is not incapacitated, hostile creatures within 5 feet of it gain vulnerability to piercing damage unless they have resistance or immunity to such damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The reaper makes two dagger attacks and uses Shroud Self.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

ShroudSelf.name: ShroudSelf
ShroudSelf.description: The reaper magically turns invisible until the start of its next turn. This invisibility ends if the reaper makes an attack roll, makes a damage roll, or casts a spell.

CunningAction.name: Cunning Action
CunningAction.description: On each of her turns in combat, Rilsa can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

Focus.name: Focus
Focus.description: If Rilsa damages a creature with a weapon attack, she gains advantage on attack rolls against that target until the end of her next turn.

TacticalLeadership.name: Tactical Leadership
TacticalLeadership.description: As a bonus action, Rilsa chooses one creature she can see within 30 feet of her. The creature doesn't provoke opportunity attacks until the end of its next turn, provided it can hear Rilsa's commands.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Rilsa makes three weapon attacks.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The skull lasher makes two attacks with its flail.

IronSkullFlail.name: IronSkullFlail
IronSkullFlail.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage, and the target has disadvantage on all saving throws until the end of the skull lasher's next turn.

RayofSickness(1st-LevelSpell;RequiresaSp.name: RayofSickness(1st-LevelSpell;RequiresaSpellSlot)

value.value: Ray of Sickness (1st-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)

RayofSickness(1st-LevelSpell;RequiresaSp.description: rs 5 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 9 (2d8) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of the skull lasher's next turn. If the skull lasher casts this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

FeyStep{@recharge4}.name: Fey Step {@recharge 4}
FeyStep{@recharge4}.description: As a bonus action, Smiler can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that he can see or to the empty seat of his infernal war machine.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Smiler has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Equipment.name: Equipment
Equipment.description: Smiler wears +2 leather armor. He carries seven soul coins in a bag and a +1 shortsword

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Smiler makes two weapon attacks. He can cast a spell in place of one of these attacks.

+1Shortsword.name: +1Shortsword
+1Shortsword.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d6 + 6) piercing damage.

ShadowofGuilt.name: Shadow of Guilt
ShadowofGuilt.description: Thavius's shadow is that of a pudgy, horned devil with small wings.

Mace.name: Mace
Mace.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

DarkDevotion.name: Dark Devotion
DarkDevotion.description: Thurstwell has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

SacredFlame(Cantrip).name: SacredFlame(Cantrip)
SacredFlame(Cantrip).description: Flame-like radiance descends on one creature Thurstwell can see within 60 feet of him. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 4 (1d8) radiant damage, gaining no benefit from cover.

GoringRush.name: Goring Rush
GoringRush.description: Immediately after using the Dash action, Torogar can make one melee attack with his horns.

LabyrinthineRecall.name: Labyrinthine Recall
LabyrinthineRecall.description: Torogar can perfectly recall any path he has traveled.

Rage(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).name: Rage (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
Rage(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).description: As a bonus action, Torogar can enter a rage that lasts for 1 minute. The rage ends early if Torogar is knocked unconscious or if his turn ends and he hasn't attacked a hostile creature or taken damage since his last turn. While raging, Torogar gains the following benefits:

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Torogar wears gauntlets of flaming fury|BGDIA and a belt of fire giant strength. Without the belt, his Strength is 21. He also carries a soul coin|BGDIA.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Torogar makes three attacks: two with his scimitars and one with his horns.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage, or 17 (2d6 + 10) slashing damage while raging, plus 3 (1d6) fire damage from the gauntlets of flaming fury.

Horns.name: Horns
Horns.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) piercing damage, or 19 (2d8 + 10) piercing damage while raging.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Ulder makes three melee attacks, only one of which can be with his shield.

+1Longsword.name: +1Longsword
+1Longsword.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage when used with two hands.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and Ulder pushes the target 5 feet away from him. Ulder then enters the space vacated by the target. If the target is pushed to within 5 feet of a creature friendly to Ulder, the target provokes an opportunity attack from that creature.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If the assassin fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The assassin makes two Poison Blade attacks.

PoisonBlade.name: PoisonBlade
PoisonBlade.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) poison damage.

HungeroftheVoid.name: Hunger of the Void
HungeroftheVoid.description: When the aspirant is reduced to 0 hit points, its body and everything it is wearing or carrying, except for magic items, are sucked into a void and destroyed. Creatures in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on the aspirant must make a DC 11 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage and is pulled 10 feet straight toward the aspirant's space. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

SinisterDevotion.name: Sinister Devotion
SinisterDevotion.description: The aspirant has advantage on saving throws against the charmed and frightened conditions.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

GuardianAura.name: Guardian Aura
GuardianAura.description: Whenever a creature of Asteria's choice within 30 feet of her makes a saving throw, Asteria can give the creature advantage on the saving throw (no action required). This trait doesn't function if Asteria has the incapacitated condition.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Asteria fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Asteria wears Winged Boots, which grant her a flying speed (included in her statistics). She also carries one half of a pair of Sending Stones; the other half of the pair is held by Euryale.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Asteria makes two Radiant Blade attacks and uses Bursting Benediction.

RadiantBlade.name: RadiantBlade
RadiantBlade.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage.

BurstingBenediction.name: BurstingBenediction
BurstingBenediction.description: Asteria causes a burst of magical energy to envelop one creature she can see within 60 feet of herself. The target must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 40 (9d8) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Asteria or another creature that she can see within 60 feet of herself then regains 10 hit points.

HeatRegeneration.name: Heat Regeneration
HeatRegeneration.description: If the temperature around it is 100 degrees Fahrenheit or higher, Aurnozci regains 15 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Aurnozci dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Aurnozci fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Aurnozci has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Aurnozci makes one Bite attack and two Tail attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (2d12 + 8) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) fire damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

MucusSpray{@recharge5}.name: MucusSpray{@recharge5}
MucusSpray{@recharge5}.description: Aurnozci sprays mucus in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that cone must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 42 (12d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Augustus regains 10 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes damage from a silver weapon, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Augustus dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Augustus wields a +2 Longsword.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Augustus makes any combination of two Bite, Claw, or Magic Longsword attacks.

Bite(WolforHybridFormOnly).name: Bite(WolforHybridFormOnly)
Bite(WolforHybridFormOnly).description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 26 (5d8 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a Humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with lycanthropy. While cursed in this way, the target retains its alignment, languages, and equipment but otherwise uses the werewolf stat block, excluding actions that require equipment the target doesn't have. During any night when there's a full moon in the sky, the target becomes an NPC under the DM's control and remains so until the night ends. A Remove Curse spell or similar magic ends this curse.

Claw(WolforHybridFormOnly).name: Claw(WolforHybridFormOnly)
Claw(WolforHybridFormOnly).description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (5d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

MagicLongsword(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).name: MagicLongsword(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly)

value.value: Magic Longsword (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)

MagicLongsword(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) slashing damage.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If Delour is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw and only half damage if he fails, provided he doesn't have the incapacitated condition.

Nimbleness.name: Nimbleness
Nimbleness.description: Delour can move through the space of a Medium or larger creature.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Delour regains 10 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes damage from a silver weapon, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Delour dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Delour makes any combination of three Bite, Shortsword, or Hand Crossbow attacks.

Bite(RatorHybridFormOnly).name: Bite(RatorHybridFormOnly)
Bite(RatorHybridFormOnly).description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 26 (5d8 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a Humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with lycanthropy. While cursed in this way, the target retains its alignment, languages, and equipment but otherwise uses the wererat stat block, excluding actions that require equipment the target doesn't have. During any night when there's a full moon in the sky, the target becomes an NPC under the DM's control and remains so until the night ends. A Remove Curse spell or similar magic ends this curse.

Shortsword(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).name: Shortsword(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly)
Shortsword(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

HandCrossbow(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).name: HandCrossbow(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly)

value.value: Hand Crossbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)

HandCrossbow(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).description: rw 8 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The breath drinker can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

RadiantAbsorption.name: Radiant Absorption
RadiantAbsorption.description: When the breath drinker is subjected to radiant damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the radiant damage dealt.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The breath drinker makes two Enervating Claw attacks. It can also use Drink Breath.

EnervatingClaw.name: EnervatingClaw
EnervatingClaw.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) necrotic damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 18). The target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

DrinkBreath.name: DrinkBreath
DrinkBreath.description: The breath drinker targets a creature that has the incapacitated condition or that the breath drinker is grappling and that isn't a Construct or an Undead. The target must make a DC 18 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 36 (8d8) necrotic damage, and its Charisma score is reduced by 1d6. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. If this reduces the target's Charisma to 0, the target dies. Until the breath drinker dies, the dead target can't be returned to life by any means short of divine intervention. On a successful save, the target takes half as much necrotic damage only. On a successful or failed save, the breath drinker regains a number of hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: The breath drinker has the invisible condition. This invisibility ends immediately after the breath drinker hits or misses with an attack roll or uses Drink Breath.

DemonicRitual.name: Demonic Ritual
DemonicRitual.description: Brusipha can spend 3 hours performing a ritual that summons 1d3 + 1 barlguras or 1 hezrou. She must sacrifice a Medium or larger living creature to Baphomet during this ritual, and the ritual can be performed only at night. The demons vanish at dawn.

LabyrinthineRecall.name: Labyrinthine Recall
LabyrinthineRecall.description: Brusipha can perfectly recall any path she has traveled.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Brusipha makes two Eldritch Blast attacks.

EldritchBlast.name: EldritchBlast
EldritchBlast.description: rs 5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) force damage.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) necrotic damage. If Brusipha moved at least 10 feet straight toward the target immediately before she hit, the target takes an extra 4 (1d8) piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet from Brusipha and have the prone condition.

IncitetheHunters(RechargesafteraShortorL.name: IncitetheHunters(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Incite the Hunters (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

IncitetheHunters(RechargesafteraShortorL.description: Brusipha allows each ally within 30 feet of herself that has the Unerring Tracker trait to make one weapon attack as a reaction against the target of that ally's Unerring Tracker.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the infiltrator fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

VeiledPresence.name: Veiled Presence
VeiledPresence.description: The infiltrator's AC includes its Wisdom modifier, and the infiltrator can't be targeted by divination magic or features that would read its mind or determine its creature type.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The infiltrator makes two Poison Blade attacks and can use Beguiling Whisper.

PoisonBlade.name: PoisonBlade
PoisonBlade.description: mw,rw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) poison damage.

BeguilingWhisper.name: BeguilingWhisper
BeguilingWhisper.description: The infiltrator magically whispers to a creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or have the stunned condition due to fear or delight (the infiltrator's choice) until the end of the target's next turn, after which the target is immune to this Beguiling Whisper for 24 hours.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Euryale fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Euryale carries one half of a pair of Sending Stones; the other half of the pair is held by Asteria.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Euryale makes three attacks. If she is in serpent form, only one of these attacks can be Constrict.

Constrict(SerpentFormOnly).name: Constrict(SerpentFormOnly)
Constrict(SerpentFormOnly).description: mw 11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target has the grappled condition (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target takes 11 (2d10) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns, and Euryale can't constrict another target.

SnakeBite.name: SnakeBite
SnakeBite.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or have the poisoned condition until the start of Euryale's next turn.

VerdantBolt(MedusaFormOnly).name: VerdantBolt(MedusaFormOnly)
VerdantBolt(MedusaFormOnly).description: rs 11 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (4d8) acid damage.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If the hag fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

TracetheThreads(1/Day).name: Trace the Threads
TracetheThreads(1/Day).description: The hag can cast the Legend Lore spell, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hag makes two Shears attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

Shears.name: Shears
Shears.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) force damage. If the target is a creature, it has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of the hag's next turn.

EtherealSight.name: Ethereal Sight
EtherealSight.description: Gremorly can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when he is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: Gremorly can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. He takes 5 (1d10) force damage if he ends his turn inside an object.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Gremorly fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Gremorly makes three Withering Strike attacks.

WitheringStrike.name: WitheringStrike
WitheringStrike.description: ms 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (3d12) necrotic damage.

FellNecromancy.name: FellNecromancy
FellNecromancy.description: Gremorly targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of himself. The target must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 61 (7d8 + 30) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. In addition, Gremorly regains 9 (2d8) hit points.

Possession{@recharge}.name: Possession{@recharge}
Possession{@recharge}.description: One Humanoid Gremorly can see within 5 feet of himself must succeed on a DC 15 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by him; Gremorly disappears, and the target has the incapacitated condition and loses control of its body. Gremorly can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn Undead, and he retains his alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to the charmed and frightened conditions. He otherwise uses the target's game statistics, but Gremorly doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the champion fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The champion makes four Blazing Morningstar attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with Blade Storm, if available.

BlazingMorningstar.name: BlazingMorningstar
BlazingMorningstar.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage.

BladeStorm{@recharge5}.name: BladeStorm{@recharge5}
BladeStorm{@recharge5}.description: The champion conjures a churning storm of spectral blades that fills a 20-foot cube centered on a point it can see within 120 feet of itself. The storm lasts until the start of the champion's next turn. While the storm is active, the area of the storm is difficult terrain. Whenever a creature enters the storm for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) slashing damage on a failed saving throw, or half as much damage on a successful one.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the champion fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The champion makes two Leeching Blade attacks and uses Hollow Void.

LeechingBlade.name: LeechingBlade
LeechingBlade.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 33 (6d10) cold damage, and the champion regains 10 hit points.

HollowVoid.name: HollowVoid
HollowVoid.description: The champion summons a hungering rift around a creature it can see within 120 feet of itself. The creature must make a DC 22 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 49 (11d8) force damage and has the stunned condition until the start of the champion's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only. If a creature is reduced to 0 hit points by this effect, the creature dies, and its body crumbles to dust.

HaloofPestilence.name: Halo of Pestilence
HaloofPestilence.description: The champion is surrounded by an aura of deadly magic that takes the form of a host of glowing white insects. Each creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the champion must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or have the incapacitated condition until the start of its next turn, as the insects ravage its body.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the champion fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The champion makes two Blight Staff attacks, two Plague Bolt attacks, or one of each.

BlightStaff.name: BlightStaff
BlightStaff.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 21 (6d6) necrotic damage.

PlagueBolt.name: PlagueBolt
PlagueBolt.description: rs 10 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (4d8 + 5) poison damage, and the target has the poisoned condition until the start of the champion's next turn.

Talons.name: Talons
Talons.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) necrotic damage.

PlaneShift(2/Day).name: PlaneShift(2/Day)
PlaneShift(2/Day).description: The hawk casts Plane Shift on itself, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The hound has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the hound's allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally doesn't have the incapacitated condition.

SupernaturalTracker.name: Supernatural Tracker
SupernaturalTracker.description: The hound knows the distance to and direction of any creature that has come within 30 feet of it, even if that creature is on a different plane of existence. If the creature being tracked by the hound dies, the hound knows.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

Devotion'sCall(1/Day).name: Devotion's Call
Devotion'sCall(1/Day).description: The medusa can cast the Resurrection spell, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

LegendaryResistance(4/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(4/Day).description: If the medusa fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The medusa makes one Constrict attack, one Final Blade attack, and one Snake Hair attack. Alternatively, it makes two Wrathful Strike attacks.

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 20). Until this grapple ends, the target has the restrained condition, and the medusa can't constrict another creature.

FinalBlade.name: FinalBlade
FinalBlade.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 21 (6d6) force damage. If the target has at least one head and the medusa rolled a 20 on the attack roll, the target is decapitated and dies if it fails a DC 20 Constitution saving throw and can't survive without that head. A target is immune to this effect if it takes none of the damage, has legendary actions, or is Huge or larger. Such a creature takes an extra 28 (8d6) force damage from the hit.

SnakeHair.name: SnakeHair
SnakeHair.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (1d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) poison damage.

WrathfulStrike.name: WrathfulStrike
WrathfulStrike.description: rs 12 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) radiant damage, and the target has the blinded condition until the end of its next turn.

Comet'sVoice(1/Day).name: Comet's Voice
Comet'sVoice(1/Day).description: The hierophant can cast Contact Other Plane, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The hierophant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

ThoughtShield.name: Thought Shield
ThoughtShield.description: The hierophant's thoughts can't be read by any means unless the hierophant allows it.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hierophant makes two Herald's Axe attacks or three Comet Blast attacks.

Herald'sAxe.name: Herald'sAxe
Herald'sAxe.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (1d12 + 5) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

CometBlast.name: CometBlast
CometBlast.description: rs 9 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) force damage.

All-ConsumingStar{@recharge}.name: All-ConsumingStar{@recharge}
All-ConsumingStar{@recharge}.description: The hierophant conjures a manifestation of the All-Consuming Star: brilliant light and haunting screams that fill a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the hierophant can see within 60 feet of itself. Each creature within the sphere has the blinded and deafened conditions. Each creature that enters the sphere for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 27 (6d8) psychic damage and has the incapacitated condition until the start of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. The manifestation persists until the hierophant dies, has the incapacitated condition, uses a bonus action to end the effect, or uses this action again.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Hulgaz fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Hulgaz has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Hulgaz makes two Claw attacks and one Intoxicating Sting attack.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.

IntoxicatingSting.name: IntoxicatingSting
IntoxicatingSting.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or have the charmed condition until the start of Hulgaz's next turn.

BrimstoneVapor{@recharge5}.name: BrimstoneVapor{@recharge5}
BrimstoneVapor{@recharge5}.description: Hulgaz exhales a 30-foot cone of noxious, scorching-hot vapor. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or have the poisoned condition for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, a creature takes 31 (7d8) fire damage at the start of each of its turns and has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws. A target can repeat the Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The initiate has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The initiate makes two Comet Strike attacks.

CometStrike.name: CometStrike
CometStrike.description: ms,rs 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) force damage.

Brilliance(TrueFormOnly).name: Brilliance (True Form Only)
Brilliance(TrueFormOnly).description: The living portent sheds bright light for 30 feet and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The living portent makes two Radiant Strike attacks.

RadiantStrike.name: RadiantStrike
RadiantStrike.description: ms,rs 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) radiant damage.

PropheticBlessing.name: PropheticBlessing
PropheticBlessing.description: The living portent magically infuses the power of its prophecy into another willing creature the living portent can see within 30 feet of itself. The target's hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 7 (1d8 + 3), and it gains a prophecy die, a d8. Once during each of the creature's turns, when it fails an ability check or saving throw or misses an attack roll, it can roll the prophecy die and add the number rolled to the total, potentially changing the outcome. The blessing ends after 1 hour or when the living portent ends the blessing (no action required) or uses this action again.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Malaxxix fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Malaxxix has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Malaxxix makes two Forge Hammer or Whip attacks in any combination.

ForgeHammer.name: ForgeHammer
ForgeHammer.description: mw,rw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 60/180 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the end of Malaxxix's next turn. {@hom}The hammer then magically returns to Malaxxix's hand.

Whip.name: Whip
Whip.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 30 ft., one creature. on hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) slashing damage, and the target has the restrained condition for 1 minute. The restrained target can make a DC 20 Strength saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Only one creature can be restrained by the whip at a time.

MezzolothVortex{@recharge5}.name: MezzolothVortex{@recharge5}
MezzolothVortex{@recharge5}.description: Malaxxix summons a vortex of whirling mezzoloths at a point it can see within 90 feet of itself. The vortex is a 30-foot-radius, 100-foot-high cylinder centered on that point. Each creature other than Malaxxix in that area must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 35 (10d6) force damage and has the restrained condition while within the cylinder. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and is pushed to the nearest unoccupied space outside the cylinder. The vortex lasts until the start of Malaxxix's next turn.

LabyrinthineRecall.name: Labyrinthine Recall
LabyrinthineRecall.description: The minotaur can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage. If the minotaur moved at least 10 feet straight toward the target immediately before it hit, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) piercing damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet from the minotaur and have the prone condition.

LabyrinthineRecall.name: Labyrinthine Recall
LabyrinthineRecall.description: The minotaur can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage while enlarged. If the minotaur moved at least 10 feet straight toward the target immediately before it hit, the target takes an extra 4 (1d8) piercing damage, or 9 (2d8) piercing damage if the minotaur is enlarged. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet from the minotaur and have the prone condition.

Mattock.name: Mattock
Mattock.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage, or 17 (2d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage while enlarged. If the target is a creature and the minotaur is enlarged, the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

Enlarge(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).name: Enlarge(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

Enlarge(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).description: For 1 minute, the minotaur magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the minotaur is Large, doubles its damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If the minotaur lacks the room to become Large, the minotaur doesn't change size.

FortuneTeller.name: Fortune Teller
FortuneTeller.description: Oddlewin can cast the Augury spell as a ritual, using cards as the material component.

Nilbogism.name: Nilbogism
Nilbogism.description: Any creature that attempts to damage Oddlewin must first succeed on a DC 12 Charisma saving throw or have the charmed condition until the end of the creature's next turn. The creature must use its action praising Oddlewin.

Fool'sScepter.name: Fool'sScepter
Fool'sScepter.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

CloudofCards.name: CloudofCards
CloudofCards.description: Oddlewin conjures magical cards that slash at the air in a 5-foot cube within 60 feet of Oddlewin until the start of Oddlewin's next turn. A creature that starts its turn in the cube or that enters that area for the first time on a turn takes 10 (4d4) slashing damage.

AlienMind.name: Alien Mind
AlienMind.description: Magic and other features can't determine the corrupter's creature type. If a creature tries to read the corrupter's thoughts, that creature must succeed on a DC 20 Intelligence saving throw or have the stunned condition for 1 minute. The stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the corrupter fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The corrupter can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The corrupter makes three Whispering Blade attacks and can use Debilitating Touch.

WhisperingBlade.name: WhisperingBlade
WhisperingBlade.description: mw,rw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) psychic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw or be unable to speak until the start of the corrupter's next turn.

DebilitatingTouch.name: DebilitatingTouch
DebilitatingTouch.description: The corrupter's squirming tentacle lashes out at a creature the corrupter can see within 30 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw or have the paralyzed condition until the end of its next turn, after which the target is immune to this Debilitating Touch for 24 hours.

GuardianoftheMarket.name: Guardian of the Market
GuardianoftheMarket.description: Pazrodine can sense when an item is stolen from Seelie Market. She knows the distance and direction to stolen items, as if by the Locate Object spell.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Pazrodine fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Pazrodine makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) radiant damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.name: BreathWeapon{@recharge5}
BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.description: Pazrodine uses one of the following breath weapons:

CardSense.name: Card Sense
CardSense.description: The riffler can smell the presence of magical cards, including Decks of Many Things and other magical decks, within 1 mile of itself. It knows the direction to any such cards in that range. Effects that protect a target from divination magic block this sense.

RifflingStep.name: Riffling Step
RifflingStep.description: The riffler can burrow through any nonmagical material that isn't iron, shuffling the substance through which the riffler moves aside like cards to form a tunnel that closes behind the riffler.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The riffler makes two Spectral Card attacks.

SpectralCard.name: SpectralCard
SpectralCard.description: ms,rs 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) force damage plus 5 (1d10) damage that is radiant if the d10 roll is an even number and necrotic if it's odd.

CardSpray{@recharge5}.name: CardSpray{@recharge5}
CardSpray{@recharge5}.description: The riffler magically unleashes a spray of spectral cards in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 27 (5d10) force damage and has the restrained condition for 1 minute as cards bind it. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. A restrained creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

PlaneShift.name: PlaneShift
PlaneShift.description: The riffler casts the Plane Shift spell targeting only itself, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

RuinousAcid.name: Ruinous Acid
RuinousAcid.description: Any nonmagical weapon that hits the spider corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits the spider is destroyed after dealing damage.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

WebSense.name: Web Sense
WebSense.description: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

WebWalker.name: Web Walker
WebWalker.description: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The spider makes two Ruinous Bite attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Web.

RuinousBite.name: RuinousBite
RuinousBite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage and 9 (2d8) acid damage. In addition, if the target is a creature wearing nonmagical armor, the armor takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an Armor Class of 10 is destroyed.

Web{@recharge5}.name: Web{@recharge5}
Web{@recharge5}.description: rw 7 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. on hit: The target has the restrained condition. As an action, a restrained target can make a DC 13 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a successful check. The webbing can also be destroyed (AC 10; 5 hit points; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to acid, bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Jared makes three Longsword attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) radiant damage. On a roll of 19 or 20, Jared scores a critical hit.

AuraofProtection.name: Aura of Protection
AuraofProtection.description: The knight and each ally within 10 feet of it have advantage on saving throws. This trait is suppressed while the knight has the incapacitated condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The knight makes three Sunspear attacks.

Sunspear.name: Sunspear
Sunspear.description: ms,rs 8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) radiant damage, or 21 (5d6 + 4) radiant damage if the target is a Fiend or an Undead.

SolarFlare{@recharge5}.name: SolarFlare{@recharge5}
SolarFlare{@recharge5}.description: The knight unleashes a blaze of brilliant energy that fills a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on the knight. Each creature of the knight's choice in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 22 (4d10) radiant damage and has the blinded condition until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. For the next minute, the affected area is filled with bright light that is sunlight.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The talon beast has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SenseMagic.name: Sense Magic
SenseMagic.description: The talon beast can detect and pinpoint the location of magic within 120 feet of itself.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The talon beast makes two Talon attacks or a Talon attack and a Beak attack.

Beak.name: Beak
Beak.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage, and if the target has any spell effects on itself or any magic items in its possession, the target must make a DC 15 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a random spell effect on the target ends. If the target has no spell effects on it, one random magic item in its possession has its magical properties suppressed for 1 minute. If the item is a potion or scroll, it becomes nonmagical instead.

Talon.name: Talon
Talon.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) slashing damage, and the target has the grappled condition (escape DC 17). Until the grapple ends, the target has the restrained condition, and the talon beast can't use Talon on another target.

InviolatePresence.name: Inviolate Presence
InviolatePresence.description: The veiled presence can't be targeted by divination magic or by features that would read its mind or determine its creature type.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the veiled presence fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The veiled presence makes two Blade of Judgment attacks and can use Revelation.

BladeofJudgment.name: BladeofJudgment
BladeofJudgment.description: mw,rw 14 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d6 + 7) piercing damage plus 27 (6d8) radiant damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 22 Charisma saving throw, or on its next turn, it can either move or take an action, but not both.

Revelation.name: Revelation
Revelation.description: The veiled presence reveals a glimpse of its otherworldly nature to a creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 22 Wisdom saving throw or have the paralyzed condition until the end of its next turn, after which the target is immune to this Revelation for 24 hours.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The werevulture regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the werevulture takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the werevulture's next turn. The werevulture dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The werevulture makes two Talon attacks, or it makes a Beak attack and a Talon attack.

Beak(VultureorHybridFormOnly).name: Beak(VultureorHybridFormOnly)
Beak(VultureorHybridFormOnly).description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a Humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be cursed until targeted by the Remove Curse spell or a similar effect. If the cursed target drops to 0 hit points, it becomes a werevulture under the DM's control and regains 10 hit points.

Talon.name: Talon
Talon.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (4d4 + 3) slashing damage.

Longbow(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).name: Longbow(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly)
Longbow(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).description: rw 4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

EtherealSight.name: Ethereal Sight
EtherealSight.description: The ghost can see 120 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.
