IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The ghost regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the ghost takes radiant damage or damage from a magic weapon, this trait doesn't function at the start of the ghost's next turn. The ghost dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ghost makes two melee attacks.

SpectralWeapon.name: SpectralWeapon
SpectralWeapon.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) force damage.

Etherealness.name: Etherealness
Etherealness.description: The ghost enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

WindHowl{@recharge}.name: WindHowl{@recharge}
WindHowl{@recharge}.description: The ghost emits a dreadful howl that summons a cold, biting wind. This wind engulfs up to three creatures of the ghost's choice that it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target is pulled up to 20 feet toward the ghost and must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The commoner doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep, and it gains no benefit from finishing a short or long rest. When it drops to 0 hit points, it becomes a lifeless object.

Club.name: Club
Club.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The avatar makes two attacks: one with its hooves and one with its horn.

Hooves.name: Hooves
Hooves.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 32 (8d6 + 4) necrotic damage.

Horn.name: Horn
Horn.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 32 (8d6 + 4) necrotic damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be transformed into a wolf under the avatar's control. This transformation lasts for 1 hour, or until the target drops to 0 hit points or dies. The target's game statistics are replaced by the wolf's statistics, but it retains its hit points. The target is limited in the actions it can perform by the nature of its wolf form, and it can't speak, cast spells, or take any other action that requires hands or speech. The target's gear melds into the new form, and it can't activate, use, wield, or otherwise benefit from any of its equipment.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Faerl has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

Rapier.name: Rapier
Rapier.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The fungal servant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: A destroyed fungal servant gains a new body in 24 hours if its heart is intact, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the fungal servant's heart.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The fungal servant can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with its rotting fist.

RottingFist.name: RottingFist
RottingFist.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 21 (6d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to spores. The curse lasts until removed by the remove curse spell or other magic.

DreadfulGlare.name: DreadfulGlare
DreadfulGlare.description: The fungal servant targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the fungal servant, it must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become frightened until the end of the fungal servant's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also paralyzed for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all fungal servants for the next 24 hours.

AlternateForms.name: Alternate Forms
AlternateForms.description: The gingwatzim has two alternate forms, both of which are chosen by its creator when the gingwatzim comes into being. One form is an exact duplicate of a Tiny nonmagical object (such as a book, dagger, or gemstone) that its creator is carrying or wearing when the gingwatzim is conjured. The other form can be any Tiny beast. Once these alternate forms are chosen, they can't be changed.

EnergyDrain(TrueFormOnly).name: EnergyDrain(TrueFormOnly)
EnergyDrain(TrueFormOnly).description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 16 (4d6 + 2) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or gain 1 level of exhaustion. When the target finishes a short or long rest, the target loses every level of exhaustion gained from this attack.

ChangeShape.name: ChangeShape
ChangeShape.description: The gingwatzim changes from its true forma 3-foot-diameter sphere of luminous ectoplasminto one of its two alternate forms, or from one of those forms back into its true form. In object form, it can't move or make attacks but otherwise retains its statistics, and it is indistinguishable from the thing it is imitating. In beast form, it retains its hit points but otherwise uses the stat block of the beast it is imitating. When it dies, the gingwatzim reverts to its true form and then vanishes.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The grippli can hold its breath for 20 minutes.

StandingLeap.name: Standing Leap
StandingLeap.description: The grippli can leap 30 feet horizontally or 20 feet vertically from a standing position.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The grippli makes one attack with its tongue. If this attack hits, the grippli can make a melee attack using its trident against the same target.

Tongue.name: Tongue
Tongue.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. on hit: The target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the grippli can't grab another creature.

Trident.name: Trident
Trident.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 2 (1d4) piercing damage if the grippli had advantage on the attack roll.

Shortbow.name: Shortbow
Shortbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, plus 2 (1d4) piercing damage if the grippli had advantage on the attack roll.

UnarmoredDefense.name: Unarmored Defense
UnarmoredDefense.description: While the monk is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The monk makes two attacks.

ForceStrike.name: ForceStrike
ForceStrike.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) force damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

Dart.name: Dart
Dart.description: rw 6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

UnarmoredDefense.name: Unarmored Defense
UnarmoredDefense.description: While Jade Tigress is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her AC includes her Wisdom modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Jade Tigress makes three attacks.

ForceStrike.name: ForceStrike
ForceStrike.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) force damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of Jade Tigress's next turn.

PoisonedDart.name: PoisonedDart
PoisonedDart.description: rw 5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 7 (3d4) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or gain 1 level of exhaustion.

HealSelf(RechargesafteraLongRest).name: HealSelf(RechargesafteraLongRest)

value.value: Heal Self (Recharges after a Long Rest)

HealSelf(RechargesafteraLongRest).description: Jade Tigress regains 2d8 + 2 hit points, and all levels of exhaustion end on her.

FelineAgility.name: Feline Agility
FelineAgility.description: When K'Tulah moves on her turn in combat, she can double her speed until the end of the turn. Once she uses this ability, K'Tulah can't use it again until she moves 0 feet on one of her turns.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 2 to hit (4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) slashing damage.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The kiddywidget doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The kiddywidget makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled by the kiddywidget (escape DC 8).

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) lightning damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the lich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: If it has a phylactery, a destroyed lich gains a new body in 1d10 days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The lich makes four attacks.

PoisonousTouch.name: PoisonousTouch
PoisonousTouch.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. on hit: 17 (5d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Wither.name: Wither
Wither.description: rs 9 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (4d6) necrotic damage.

FireStorm(7th-LevelSpell;1/Day).name: FireStorm(7th-LevelSpell;1/Day)
FireStorm(7th-LevelSpell;1/Day).description: The lich fills up to ten 10-foot cubes with fire. Every cube must be within 150 feet of the lich and occupy a space the lich can see, and each cube must have at least one face adjacent to the face of another cube. Each creature in the area must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 38 (7d10) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried. If the lich chooses, plant life in the area is unaffected by the spell.

Berserk.name: Berserk
Berserk.description: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 40 hit points or fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

LightningAbsorption.name: Lightning Absorption
LightningAbsorption.description: Whenever the golem is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The golem makes two slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) lightning damage.

ShockingGrasp(Cantrip).name: ShockingGrasp(Cantrip)
ShockingGrasp(Cantrip).description: ms 8 to hit (with advantage if the target is wearing armor made of metal), reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 13 (3d8) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

LightningEruption(3/Day).name: LightningEruption(3/Day)
LightningEruption(3/Day).description: The sage creates an eruption of magical lightning centered on a point it can see within 150 feet of it. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

BoundtoCandlekeep.name: Bound to Candlekeep
BoundtoCandlekeep.description: Miirym can't leave Candlekeep and is immune to any effect that would place her in a location outside it, including an extradimensional space. If she dies, Miirym regains her form and all her hit points after 1d10 days, reappearing in the location where she died or in the nearest unoccupied space.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Miirym regains 40 hit points at the start of her turn. If Miirym takes damage from a magic weapon or a spell, this trait doesn't function at the start of Miirym's next turn. Miirym dies only if she starts her turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: Miirym can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. She takes 5 (1d10) force damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Miirym fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

X-RayVision.name: X-Ray Vision
X-RayVision.description: Miirym can see through solid matter out to a range of 60 feet. To her, opaque creatures, objects, and obstacles within that distance appear transparent and don't prevent light from passing through them. This vision can penetrate 5 feet of stone, 3 inches of common metal, and up to 10 feet of wood or dirt. Thicker substances block this vision, as does a thin sheet of lead.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 34 (9d6 + 3) force damage.

BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.name: BreathWeapon{@recharge5}
BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.description: Miirym uses one of the following breath weapons:

ColdBreath.name: ColdBreath
ColdBreath.description: Miirym exhales an icy blast in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw, taking 67 (15d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

NecroticBreath.name: NecroticBreath
NecroticBreath.description: Miirym exhales a bolt of necrotic energy in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw, taking 82 (15d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

ParalyzingBreath.name: ParalyzingBreath
ParalyzingBreath.description: Miirym exhales paralyzing gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

FrightfulPresence.name: FrightfulPresence
FrightfulPresence.description: Each creature of Miirym's choice that is within 120 feet of her and aware of her must succeed on a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Miirym's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

Adhesive(ObjectFormOnly).name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
Adhesive(ObjectFormOnly).description: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic is also grappled by it (escape DC 10). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

FalseAppearance(ObjectFormOnly).name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
FalseAppearance(ObjectFormOnly).description: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

Grappler.name: Grappler
Grappler.description: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.

Pseudopod.name: Pseudopod
Pseudopod.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) acid damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Nintra fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Nintra makes two attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d4 + 7) piercing damage.

ShardofShadow.name: ShardofShadow
ShardofShadow.description: rs 12 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d6 + 7) necrotic damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

StormofShatteredGlass{@recharge}.name: StormofShatteredGlass{@recharge}
StormofShatteredGlass{@recharge}.description: Nintra targets a point she can see within 60 feet of her and creates a 20-foot-radius sphere of swirling glass shards centered on that point. Each creature in the sphere must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful save. If Nintra is in the sphere, the shards deal no damage to her.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The behir makes two attacks: one with its bite and one to constrict.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage.

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Large or smaller creature. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage. The target is grappled (escape DC 16) if the behir isn't already constricting a creature, and the target is restrained until this grapple ends.

LightningBreath{@recharge5}.name: LightningBreath{@recharge5}
LightningBreath{@recharge5}.description: The behir exhales a line of lightning that is 20 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 66 (12d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Swallow.name: Swallow
Swallow.description: The behir makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the target is blinded and restrained, it has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the behir, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the behir's turns. A behir can have only one creature swallowed at a time.

DarkDevotion.name: Dark Devotion
DarkDevotion.description: Ram Sugar has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Ram Sugar makes two melee attacks.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

BreathWeapon(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.name: BreathWeapon(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Breath Weapon (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

BreathWeapon(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.description: Ram Sugar exhales fire in a 30-foot-long line that is 5 feet wide. Any creature in the line must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

ShockingGrasp(Cantrip).name: ShockingGrasp(Cantrip)
ShockingGrasp(Cantrip).description: ms 6 to hit (with advantage if the target is wearing armor made of metal), reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 9 (2d8) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The golem makes two slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

Slow{@recharge5}.name: Slow{@recharge5}
Slow{@recharge5}.description: The golem targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Sapphire.name: Sapphire
Sapphire.description: The sapphire has 3 charges. As an action, the golem can expend 1 charge to cast dispel magic (as a 9th-level spell) from the sapphire using Constitution as its spellcasting ability. The sapphire ceases to glow if all its charges are expended, but it regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn and glows again once it has 1 or more charges.

CrushingEnd.name: Crushing End
CrushingEnd.description: If damage reduces Shemshime to 0 hit points, Shemshime instead drops to 1 hit point unless the damage is the result of Shemshime being crushed by an object weighing at least 1,000 pounds.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: Shemshime can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

MaddeningTouch.name: MaddeningTouch
MaddeningTouch.description: ms 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) psychic damage.

WhispersofViolence.name: WhispersofViolence
WhispersofViolence.description: Shemshime chooses up to two creatures it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw, or that target takes 7 (1d8 + 3) psychic damage and must use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack against one creature it can reach (Shemshime's choice) that Shemshime can see.

HowlingBabble{@recharge}.name: HowlingBabble{@recharge}
HowlingBabble{@recharge}.description: Shemshime targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The creature must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 21 (4d8 + 3) psychic damage and is stunned until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.

LightningAbsorption.name: Lightning Absorption
LightningAbsorption.description: Whenever the skitterwidget is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The skitterwidget doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The skitterwidget makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled by the skitterwidget (escape DC 13).

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) lightning damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

UnarmoredDefense.name: Unarmored Defense
UnarmoredDefense.description: While Steel Crane is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, his AC includes his Wisdom modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Steel Crane makes three attacks.

ForceStrike.name: ForceStrike
ForceStrike.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) force damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the start of Steel Crane's next turn.

Whip.name: Whip
Whip.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage or, if the target is a creature, Steel Crane can grapple the target instead (escape DC 15). Steel Crane can't make attacks with the whip while using it to grapple a creature. Anytime on his turn, he can release a creature grappled by the whip (no action required).

HealSelf(RechargesafteraLongRest).name: HealSelf(RechargesafteraLongRest)

value.value: Heal Self (Recharges after a Long Rest)

HealSelf(RechargesafteraLongRest).description: Steel Crane regains 2d8 + 4 hit points, and all levels of exhaustion end on him.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes two attacks with its greatsword or hurls two rocks.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 30 (6d6 + 9) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) necrotic damage.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 14 to hit, reach 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 35 (4d12 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

LightningStrike{@recharge5}.name: LightningStrike{@recharge5}
LightningStrike{@recharge5}.description: The giant hurls a magical lightning bolt at a point it can see within 500 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

FalseObjects.name: False Objects
FalseObjects.description: If the swarm is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the swarm move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom (Perception) check to discern that the swarm is animate.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a 1-foot-tall, 8-inch-wide, 2-inch-thick object. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

BookClub.name: BookClub
BookClub.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. on hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage if the swarm has half its hit points or fewer.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Valin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: While her heart remains in Alessia's body, Valin re-forms inside her sarcophagus, regaining all her hit points and becoming active again.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Valin can use her Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with her rotting fist.

RottingFist.name: RottingFist
RottingFist.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 21 (6d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the remove curse spell or other magic.

DreadfulGlare.name: DreadfulGlare
DreadfulGlare.description: Valin targets one creature she can see within 60 feet of her. If the target can see Valin, it must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become frightened until the end of Valin's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also paralyzed for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies and mummy lords for the next 24 hours.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Varnyr has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put Varnyr to sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Varnyr makes two attacks.

Cane.name: Cane
Cane.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Zikzokrishka fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Zikzokrishka has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Zikzokrishka can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) lightning damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

FrightfulPresence.name: FrightfulPresence
FrightfulPresence.description: Each creature of Zikzokrishka's choice that is within 120 feet of the Zikzokrishka and aware of it must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the Zikzokrishka's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

LightningBreath{@recharge5}.name: LightningBreath{@recharge5}
LightningBreath{@recharge5}.description: Zikzokrishka exhales lightning in a 90-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 66 (12d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

AntimagicAura.name: Antimagic Aura
AntimagicAura.description: Asmodeus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. Spells of level 4 or lower can't damage Asmodeus.

FiendishRegeneration.name: Fiendish Regeneration
FiendishRegeneration.description: Asmodeus regains 40 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Asmodeus dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate. If Asmodeus dies, his body regenerates, returning to life 13 (2d12) days later.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Asmodeus fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

SubmissionAura.name: Submission Aura
SubmissionAura.description: When a creature moves to be within 120 feet of Asmodeus, they must succeed on a DC 24 Wisdom saving throw or have the frightened condition until they leave the aura. While frightened, creatures kneel before Asmodeus, taking no actions unless he commands otherwise. If Asmodeus deals damage to a kneeling creature, the creature's frightened condition ends. A creature that succeeds the saving throw is immune to this effect for 1 hour.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Asmodeus makes four attacks using Ruby Rod, Chilling Gaze, or a combination of the two. He can replace one of the attacks with Hellish Smite.

RubyRod.name: RubyRod
RubyRod.description: mw 21 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (2d8 + 12) necrotic damage, which also reduces the target's hit point maximum by the damage taken. This damage can't reduce a target's hit point maximum below 1. Any effect that removes a disease allows a creature's hit point maximum to return to normal.

ChillingGaze.name: ChillingGaze
ChillingGaze.description: rs 16 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) cold damage, and the target has a-1 penalty to all attack rolls they make until the end of their next turn. This penalty can stack.

HellishSmite.name: HellishSmite
HellishSmite.description: Asmodeus targets a creature he can see within 300 feet of him, calling down a bolt of hellish lightning. The target must make a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) lightning damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

InfernalWord:Stun{@recharge4}.name: InfernalWord:Stun{@recharge4}
InfernalWord:Stun{@recharge4}.description: Asmodeus targets a creature he can see within 120 feet of him. The target must make a DC 24 Intelligence saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that failed the save is stunned for up to 1 minute. The stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success, but taking the damage again on a failed save.

Hell-Lord'sSuggestion{@recharge5}.name: Hell-Lord'sSuggestion{@recharge5}
Hell-Lord'sSuggestion{@recharge5}.description: Asmodeus targets a creature he can see within 120 feet of him. The target must make a DC 24 Charisma saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that failed the save has the charmed condition for up to 1 minute. While charmed, a creature is controlled by Asmodeus, performing only actions that he suggests. A charmed creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success, but taking the damage again on a failed save.

FiresoftheNineHells{@recharge5}.name: FiresoftheNineHells{@recharge5}
FiresoftheNineHells{@recharge5}.description: Asmodeus chooses a point he can see within 500 feet of him, which explodes into a roaring inferno. All creatures within a 60-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw, taking 70 (20d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

StenchoftheSlug.name: Stench of the Slug
StenchoftheSlug.description: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the avatar must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or have the poisoned condition until the start of their next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to this stench for 1 hour.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The avatar makes four Sickening Claw attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with Insect Gorge (if available).

SickeningClaw.name: SickeningClaw
SickeningClaw.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) acid damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by the acid damage taken. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

InsectGorge{@recharge4}.name: InsectGorge{@recharge4}
InsectGorge{@recharge4}.description: The avatar disgorges a swarm of biting flies at a point it can see within 300 feet of itself. Each creature within a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw. A creature takes 55 (10d10) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The biting flies persist for 1 minute or until the avatar is slain. A creature must also make this saving throw when it enters the insects' area for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.

CausticSlimepool(1/Day).name: CausticSlimepool(1/Day)
CausticSlimepool(1/Day).description: The avatar causes caustic slime to emanate from itself, covering a 15-foot-radius circle. Each creature within the slime must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or have the grappled condition (escape 17). A grappled creature takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of its turn.

FlammableBlood.name: Flammable Blood
FlammableBlood.description: If the fisher drops below 200 hit points, it gains vulnerability to fire damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the fisher fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The fisher can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The fisher makes two Claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (4d6 + 6) slashing damage.

RetractFilament.name: RetractFilament
RetractFilament.description: One Huge or smaller creature grappled by the fisher's Adhesive Filament must make a DC 20 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is pulled into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the fisher, and the fisher makes one Claw attack against it with advantage. Anyone else who was attached to the filament is released. Until the grapple ends on the target, the fisher can't use Adhesive Filament.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the ayperobo swarm's darkvision.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The ayperobo swarm has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: The ayperobo swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny creature. The ayperobo swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ayperobo swarm makes three Bite attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target. on hit: 27 (8d4 + 7) piercing damage, or 17 (4d4 + 7) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points (65) or fewer.

Burrow{@recharge}.name: Burrow{@recharge}
Burrow{@recharge}.description: The ayperobo swarm makes a Bite attack. On a hit, the swarm burrows inside the creature, dealing an additional 35 (10d6) necrotic damage and taking control of the creature. At the start of each of its turns, the target may make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, expelling the ayperobo swarm and taking 14 (4d6) piercing damage on a success.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Barachiel makes three Greatsword attacks.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 22 (5d8) radiant damage.

PurifyingFlames{@recharge4}.name: PurifyingFlames{@recharge4}
PurifyingFlames{@recharge4}.description: Barachiel wreathes his sword in white flame, then makes a Greatsword attack. On a hit, the target takes an additional 45 (7d12) fire damage plus 45 (7d12) radiant damage. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Charisma saving throw or have the stunned condition until the end of their next turn.

DeepWounds.name: Deep Wounds
DeepWounds.description: All damage dealt by Belial can only be restored through magical means.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede Belial's darkvision.

FearAura.name: Fear Aura
FearAura.description: When a creature starts their turn within 120 feet of Belial, they must succeed on a DC 22 Wisdom saving throw or have the frightened condition until they leave the aura. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to this effect for 1 hour.

FiendishRegeneration.name: Fiendish Regeneration
FiendishRegeneration.description: Belial regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes radiant damage this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Belial dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Belial fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Belial has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Belial makes three attacks using his Ranseur of Torture.

RanseurofTorture.name: RanseurofTorture
RanseurofTorture.description: mw 18 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (2d10 + 10) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) necrotic damage, and the target must make a DC 23 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target's movement speed is reduced by 5 feet until the end of their next turn. This penalty can stack.

WallsofPhlegethos.name: WallsofPhlegethos
WallsofPhlegethos.description: Belial creates a wall of fire on a solid surface within 120 feet of him. The wall is 20 feet high and 1 foot thick, and Belial can make the wall up to 60 feet long or create a ringed wall up to 20 feet in diameter. The wall is opaque and lasts until Belial dismisses it. When the wall appears, each creature within its area must make a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that ends its turn inside the wall, or within 5 feet of it, must repeat the save.

SymbolofInsanity{@recharge4}.name: SymbolofInsanity{@recharge4}
SymbolofInsanity{@recharge4}.description: Belial draws a magic symbol at a point he can see within 120 feet of him. All creatures within a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on the symbol must make a DC 25 Intelligence saving throw. Targets take 45 (10d8) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures that fail the save immediately use their reaction to make a melee attack against a random creature within their reach, then move their full movement in a random direction.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede Adramalech's darkvision.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Adramalech has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

UnbreakableBond.name: Unbreakable Bond
UnbreakableBond.description: If Adramalech is reduced to 0 hit points while Brother Morax still lives, Adramalech regenerates 50 hit points at the start of his next turn. This regeneration is interrupted if Brother Morax is reduced to 0 hit points before the start of Adramalech's turn.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Adramalech makes four attacks using Mental

Barrage.name: Barrage
Barrage.description: He can replace one of the attacks with Brain Freeze or Cone of Madness (if available).

MentalBarrage.name: MentalBarrage
MentalBarrage.description: mw,rw 14 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60/120 ft., one target. on hit: 25 (4d8 + 7) psychic damage.

BrainFreeze.name: BrainFreeze
BrainFreeze.description: Adramalech attempts to overload the brain of a creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must make a DC 22 Intelligence saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. Creatures that fail the saving throw have the stunned condition for up to 1 minute. A stunned creature may repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the effect on a success.

ConeofMadness{@recharge4}.name: ConeofMadness{@recharge4}
ConeofMadness{@recharge4}.description: Adramalech unleashes visions in a 30-foot cone in front of him. All creatures in the cone must make a DC 22 Wisdom saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. For up to 1 minute, creatures that failed the save can't take reactions and each turn must use their action to make a melee attack against the nearest creature. Creatures may repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the effect on a success.

BrittleSpine.name: Brittle Spine
BrittleSpine.description: For each Brittle Spine a creature has, the creature takes 3 (1d6) poison damage at the start of each of their turns, and when Morax activates Burrow or Deep Burrow. Spines can only be removed by a Regeneration spell or similar, or by killing Morax.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede Morax's darkvision.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Morax has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SpinedHide.name: Spined Hide
SpinedHide.description: Whenever Morax is hit with a melee attack, the attacker takes 7 (2d6) piercing damage and gains 1 Brittle Spine.

UnbreakableBond.name: Unbreakable Bond
UnbreakableBond.description: If Morax is reduced to 0 hit points while Brother Adramalech still lives, Morax regenerates 50 hit points at the start of his next turn. This regeneration is interrupted if Brother Adramalech is reduced to 0 hit points before the start of Morax's turn.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Morax makes four attacks using his Claw, Spine Fling, or a combination of the two.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) slashing damage, and the target gains 1 Brittle Spine.

SpineFling.name: SpineFling
SpineFling.description: rw 13 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (1d12 + 6) piercing damage, and the target gains 1 Brittle Spine.

DeepBurrow.name: DeepBurrow
DeepBurrow.description: Morax immediately deals Brittle Spine ongoing damage to all creatures that have at least one Brittle Spine that he can see.

BoneSpikes{@recharge}.name: BoneSpikes{@recharge}
BoneSpikes{@recharge}.description: Morax shoves an arm into the ground, rapidly growing bones that erupt at a point he can see within 100 feet of him. Each creature in a 60-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures that fail the save gain 2 Brittle Spines, while creatures that succeed only gain 1 Brittle Spine.

ContractuallyObligated.name: Contractually Obligated
ContractuallyObligated.description: Buer has advantage to hit creatures under an infernal contract and when she hits such creatures she delivers an additional 9 (2d8) damage of a type the target is most vulnerable to. A creature bound under an infernal contract also makes all saving throws against effects originating from Buer with disadvantage.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede Buer's darkvision.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Buer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Buer makes three attacks using her Claw. She can replace two of the attacks with a Cleansing Bite attack.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) slashing damage.

CleansingBite.name: CleansingBite
CleansingBite.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (2d12 + 6) bludgeoning damage, healing Buer for an amount equal to the damage dealt.

SpectralReaping{@recharge}.name: SpectralReaping{@recharge}
SpectralReaping{@recharge}.description: Buer focuses her ethereal form, dashing up to 50 feet in a straight line through the ethereal plane. Any creatures in the line must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw, taking 42 (12d6) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Buer may reappear at any unoccupied space along the line. For 1 minute after using Spectral Reaping, Buer is empowered by ethereal essence. Her Cleansing Bite attack now deals force damage instead of bludgeoning.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the paeliryon's darkvision.

KeenEyes.name: Keen Eyes
KeenEyes.description: The paeliryon scores a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The paeliryon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The paeliryon makes three Claw attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with Draining Grasp (if available).

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage.

DrainingGrasp{@recharge4}.name: DrainingGrasp{@recharge4}
DrainingGrasp{@recharge4}.description: The paeliryon makes a Claw attack. On a hit, the target's Charisma score is reduced by 2 (1d4). This reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. A creature whose Charisma is reduced to 3 or less because of this ability, has the stunned condition for 1 minute.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Devorastus fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

OozeCube.name: Ooze Cube
OozeCube.description: Devorastus takes up its entire space. Other creatures can enter the space, but a creature that does so is subjected to Engulf and has disadvantage on the saving throw. Creatures inside the cube can be seen but have Cover||3||total cover. A creature within 5 feet of the cube can take an action to pull a creature or object out of the cube. Doing so requires a successful DC 21 Strength check, and the creature making the attempt takes 35 (10d6) acid damage. The cube can hold only one Huge creature or up to six Large or smaller creatures inside it at a time.

Sticky.name: Sticky
Sticky.description: Devorastus can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Transparent.name: Transparent
Transparent.description: Even when Devorastus is in plain sight, it takes a successful DC 15 Wisdom (Perception) check to spot Devorastus if it has neither moved nor attacked. A creature that tries to enter Devorastus' space while unaware of Devorastus is surprised by it.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Devorastus makes four attacks using its Pseudopod, Spit, or a combination of the two.

Pseudopod.name: Pseudopod
Pseudopod.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 42 (12d6) acid damage.

Spit.name: Spit
Spit.description: rw 8 to hit, range 100/200 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (8d6) acid damage. A target hit by this attack must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target has the prone condition.

Engulf.name: Engulf
Engulf.description: Devorastus moves up to its speed. While doing so, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. Whenever Devorastus enters a creature's space, the creature must make a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, the creature can choose to be pushed 5 feet back or to the side of Devorastus. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw. On a failed save, Devorastus enters the creature's space, the creature takes 35 (10d6) acid damage, and is engulfed. The engulfed creature can't breathe, has the restrained condition, and takes 42 (12d6) acid damage at the start of each of Devorastus' turns. When Devorastus moves, the engulfed creature moves with it. An engulfed creature can try to escape by making a DC 21 Strength check as an action. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of its choice within 5 feet of Devorastus.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede Dispater's darkvision.

FearAura.name: Fear Aura
FearAura.description: When a creature starts their turn within 120 feet of Dispater, they must succeed on a DC 22 Wisdom saving throw or have the frightened condition until they leave the aura. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to this effect for 1 hour.

FiendishRegeneration.name: Fiendish Regeneration
FiendishRegeneration.description: Dispater regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes radiant damage this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Dispater dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and is unable to regenerate.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Dispater fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Dispater has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

RustMetal.name: Rust Metal
RustMetal.description: Any nonmagical weapon or ammunition made of metal that hits Dispater corrodes. After its hit, the weapon or ammunition is destroyed.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Dispater makes four attacks using his Wrought- Iron Tower, Iron Column, or a combination of the two. He can replace one of the attacks with Superheat Metal (if available).

Wrought-IronTower.name: Wrought-IronTower
Wrought-IronTower.description: mw 20 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (2d8 + 12) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage. Dispater may replace the bludgeoning damage with damage of a type that the target is vulnerable to instead.

IronColumn.name: IronColumn
IronColumn.description: rs 15 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (2d8 + 12) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage. Dispater may replace the bludgeoning damage with damage of a type that the target is vulnerable to instead.

SuperheatMetal{@recharge4}.name: SuperheatMetal{@recharge4}
SuperheatMetal{@recharge4}.description: Dispater targets a metal object he can see within 90 feet of him. The metal glows white-hot, burning all that touches it. If the object was held by a creature, the creature must succeed on a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw to drop the object or take 45 (10d8) fire damage. If the object is attached to a creature, or they couldn't feasibly drop it, they automatically fail the save. The object returns to room temperature at the end of Dispater's turn.

NailSpray(2/Day).name: NailSpray(2/Day)
NailSpray(2/Day).description: Dispater conjures a storm of iron nails and launches them forward in a 90-foot-long, 5-foot-wide line. All creatures within the line must make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw, taking 40 (16d4) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Nails launched from this ability stick into soft surfaces or fall to the ground after the attack finishes.

Avoidance.name: Avoidance
Avoidance.description: If the displacer fiend is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

Displacement.name: Displacement
Displacement.description: The displacer fiend projects a magical illusion that makes it appear to be standing near its actual location, causing attack rolls against it to have disadvantage. If it is hit by an attack, this trait is disrupted until the end of its next turn. This trait is also disrupted while the displacer fiend is incapacitated or has a speed of 0.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The displacer fiend makes three Tentacle attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with a Bite attack.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (3d12 + 4) piercing damage, and the target's Dexterity score is reduced by 2 (1d4). The target is killed if this reduces its Dexterity to 0. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.

HiveMind.name: Hive Mind
HiveMind.description: All fiendish formians within 1 mile of Ekengarik can telepathically communicate with each other and Ekengarik.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Ekengarik regenerates 10 hit points at the start of her turn, unless she took radiant damage in the last round.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Ekengarik makes three Bite attacks. She can replace one of the attacks with an Acid Spray (if available) attack or a use of Spellcasting.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage and the target must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target's Strength score is reduced by 2 (1d4). The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.

AcidSpray{@recharge5}.name: AcidSpray{@recharge5}
AcidSpray{@recharge5}.description: Ekengarik spits acid at one creature within 60 feet of her, or two creatures within 60 feet of her and 5 feet of each other. Targets must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 33 (6d10) acid damage on a failed saving throw, or half as much on a successful one.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the Eriflamme fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The Eriflamme has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The Eriflamme makes four Claw attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with a Bite attack.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 18 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d6 + 10) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 18 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 24 (4d6 + 10) piercing damage plus 33 (6d10) fire damage.

Reform.name: Reform
Reform.description: All the Eriflamme's fire elementals vanish and the Eriflamme reappears in one of their spaces. The Eriflamme's hit points are equivalent to the combined hit points of the fire elementals.

HiveMind.name: Hive Mind
HiveMind.description: All fiendish formians within 1 mile of Ekengarik can telepathically communicate with each other and Ekengarik.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The fiendish formian makes two Claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage and the target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target's Strength score is reduced by 1. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.

FearAura.name: Fear Aura
FearAura.description: When a creature starts their turn within 120 feet of Fierna, they must succeed on a DC 22 Wisdom saving throw or have the frightened condition until they leave the aura. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to this effect for 1 hour.

FiendishRegeneration.name: Fiendish Regeneration
FiendishRegeneration.description: Fierna regains 20 hit points at the start of her turn. If she takes radiant damage this trait doesn't function at the start of her next turn. Fierna dies only if she starts her turn with 0 hit points and is unable to regenerate.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Fierna fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Fierna has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

PrincessofHellfire.name: Princess of Hellfire
PrincessofHellfire.description: Fire conjured by Fierna becomes Hellfire. It ignores resistances and immunities to fire damage, deals double damage to creatures vulnerable to fire or necrotic damage, can't be extinguished through any means, and is capable of melting stone or igniting inflammable objects.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Fierna makes three attacks using Flame Blade, Mote of Flame, or a combination of the two.

FlameBlade.name: FlameBlade
FlameBlade.description: ms 20 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (4d6 + 9) fire damage.

MoteofFlame.name: MoteofFlame
MoteofFlame.description: Fierna targets a creature she can see within 90 feet of her. The target must make a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (3d8 + 9) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

FreedomofMovement.name: Freedom of Movement
FreedomofMovement.description: The kraken ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be restrained. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or grapples.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the kraken fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The kraken deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The kraken makes two attacks using its Tentacle, Fling, or a combination of the two.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (3d6 + 8) piercing damage and 7 (2d6) fire damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature grappled by the kraken, the creature is swallowed and the grapple ends. While swallowed, a creature has the blinded and restrained conditions, has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the kraken, and takes 42 (12d6) fire damage at the start of the kraken's turns. If the kraken takes 50 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, it must succeed on a DC 23 Constitution saving throw or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall into a space within 10 feet of the kraken and now have the prone condition. If the kraken dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting with the prone condition.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d4 + 8) fire damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 16). While grappled, the target also has the restrained condition. Any target that starts its turn grappled by the kraken takes 5 (2d4) fire damage. The kraken has five tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

Fling.name: Fling
Fling.description: One Large or smaller object or creature grappled by the kraken is thrown up to 60 feet in a random direction, and now has the prone condition. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at a creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked down with the prone condition.

CharmAura.name: Charm Aura
CharmAura.description: When a creature moves to be within 120 feet of Glasya, they must succeed on a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw or have the charmed condition, treating Glasya as an ally, until they leave the aura. A creature that succeeds the saving throw is immune to this effect for 1 hour. Whenever a charmed creature takes damage, they may repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success.

DominatingPresence.name: Dominating Presence
DominatingPresence.description: Glasya deals an additional 13 (2d12) psychic damage when attacking a charmed creature, and her attacks don't break charms.

FiendishRegeneration.name: Fiendish Regeneration
FiendishRegeneration.description: Glasya regains 20 hit points at the start of her turn. If she takes radiant damage this trait doesn't function at the start of her next turn. Glasya dies only if she starts her turn with 0 hit points and is unable to regenerate. If Glasya is killed, her body slowly regenerates, returning to life 9 (2d8) weeks later.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Glasya fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Glasya has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Glasya makes four attacks using Scourge of Shadow, Necrotic Grasp, or a combination of the two. She can replace one of the attacks with Mesmerizing Gaze.

ScourgeofShadow.name: ScourgeofShadow
ScourgeofShadow.description: mw 20 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (3d4 + 12) slashing damage, plus 5 (2d4) necrotic damage. This attack scores a critical on a roll of 18, 19, or 20.

NecroticGrasp.name: NecroticGrasp
NecroticGrasp.description: Glasya summons necrotic hands to grope and claw at a creature she can see within 90 feet of her. The target must make a DC 25 Constitution saving throw, taking 20 (2d10 + 9) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

MesmerizingGaze.name: MesmerizingGaze
MesmerizingGaze.description: Glasya focuses her gaze in a 60-foot cone in front of her. Each creature of her choice within the cone must make a DC 23 Charisma saving throw or have the charmed condition until the end of their next turn. While charmed, creatures automatically fail saving throws from abilities used by Glasya and move to be as close to her as possible.

DeathlyExclamation(1/Day).name: DeathlyExclamation(1/Day)
DeathlyExclamation(1/Day).description: Glasya targets a creature she can see within 60 feet of her. The target must make a DC 25 Constitution saving throw, taking 61 (7d8 + 30) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A Humanoid killed by this ability rises at the start of Glasya's next turn as a zombie permanently under her command.

Empath.name: Empath
Empath.description: The shadow uses telepathy to sense nearby creatures. The shadow can see a creature if that creature has thoughts and is within the range of the shadow's telepathy. The shadow can't see creatures immune to telepathy.

UndyingConnection.name: Undying Connection
UndyingConnection.description: The shadow was originally spawned from a specific devil and, if the shadow is slain, it returns to life in 10 (1d20) days within 1 mile of that devil. The shadow is killed permanently only if its progenitor devil is slain first.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The shadow makes three Claw attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with Shadows of Death (if available).

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (4d6 + 7) necrotic damage, plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

CloakofShadows.name: CloakofShadows
CloakofShadows.description: The shadow bends darkness around itself, and now has the invisible condition for 1 minute. The invisibility ends if the shadow is subjected to a Daylight spell or similar.

EmpathicLink.name: EmpathicLink
EmpathicLink.description: The shadow attempts to form a link between itself and a creature it can see. The target must make a DC 22 Intelligence saving throw, taking 26 (4d12) psychic damage on a success. On a failed save, the creature and the shadow are linked. While linked, every time the shadow is damaged, the creature takes half of that damage as psychic damage. The creature may repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, taking 26 (4d12) psychic damage on a failed save, or ending the effect on a successful one.

ShadowsofDeath{@recharge5}.name: ShadowsofDeath{@recharge5}
ShadowsofDeath{@recharge5}.description: The shadow discharges inky-black shadows in a 90-foot-radius sphere around itself. Creatures in the shadows must succeed on a DC 22 Wisdom saving throw or take 36 (8d8) necrotic damage and have the frightened condition for 1 minute. A frightened creature may repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a successful save, but taking the damage again on a failed save.

AdaptiveFangs.name: Adaptive Fangs
AdaptiveFangs.description: The halog magically alters its fangs to inflict more damage on the creatures it hits (included in the attack).

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The halog has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The halog gains advantage on attacks targeting creatures adjacent to one or more of the halog's conscious allies.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The halog makes two Bite attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (3d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) damage of a type that the target is most vulnerable to.

DarknessDweller.name: Darkness Dweller
DarknessDweller.description: Attacks made against a bezekira in bright or dim light have disadvantage.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the bezekira's darkvision.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The bezekira makes three Claw attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with a Bite attack.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage. The bezekira deals an extra 28 (8d6) fire damage when it hits a target with an attack and has advantage on the attack roll.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage, grasping the target with its mouth. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 17). The bezekira can't make a Bite attack while a creature is grappled in this way.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Jenevere has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Jenevere makes three Radiant Touch attacks.

RadiantTouch.name: RadiantTouch
RadiantTouch.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 33 (6d8 + 6) radiant damage.

Forgiveness(2/Day).name: Forgiveness(2/Day)
Forgiveness(2/Day).description: Jenevere selects a target within 10 feet. The target is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness. If the target is a Fiend, it must succeed on a DC 21 saving throw or have disadvantage on all attack rolls for 24 hours.

Arbiter'sTouch.name: Arbiter'sTouch
Arbiter'sTouch.description: ms 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) radiant damage.

Judgement.name: Judgement
Judgement.description: Koh Tam judges a creature within 60 feet of him. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or take 50 (10d8 + 5) radiant damage. If the target had fewer hit points than their maximum prior to this attack, the creature takes 70 (10d12 + 5) radiant damage instead.

Arbiter'sLight{@recharge4}.name: Arbiter'sLight{@recharge4}
Arbiter'sLight{@recharge4}.description: rs 9 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 70 (10d12 + 5) radiant damage, and the target has the blinded condition until the start of Koh Tam's next turn.

Empath.name: Empath
Empath.description: The shadow uses telepathy to sense nearby creatures. The shadow can see a creature if that creature has thoughts and is within the range of the shadow's telepathy. The shadow can't see creatures immune to telepathy.

UndyingConnection.name: Undying Connection
UndyingConnection.description: The shadow was originally spawned from a specific devil and, if the shadow is slain, it returns to life in 10 (1d20) days within 1 mile of that devil. The shadow is killed permanently only if its progenitor devil is slain first.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The shadow makes two Claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) necrotic damage, plus 3 (1d6) psychic damage.

CloakofShadows.name: CloakofShadows
CloakofShadows.description: The shadow bends darkness around itself, and now has the invisible condition for 1 minute. The invisibility ends if the shadow is subjected to a Daylight spell or similar.

EmpathicLink.name: EmpathicLink
EmpathicLink.description: The shadow attempts to form a link between itself and a creature it can see. The target must make a DC 16 Intelligence saving throw, taking 6 (1d12) psychic damage on a success. On a failed save, the creature and the shadow are linked. While linked, every time the shadow is damaged, the creature takes half of that damage as psychic damage.
