The creature may repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, taking 6 (1d12) psychic damage on a failed save, or ending the effect on a successful one.

ArmorofIce.name: Armor of Ice
ArmorofIce.description: Levistus is always entombed in ice. The ice provides 100 temporary hit points. While Levistus has these temporary hit points, he has vulnerability to fire damage. If Levistus starts his turn with no temporary hit points from the ice, he regains 100 temporary hit points.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede Levistus's darkvision.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Levistus fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Levistus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Sub-zero.name: Sub-zero
Sub-zero.description: Cold damage dealt by Levistus ignores resistances and immunities.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Levistus makes three Touch of Stygia or Ice Bolt attacks. He can replace one of the attacks with Blizzard (if available).

TouchofStygia.name: TouchofStygia
TouchofStygia.description: ms 15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 23 Intelligence saving throw or have the stunned condition for 1 minute. The target may repeat the saving throw at the end of its turns, ending the effect on a success. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to this effect for 1 hour.

IceBolt.name: IceBolt
IceBolt.description: rs 15 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (3d10 + 7) cold damage.

Blizzard{@recharge4}.name: Blizzard{@recharge4}
Blizzard{@recharge4}.description: Levistus chooses a point he can see within 300 feet of him. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on that point must make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw. Targets take 13 (3d8) force damage plus 13 (3d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The maelephant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Regenerative.name: Regenerative
Regenerative.description: At the start of its turn, if the maelephant has less than half its hit points, it regenerates 20 hit points. This trait doesn't function if the maelephant starts its turn with less than 1 hit point.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The maelephant makes two attacks using its Claw, Trunk, or a combination of the two.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage.

Trunk.name: Trunk
Trunk.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target has the restrained condition. While it is grappling a creature, the maelephant can't use its Trunk attack against other creatures.

NoxiousBreath{@recharge5}.name: NoxiousBreath{@recharge5}
NoxiousBreath{@recharge5}.description: The maelephant releases a cloud of noxious gas. All creatures in a 30-foot cone in front of the maelephant must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. Targets take 42 (12d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. In addition, on a failed save, the creature's Intelligence and Charisma scores become 1. The creature can't cast spells, activate magic items, understand language, or communicate in any intelligible way. The creature can, however, identify its friends, follow them, and even protect them. A feebled creature can repeat the save every minute, ending the effect on a success.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede Mammon's darkvision.

FiendishRegeneration.name: Fiendish Regeneration
FiendishRegeneration.description: Mammon regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes radiant damage this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Mammon only dies if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and is unable to regenerate.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Mammon fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Mammon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Mammon uses Fearful Gaze, then makes four attacks using Tail Swipe, Constrict, or a combination of the two.

TailSwipe.name: TailSwipe
TailSwipe.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 31 (4d10 + 9) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 21). While grappled, the creature also has the restrained condition, and Mammon can't make Tail Swipe attacks.

FearfulGaze.name: FearfulGaze
FearfulGaze.description: Mammon focuses his gaze in a 90-foot cone in front of him. Each creature of his choice within the cone must make a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw, taking 19 (3d12) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures that fail the save have the frightened condition until the end of their next turn.

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description: Mammon tightens his grip around a creature he has grappled. The target takes 35 (4d12 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

GoldenGaze{@recharge}.name: GoldenGaze{@recharge}
GoldenGaze{@recharge}.description: Mammon attempts to turn one creature he can see within 60 feet of him into solid gold. The target must make a DC 23 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target's flesh begins to harden, and it has the restrained condition. A restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of each turn. If it successfully saves three times, the effect ends. If it fails three times, it turns to gold and now has the petrified condition. Successes and failures don't need to be consecutive.

AcidicAttacks.name: Acidic Attacks
AcidicAttacks.description: If a creature takes acid damage from the miasmorne and that creature is wearing nonmagical metal armor, that armor is destroyed.

AcidicHide.name: Acidic Hide
AcidicHide.description: After a nonmagical metal weapon hits the miasmorne that weapon melts and is destroyed. Likewise, nonmagical metal ammunition that hits the miasmorne is destroyed.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The miasmorne makes three attacks using Bite, Flechette or a combination of the two.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 18). The miasmorne can't make Bite attacks while a creature is grappled in this way.

Flechette.name: Flechette
Flechette.description: rw 11 to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) acid damage.

FlechetteSpray{@recharge5}.name: FlechetteSpray{@recharge5}
FlechetteSpray{@recharge5}.description: The miasmorne launches flechettes from its fins in a 90-foot cone in front of it. All creatures in the cone must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

AcidicSecretion(1/Day).name: AcidicSecretion(1/Day)
AcidicSecretion(1/Day).description: The miasmorne secretes an acidic solution, then sprays it around itself. All creatures in a 20-foot-radius sphere, centered on the miasmorne, must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw. Targets take 26 (4d12) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. All nonmagical metals within the radius that aren't being carried, as well as nonmagical metal items carried or worn by creatures that failed the save, are destroyed.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Stomp.name: Stomp
Stomp.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d12 + 3) force damage.

RealizeNightmares{@recharge4}.name: RealizeNightmares{@recharge4}
RealizeNightmares{@recharge4}.description: The oneirovore manipulates the perception of nearby creatures, sending them into a panic. Creatures of the oneirovore's choice that it can see within 60 feet must make a DC 19 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the creature has the charmed condition, their vision distorted such that they view their allies as creatures of pure fear and hatred. While charmed, a creature will use their actions to attack their allies with intent to kill. A charmed creature may repeat the saving throw at the end of each turn, ending the effect on a success.

WarningCry(1/Day).name: WarningCry(1/Day)
WarningCry(1/Day).description: The oneirovore lets out an earsplitting shriek, calling for infernal reinforcements. Creatures that are not Fiends that are within 120 feet of the oneirovore must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw, taking 55 (10d10) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Any lesser devils within a 1-mile-radius, centered on the oneirovore, are required by contract to come to its aid upon hearing its Warning Cry. Higher ranking devils may investigate if they desire, but the call holds no magical sway over them.

AuraofTorment.name: Aura of Torment
AuraofTorment.description: Any creature hostile to the excruciarch that starts its turn within 20 feet of the excruciarch takes 10 (4d4) slashing damage, unless the excruciarch is incapacitated.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the excruciarch's darkvision.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The excruciarch has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Sadism.name: Sadism
Sadism.description: The excruciarch gains a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls for each creature it damaged on its previous turn.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The excruciarch makes two Scourge attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with Storm of Steel (if available).

Scourge.name: Scourge
Scourge.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

StormofSteel{@recharge4}.name: StormofSteel{@recharge4}
StormofSteel{@recharge4}.description: The excruciarch swings its scourge wildly around itself. All creatures within 15 feet of the excruciarch must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. Targets take 31 (6d8 + 4) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

AuraofProtection.name: Aura of Protection
AuraofProtection.description: Ramius and any ally that starts their turn within 30 feet of him have a +4 bonus to all saving throws and resistance to nonmagical damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Ramius makes two Longsword attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) slashing damage or 11 (1d10 + 6) if wielded in two hands, plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage. If the target is an evil creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Charisma saving throw or take an additional 13 (3d8) radiant damage.

DivineWave{@recharge}.name: DivineWave{@recharge}
DivineWave{@recharge}.description: Ramius strikes the ground and causes holy energy to radiate outwards. Each creature of his choice within 30 feet of him must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. Targets take 21 (6d6) thunder damage plus 21 (6d6) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures that fail the save are knocked down (have the prone condition).

ContractuallyObligated.name: Contractually Obligated
ContractuallyObligated.description: Rimmon has advantage to hit creatures under an infernal contract and when he hits such creatures he delivers an additional 9 (2d8) damage of a type the target is most vulnerable to. A creature bound under an infernal contract also makes all saving throws against effects originating from Rimmon with disadvantage.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede Rimmon's darkvision.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Rimmon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Rimmon makes four Sharpened Tongue or Wordplay attacks.

SharpenedTongue.name: SharpenedTongue
SharpenedTongue.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (3d4 + 4) slashing damage.

Wordplay.name: Wordplay
Wordplay.description: rs 14 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 35 (6d8 + 8) psychic damage.

ConnectedClauses(1/Day).name: ConnectedClauses(1/Day)
ConnectedClauses(1/Day).description: Rimmon emits a burst of energy that arcs towards a creature he can see within 150 feet of him. Three bolts then leap from that target to as many as three other targets, each of which must be within 30 feet of the first target. A target must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw, taking 63 (14d8) damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The damage type inflicted is of a type the first target is most vulnerable to.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: If the roth moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

Merged.name: Merged
Merged.description: After using the Burrow ability, if the shredwing is merged with another creature, any damage dealt to the shredwing is split evenly between it and the merged creature.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The shredwing makes three Talon attacks.

Talon.name: Talon
Talon.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

Burrow{@recharge5}.name: Burrow{@recharge5}
Burrow{@recharge5}.description: On a hit, the creature takes an additional 32 (5d12) slashing damage as the wings merge with it. While merged, the creature moves with the shredwing, takes 19 (3d12) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turn, and has the grappled condition. The shredwing can unmerge at any time, leaving the creature and dropping it if airborne. The only other way to end the merge is to kill the shredwing.

Assassinate.name: Assassinate
Assassinate.description: During its first turn, the Slayer has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the Slayer scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the Slayer's darkvision.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The Slayer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The Slayer makes four Claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage. The Slayer deals an extra 14 (4d6) slashing damage when it has advantage on the attack roll and hits the target.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

StygianWasting.name: Stygian Wasting
StygianWasting.description: Creatures afflicted with this disease are incapable of regaining hit points in any way until the disease is cured. Additionally, as their flesh starts to rot, a creature with this disease takes 36 (8d8) necrotic damage after each long rest they finish.

StyxDweller.name: Styx Dweller
StyxDweller.description: The dragon is immune to all negative effects from the River Styx.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks using its Bite, Tail, or a combination of the two. It can replace one of the attacks with Constrict.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (2d10 + 8) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage, and the target must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target contracts Stygian Wasting.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 22). The dragon can't make a Tail attack while a creature is grappled in this way.

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description: The dragon tightens its grip on a creature grappled by its tail. The creature takes 27 (3d12 + 8) bludgeoning damage, has the restrained condition until the start of the dragon's next turn, and must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target contracts Stygian Wasting.

FrightfulPresence.name: FrightfulPresence
FrightfulPresence.description: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or have the frightened condition for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

StygianBreath{@recharge5}.name: StygianBreath{@recharge5}
StygianBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales poisonous Styx water in a 60-foot-long, 10-foot-wide line. Each creature in that line must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. Creatures that fail the save contract Stygian Wasting.

GnomeCunning.name: Gnome Cunning
GnomeCunning.description: Tiax has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Tiax wears a Ring of Resistance that grants him resistance to radiant damage.

TouchofDecay.name: TouchofDecay
TouchofDecay.description: ms 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 37 (6d10 + 4) necrotic damage.

UnholyFirebolt.name: UnholyFirebolt
UnholyFirebolt.description: Tiax causes unholy fire to flare up in a creature's space within 60 feet of him. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 18 (4d8) necrotic damage plus 18 (4d8) poison damage.

Empath.name: Empath
Empath.description: The shadow uses telepathy to sense nearby creatures. The shadow can see a creature if that creature has thoughts and is within the range of the shadow's telepathy. The shadow can't see creatures immune to telepathy.

UndyingConnection.name: Undying Connection
UndyingConnection.description: The shadow was originally spawned from a specific devil and, if the shadow is slain, it returns to life in 10 (1d20) days within 1 mile of that devil. The shadow is killed permanently only if its progenitor devil is slain first.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The shadow makes three Claw attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with Shadows of Death (if available).

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) necrotic damage, plus 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

CloakofShadows.name: CloakofShadows
CloakofShadows.description: The shadow bends darkness around itself, and now has the invisible condition for 1 minute. The invisibility ends if the shadow is subjected to a Daylight spell or similar.

EmpathicLink.name: EmpathicLink
EmpathicLink.description: The shadow attempts to form a link between itself and a creature it can see. The target must make a DC 19 Intelligence saving throw, taking 13 (2d12) psychic damage on a success. On a failed save, the creature and the shadow are linked. While linked, every time the shadow is damaged, the creature takes half of that damage as psychic damage. The creature may repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, taking 13 (2d12) psychic damage on a failed save, or ending the effect on a successful one.

ShadowsofDeath{@recharge}.name: ShadowsofDeath{@recharge}
ShadowsofDeath{@recharge}.description: The shadow discharges inky-black shadows in a 90-foot-radius sphere around itself. Creatures in the shadows must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or take 27 (6d8) necrotic damage and have the frightened condition for 1 minute. A frightened creature may repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a successful save, but taking the damage again on a failed save.

FearAura.name: Fear Aura
FearAura.description: Any hostile creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the vorvolaka must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or have frightened condition until the start of the creature's next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, they're immune to the vorvolaka's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours. This ability does not function if the vorvolaka is unconscious.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The vorvolaka has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The vorvolaka regains 15 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point. If the vorvolaka takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vorvolaka's next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The vorvolaka makes two Talon attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with Rend Armor (if available).

Talon.name: Talon
Talon.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) necrotic damage.

RendArmor{@recharge4}.name: RendArmor{@recharge4}
RendArmor{@recharge4}.description: The vorvolaka makes a Talon attack against a creature. On a hit, the creature's AC is reduced by 2 for 1 minute. Creatures not wearing armor are immune to this effect, and the total reduction can't bring a creature below an AC of 10.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Waeloquay has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Waeloquay fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

WaterForm.name: Water Form
WaterForm.description: Waeloquay can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Waeloquay makes three Slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 26 (4d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

Whelm{@recharge4}.name: Whelm{@recharge4}
Whelm{@recharge4}.description: Each creature in Waeloquay's space must make a DC 22 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage. If it is Large or smaller, it also has the grappled condition (escape 20). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and unable to breathe, unless it can breathe water. If the save is successful, the target is pushed out of Waeloquay's space. Waeloquay can grapple one Large creature or up to four Medium or smaller creatures at one time. At the start of each of Waeloquay's turns, each target grappled by it takes 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage. A creature within 5 feet of Waeloquay can pull a creature or object out of it by taking an action to make a DC 22 Strength check and succeeding.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the war devil's darkvision.

FearAura.name: Fear Aura
FearAura.description: Any hostile creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the war devil must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or have the frightened condition until the start of the creature's next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the war devil's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours. This ability doesn't function if the war devil is unconscious.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The war devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The war devil makes two attacks using its Cold- Iron Ranseur, Claws, or a combination of the two.

Cold-IronRanseur.name: Cold-IronRanseur
Cold-IronRanseur.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (3d10 + 7) force damage plus 14 (4d6) cold damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 20). While a creature is grappled, the war devil can't make Claws attacks.

ContractuallyObligated.name: Contractually Obligated
ContractuallyObligated.description: Zagum has advantage to hit creatures under an infernal contract and when he hits such creatures he delivers an additional 9 (2d8) damage of a type the target is most vulnerable to. A creature bound under an infernal contract also makes all saving throws against effects originating from Zagum with disadvantage.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede Zagum's darkvision.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Zagum has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Zagum makes three attacks with Disarming Tongue or Oration.

DisarmingTongue.name: DisarmingTongue
DisarmingTongue.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (3d4 + 3) slashing damage. A target hit by this attack has vulnerability to psychic damage until the start of their next turn.

Oration.name: Oration
Oration.description: rs 14 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 35 (6d8 + 8) psychic damage.

LegalJargon{@recharge4}.name: LegalJargon{@recharge4}
LegalJargon{@recharge4}.description: Zagum chooses a point he can see within 90 feet of him. All creatures within a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 22 Wisdom saving throw. Creatures that fail the save are confused for up to 1 minute and must roll a d10 at the start of each of their turns.

Devil'sSight.name: Devil's Sight
Devil'sSight.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede Zariel's darkvision.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: Zariel's weapon attacks are magical. When she hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 36 (8d8) fire damage (included in the weapon attacks below).

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Zariel fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Zariel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Zariel regains 20 hit points at the start of her turn. If she takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of her next turn. Zariel dies only if she starts her turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Zariel attacks twice with her longsword or with her javelins. She can substitute Horrid Touch for one of these attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) slashing damage plus 36 (8d8) fire damage, or 19 (2d10 + 8) slashing damage plus 36 (8d8) fire damage if used with two hands.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 16 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d6 + 8) piercing damage plus 36 (8d8) fire damage.

HorridTouch{@recharge5}.name: HorridTouch{@recharge5}
HorridTouch{@recharge5}.description: Zariel touches one creature within 10 feet of her. The target must succeed on a DC 26 Constitution saving throw or take 44 (8d10) necrotic damage and be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the target is also blinded and deafened. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: Zariel magically teleports, along with any equipment she is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space she can see.

Battlemage.name: Battlemage
Battlemage.description: Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature doesn't impose disadvantage on Zythan's ranged attack rolls.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Zythan has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Zythan makes three Dagger or Arcane Burst attacks.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

ArcaneBurst.name: ArcaneBurst
ArcaneBurst.description: rs 10 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 27 (4d10 + 5) radiant damage.

SpiritFissure{@recharge4}.name: SpiritFissure{@recharge4}
SpiritFissure{@recharge4}.description: Zythan causes a disruption in arcane energies in a 300-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 65 (10d12) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: Baba Lysaga can use an action to polymorph into a swarm of insects (flies), or back into her true form. While in swarm form, she has a walking speed of 5 feet and a flying speed of 30 feet. Anything she is wearing transforms with her, but nothing she is carrying does.

BlessingofMotherNight.name: Blessing of Mother Night
BlessingofMotherNight.description: Baba Lysaga is shielded against divination magic, as though protected by a nondetection spell.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Baba Lysaga makes three attacks with her quarterstaff.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands.

SummonSwarmsofInsects(RechargesafteraSho.name: SummonSwarmsofInsects(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Summon Swarms of Insects (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

SummonSwarmsofInsects(RechargesafteraSho.description: Baba Lysaga summons 1d4 swarms of insects. A summoned swarm appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of Baba Lysaga and acts as her ally. It remains until it dies or until Baba Lysaga dismisses it as an action.

ConstructedNature.name: Constructed Nature
ConstructedNature.description: An animated object doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

AntimagicSusceptibility.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
AntimagicSusceptibility.description: The hut is incapacitated while the magic gem that animates it is in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the hut must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The hut deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hut makes three attacks with its roots. It can replace one of these attacks with a rock attack.

Root.name: Root
Root.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 60 ft., one target. on hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 12 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

Claws(RequiresAlterSelf).name: Claws(RequiresAlterSelf)
Claws(RequiresAlterSelf).description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage. This attack is magical.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

ConstructedNature.name: Constructed Nature
ConstructedNature.description: An animated object doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

AntimagicSusceptibility.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
AntimagicSusceptibility.description: The broom is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the broom must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the broom remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal broom.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The broom makes two melee attacks.

Broomstick.name: Broomstick
Broomstick.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: In addition to her magic armor and weapons, Ezmerelda has two potion of greater healing||potions of greater healing, six holy water (flask)|phb|vials of holy water, and three wooden stakes.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Ezmerelda makes three attacks: two with her +1 rapier and one with her +1 handaxe or her silvered shortsword.

Rapier+1.name: Rapier+1
Rapier+1.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

Handaxe+1.name: Handaxe+1
Handaxe+1.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

SilveredShortsword.name: SilveredShortsword
SilveredShortsword.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

Curse(RechargesafteraLongRest).name: Curse(RechargesafteraLongRest)
Curse(RechargesafteraLongRest).description: Ezmerelda targets one creature that she can see within 30 feet of her. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be cursed. While cursed, the target has vulnerability to one type of damage of Ezmerelda's choice. The curse lasts until ended with a greater restoration spell, a remove curse spell, or similar magic. When the curse ends, Ezmerelda takes 3d6 psychic damage.

EvilEye(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).name: EvilEye(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Evil Eye (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

EvilEye(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).description: Ezmerelda targets one creature that she can see within 10 feet of her and casts one of the following spells on the target (save DC 14), requiring neither somatic nor material components to do so: animal friendship, charm person, or hold person. If the target succeeds on the initial saving throw, Ezmerelda is blinded until the end of her next turn. Once a target succeeds on a saving throw against this effect, it is immune to the Evil Eye power of all Vistani for 24 hours.

ConstructedNature.name: Constructed Nature
ConstructedNature.description: An animated object doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

AntimagicSusceptibility.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
AntimagicSusceptibility.description: The portrait is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the portrait must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or become unconscious for 1 minute.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the figure in the portrait remains motionless, the portrait is indistinguishable from a normal painting.

Brute.name: Brute
Brute.description: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Izek hits with it (included in the attack).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Izek makes two attacks with his battleaxe.

Battleaxe.name: Battleaxe
Battleaxe.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4) when used with two hands.

HurlFlame.name: HurlFlame
HurlFlame.description: rs 5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (3d6) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it catches fire.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

Curse(RechargesafteraLongRest).name: Curse(RechargesafteraLongRest)
Curse(RechargesafteraLongRest).description: Madam Eva targets one creature that she can see within 30 feet of her. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be cursed. While cursed, the target is blinded and deafened. The curse lasts until ended with a greater restoration spell, a remove curse spell, or similar magic. When the curse ends, Madam Eva takes 5d6 psychic damage.

EvilEye(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).name: EvilEye(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Evil Eye (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

EvilEye(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).description: Madam Eva targets one creature that she can see within 10 feet of her and casts one of the following spells on the target (save DC 17), requiring neither somatic nor material components to do so: animal friendship, charm person, or hold person. If the target succeeds on the initial saving throw, Madam Eva is blinded until the end of her next turn. Once a target succeeds on a saving throw against this effect, it is immune to the Evil Eye power of all Vistani for 24 hours.

ExtraordinaryFeature.name: Extraordinary Feature
ExtraordinaryFeature.description: The mongrelfolk has one of the following extraordinary features, determined randomly by rolling a d20 or chosen by the DM:

Mimicry.name: Mimicry
Mimicry.description: The mongrelfolk can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 12 Wisdom (Insight) check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The mongrelfolk makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claw or dagger.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

EtherealSight.name: Ethereal Sight
EtherealSight.description: The phantom warrior can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The phantom warrior can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

SpectralArmorandShield.name: Spectral Armor and Shield
SpectralArmorandShield.description: The phantom warrior's AC accounts for its spectral armor and shield.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The phantom warrior makes two attacks with its spectral longsword.

SpectralLongsword.name: SpectralLongsword
SpectralLongsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) force damage.

Etherealness.name: Etherealness
Etherealness.description: The phantom warrior enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

Ambusher.name: Ambusher
Ambusher.description: During the first round of combat, Pidlwick II has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't had a turn yet.

Club.name: Club
Club.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

Dart.name: Dart
Dart.description: rw 4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

DeathlyChoir.name: Deathly Choir
DeathlyChoir.description: Any creature within 10 feet of Rahadin that isn't protected by a mind blank spell hears in its mind the screams of the thousands of people Rahadin has killed. As a bonus action, Rahadin can force all creatures that can hear the screams to make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. Each creature takes 16 (3d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Rahadin has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

MaskoftheWild.name: Mask of the Wild
MaskoftheWild.description: Rahadin can attempt to hide even when he is only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Rahadin attacks three times with his scimitar, or twice with his poisoned darts.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d6 + 6) slashing damage.

PoisonedDart.name: PoisonedDart
PoisonedDart.description: rw 10 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d4 + 6) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) poison damage.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: In addition to his sword cane, Rictavio wears a hat of disguise and a ring of mind shielding, and he carries a spell scroll (5th level)||spell scroll of raise dead.

UndeadSlayer.name: Undead Slayer
UndeadSlayer.description: When Rictavio hits an undead with a weapon attack, the undead takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage of the weapon's type.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Rictavio makes two attacks with his sword cane.

SwordCane.name: SwordCane
SwordCane.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage (wooden cane) or piercing damage (silvered sword).

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: If Strahd isn't in running water or sunlight, he can use his action to polymorph into a Tiny bat, a Medium wolf, or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into his true form.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Strahd fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MistyEscape.name: Misty Escape
MistyEscape.description: When Strahd drops to 0 hit points outside his coffin, he transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling unconscious, provided that he isn't in running water or sunlight. If he can't transform, he is destroyed.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Strahd regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point and isn't in running water or sunlight. If he takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: Strahd can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without having to make an ability check.

Multiattack(VampireFormOnly).name: Multiattack(VampireFormOnly)
Multiattack(VampireFormOnly).description: Strahd makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

UnarmedStrike(VampireorWolfFormOnly).name: UnarmedStrike(VampireorWolfFormOnly)

value.value: Unarmed Strike (Vampire or Wolf Form Only)

UnarmedStrike(VampireorWolfFormOnly).description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, plus 14 (4d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, Strahd can grapple it (escape DC 18) instead of dealing the slashing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by Strahd, incapacitated, or restrained. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and Strahd regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0. A humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a vampire spawn under Strahd's control.

Charm.name: Charm
Charm.description: Strahd targets one humanoid he can see within 30 feet of him. If the target can see Strahd, the target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be charmed. The charmed target regards Strahd as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. The target isn't under Strahd's control, but it takes Strahd's requests and actions in the most favorable way and lets Strahd bite it.

ChildrenoftheNight(1/Day).name: ChildrenoftheNight(1/Day)
ChildrenoftheNight(1/Day).description: Strahd magically calls 2d4 swarm of bats||swarms of bats or swarm of rats||swarms of rats, provided that the sun isn't up. While outdoors, Strahd can call 3d6 wolf||wolves instead. The called creatures arrive in 1d4 rounds, acting as allies of Strahd and obeying his spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until Strahd dies, or until he dismisses them as a bonus action.

LoathsomeLimbs.name: Loathsome Limbs
LoathsomeLimbs.description: Whenever the zombie takes at least 5 bludgeoning or slashing damage at one time, roll a d20 to determine what else happens to it:

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The zombie makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

ConstructedNature.name: Constructed Nature
ConstructedNature.description: An animated object doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

AntimagicSusceptibility.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
AntimagicSusceptibility.description: The armor is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the armor must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: While the armor remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal suit of armor.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The armor makes two melee attacks or uses Shocking Bolt twice.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) lightning damage.

ShockingBolt.name: ShockingBolt
ShockingBolt.description: rs 4 to hit (with advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal), range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (3d6) lightning damage.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Vladimir regains 10 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Vladimir's body is destroyed only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: When Vladimir's body is destroyed, his soul lingers. After 24 hours, the soul inhabits and animates another corpse on the same plane of existence and regains all its hit points. While the soul is bodiless, a wish spell can be used to force the soul to go to the afterlife and not return.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Vladimir wields a +2 greatsword with a hilt sculpted to resemble silver dragon wings and a pommel shaped like a silver dragon's head clutching a black opal between its teeth.

TurnImmunity.name: Turn Immunity
TurnImmunity.description: Vladimir is immune to effects that turn undead.

VengefulTracker.name: Vengeful Tracker
VengefulTracker.description: Vladimir knows the distance to and direction of Strahd, even if Strahd and Vladimir are on different planes of existence. If Strahd is destroyed, Vladimir knows.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Vladimir makes two fist attacks or two attacks with his +2 Greatsword.

Fist.name: Fist
Fist.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. Strahd, the target of Vladimir's sworn vengeance, takes an extra 14 (4d6) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage, Vladimir can grapple the target (escape DC 14) provided the target is Large or smaller.

Greatsword+2.name: Greatsword+2
Greatsword+2.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (4d6 + 6) slashing damage. Against Strahd, Vladimir deals an extra 14 (4d6) slashing damage with this weapon.

VengefulGlare.name: VengefulGlare
VengefulGlare.description: Vladimir can target Strahd within 30 feet provided he can see Strahd. Strahd must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, Strahd is paralyzed until Vladimir deals damage to him, or until the end of Vladimir's next turn. When the paralysis ends, Strahd is frightened of Vladimir for 1 minute. Strahd can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of his turns, with disadvantage if he can see Vladimir, ending the frightened condition on itself on a success.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The aboleth can breathe air and water.

MucousCloud.name: Mucous Cloud
MucousCloud.description: While underwater, the aboleth is surrounded by a cloud of sticky mucus. A creature that touches the aboleth or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be restrained until the end of the aboleth's next turn.

ProbingTelepathy.name: Probing Telepathy
ProbingTelepathy.description: If a creature the aboleth can see communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature's greatest desires.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The aboleth makes two Tentacle attacks.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) psychic damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

DivinelyBlessed.name: Divinely Blessed
DivinelyBlessed.description: Alyxian can't be surprised and can't be changed into another form against his will.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If Alyxian fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Alyxian makes two Spear attacks.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage when used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 9 (2d8) radiant damage.

ForceWave(1/Day).name: ForceWave(1/Day)
ForceWave(1/Day).description: Alyxian strikes the ground, creating a burst of energy that ripples outward. Each creature he chooses within a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on himself must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or take 35 (10d6) force damage and be knocked prone. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone.

ApotheonicRejuvenation.name: Apotheonic Rejuvenation
ApotheonicRejuvenation.description: When Alyxian the Callous drops to 0 hit points, his body dies and sheds its wings, and he rises to his feet in his third form, Alyxian the Dispossessed. His initiative count doesn't change.

DivinelyBlessed.name: Divinely Blessed
DivinelyBlessed.description: Alyxian can't be surprised and can't be changed into another form against his will.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If Alyxian fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Alyxian makes two Radiant Spear attacks. He can replace one of these attacks with Blinding Teleport.

RadiantSpear.name: RadiantSpear
RadiantSpear.description: mw,rw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) radiant damage.

BlindingTeleport.name: BlindingTeleport
BlindingTeleport.description: Alyxian teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, to an unoccupied space he can see within 120 feet of himself. Each creature within 5 feet of his new location must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn.

HeavenlyDestruction(1/Day).name: HeavenlyDestruction(1/Day)
HeavenlyDestruction(1/Day).description: Alyxian releases divine energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature of his choice in that area must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the creature takes 31 (7d8) radiant damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone.

DivinelyBlessed.name: Divinely Blessed
DivinelyBlessed.description: Alyxian can't be surprised and can't be changed into another form against his will.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If Alyxian fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Alyxian carries a magic dagger that he uses to make Stoneheart Dagger attacks. In the hands of creatures other than Alyxian, the dagger is nonmagical and has no special properties.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Alyxian makes two Spear attacks.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage when used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 9 (2d8) radiant damage.

StoneheartDagger.name: StoneheartDagger
StoneheartDagger.description: mw,rw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (3d4 + 4) force damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or become petrified as the dagger lodges itself in the target's body. While the dagger is lodged in the target, magic can't end the petrified condition on it and Alyxian can't make Stoneheart Dagger attacks. A creature within reach of the petrified target can use an action to try to remove the dagger, doing so with a successful DC 17 Strength check.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ta.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The golem makes two slam attacks.

RuidiumDart.name: RuidiumDart
RuidiumDart.description: The golem can conjure a magic dart made of ruidium and hurl it at another creature it can see within 120 feet of itself. The dart strikes the target unerringly and vanishes on contact. The target must make a DC 17 Charisma saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target takes 24 (7d6) psychic damage and gains 1 level of exhaustion. In addition, if the target is not already suffering from ruidium corruption, it becomes corrupted when it fails the saving throw. On a successful saving throw, the target takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

Slow{@recharge5}.name: Slow{@recharge5}
Slow{@recharge5}.description: The golem targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

ApotheonicRejuvenation.name: Apotheonic Rejuvenation
ApotheonicRejuvenation.description: When Alyxian drops to 0 hit points, his body dies and cracks open like a cocoon. Alyxian instantly emerges from the cocoon in his second form, Alyxian the Callous, in the space where his previous form died. His initiative count doesn't change.

DivinelyBlessed.name: Divinely Blessed
DivinelyBlessed.description: Alyxian can't be surprised and can't be changed into another form against his will.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If Alyxian fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Alyxian makes two Grasping Hand attacks.

GraspingHand.name: GraspingHand
GraspingHand.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) force damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 15). Alyxian has six hands, each of which can grapple one target.

VoidEyes{@recharge5}.name: VoidEyes{@recharge5}
VoidEyes{@recharge5}.description: Alyxian targets up to two creatures he can see within 120 feet of himself. Each target must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

KeenSightandSmell.name: Keen Sight and Smell
KeenSightandSmell.description: The statue has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The statue has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the statue's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The statue makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

Beak.name: Beak
Beak.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Talons.name: Talons
Talons.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: Ayo can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Ayo makes two Harpoon or Longbow attacks.

Harpoon.name: Harpoon
Harpoon.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: Ayo can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Ayo makes three Harpoon or Longbow attacks.

Harpoon.name: Harpoon
Harpoon.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: Ayo can breathe air and water.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Ayo wields a ruidium harpoon (see appendix B). If Ayo rolls a 1 on an attack roll made with the harpoon, she must succeed on a DC 20 Charisma saving throw or gain 1 level of exhaustion.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Ayo makes three Harpoon or Longbow attacks.

RuidiumHarpoon.name: RuidiumHarpoon
RuidiumHarpoon.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 8 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) piercing damage.

PsychicMaelstrom.name: Psychic Maelstrom
PsychicMaelstrom.description: Any creature that starts its turn within 15 feet of the shark must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or take 11 (2d10) psychic damage.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The shark regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the shark takes radiant damage or suffers a critical hit, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The shark dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

WaterBreathing.name: Water Breathing
WaterBreathing.description: The shark can breathe only underwater.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 10 to hit (with advantage if the target is a creature missing any hit points), reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Charisma saving throw or gain 1 level of exhaustion.

TelepathicBond.name: Telepathic Bond
TelepathicBond.description: The flame ignores the range restriction on its telepathy when communicating with a creature it has charmed. The two don't even need to be on the same plane of existence.

Flame.name: Flame
Flame.description: The flame sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. If it leaves the hall or is reduced to 0 hit points, it is destroyed and can't re-form for 24 hours.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) fire damage.

Charm.name: Charm
Charm.description: One humanoid the flame can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed for 1 day. The charmed target obeys the flame's verbal or telepathic commands. If the target suffers any harm or receives a suicidal command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. If the target successfully saves against the effect, or if the effect on it ends, the target is immune to this flame's Charm for the next 24 hours.

DrainingKiss.name: DrainingKiss
DrainingKiss.description: The flame kisses a creature charmed by it or a willing creature. The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 32 (5d10 + 5) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

PetrifyingTendrils.name: Petrifying Tendrils
PetrifyingTendrils.description: Any creature that starts its turn in the death embrace's space must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the creature is restrained. A creature restrained in this way must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming petrified on a failed saving throw or ending the effect on a successful one. The petrified condition lasts until the effect is ended by a greater restoration spell or similar magic.

Reel.name: Reel
Reel.description: At the start of each of its turns, the death embrace can pull each creature it is grappling up to 20 feet toward it (no action required).

WaterBreathing.name: Water Breathing
WaterBreathing.description: The death embrace can breathe only underwater.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The death embrace makes two Tentacle attacks.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 60 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) psychic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is also grappled (escape DC 16). The death embrace has six tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Dermot makes one Warhammer attack and one Searing Wrath attack.

Warhammer.name: Warhammer
Warhammer.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands.

SearingWrath.name: SearingWrath
SearingWrath.description: rs 5 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 9 (2d8) radiant damage, and the target is blinded until the end of its next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Dermot makes one Warhammer attack and one Searing Wrath attack.

Warhammer.name: Warhammer
Warhammer.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands.

SearingWrath.name: SearingWrath
SearingWrath.description: rs 7 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 18 (4d8) radiant damage, and the target is blinded until the end of its next turn.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Dermot wears mariner's armor and wields a ruidium warhammer (see appendix B). If Dermot rolls a 1 on an attack roll made with the warhammer, he must succeed on a DC 20 Charisma saving throw or gain 1 level of exhaustion.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Dermot makes one Ruidium Warhammer attack and one Searing Wrath attack.

RuidiumWarhammer.name: RuidiumWarhammer
RuidiumWarhammer.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands, plus 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

SearingWrath.name: SearingWrath
SearingWrath.description: rs 8 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 22 (5d8) radiant damage, and the target is blinded until the end of its next turn.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Galeokaerda has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The extollant makes two Crimson Bolt attacks.

CrimsonBolt.name: CrimsonBolt
CrimsonBolt.description: ms,rs 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) psychic damage.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Galsariad has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

DrainPotential.name: DrainPotential
DrainPotential.description: ms,rs 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one creature. on hit: 16 (3d10) necrotic damage, and Galsariad gains 5 temporary hit points.

GravityWave{@recharge5}.name: GravityWave{@recharge5}
GravityWave{@recharge5}.description: Galsariad causes a rippling wave of magical gravity to fill a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on a point he can see within 120 feet of himself. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Strength saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the creature takes 17 (5d6) force damage and is pulled up to 10 feet toward the sphere's center. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pulled.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Galsariad has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

DrainPotential.name: DrainPotential
DrainPotential.description: ms,rs 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 22 (4d10) necrotic damage, and Galsariad gains 5 temporary hit points.

GravityWave{@recharge5}.name: GravityWave{@recharge5}
GravityWave{@recharge5}.description: Galsariad causes a rippling wave of magical gravity to fill a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point he can see within 100 feet of himself. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the creature takes 35 (10d6) force damage and is pulled up to 20 feet toward the sphere's center, and is knocked prone. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pulled or knocked prone.

Deflection.name: Deflection
Deflection.description: Galsariad warps gravity around himself to magically deflect incoming attacks. While Galsariad is wearing no armor and not incapacitated, his AC includes his Intelligence modifier.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Galsariad has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Galsariad wears a ring of swimming and carries a ruidium dagger (see appendix B). If he rolls a 1 on an attack roll made with the dagger, he must succeed on a DC 20 Charisma saving throw or gain 1 level of exhaustion.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Galsariad makes one Drain Potential attack and one Ruidium Dagger attack.

DrainPotential.name: DrainPotential
DrainPotential.description: ms,rs 8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 22 (4d10) necrotic damage, and Galsariad gains 10 temporary hit points.

RuidiumDagger.name: RuidiumDagger
RuidiumDagger.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

GravityWave{@recharge5}.name: GravityWave{@recharge5}
GravityWave{@recharge5}.description: Galsariad causes a rippling wave of magical gravity to fill a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on a point he can see within 100 feet of himself. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Strength saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the creature takes 42 (12d6) force damage and is restrained for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't restrained. A restrained creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Insight makes two Arcane Shock or Dagger of the Poisoned Mind attacks.

ArcaneShock.name: ArcaneShock
ArcaneShock.description: ms,rs 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 26 (4d10 + 4) lightning damage. If the target is a creature, it can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

DaggerofthePoisonedMind.name: DaggerofthePoisonedMind
DaggerofthePoisonedMind.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

Fortitude(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest.name: Fortitude (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
Fortitude(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest.description: If damage reduces Irvan to 0 hit points, he can make a Constitution saving throw with a DC equal to 5 + the damage taken. On a successful save, Irvan drops to 1 hit point instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Irvan makes two Dagger attacks.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

Fortitude(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest.name: Fortitude (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
Fortitude(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest.description: If damage reduces Irvan to 0 hit points, he can make a Constitution saving throw with a DC equal to 5 + the damage taken. On a successful save, Irvan drops to 1 hit point instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Irvan makes two Dagger attacks.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage.

Fortitude(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest.name: Fortitude (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
Fortitude(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest.description: If damage reduces Irvan to 0 hit points, he can make a Constitution saving throw with a DC equal to 5 + the damage taken. On a successful save, Irvan drops to 1 hit point instead.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Irvan wears gloves of swimming and climbing and wields a ruidium shortsword (see appendix B). If Irvan rolls a 1 on an attack roll made with the shortsword, he must succeed on a DC 20 Charisma saving throw or gain 1 level of exhaustion.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Irvan makes one Dagger attack and two Ruidium Shortsword attacks.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage plus 17 (5d6) poison damage.

RuidiumShortsword.name: RuidiumShortsword
RuidiumShortsword.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

DarkDevotion.name: Dark Devotion
DarkDevotion.description: The fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Laurin wields a staff of the adder and is attuned to it as though he were a cleric.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The fanatic makes two melee attacks.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

LightAbsorption.name: Light Absorption
LightAbsorption.description: If the light devourer spends any part of its turn in an area of bright light or is subjected to radiant damage, it radiates dim light in a 10-foot radius for 1 hour.

WaterBreathing.name: Water Breathing
WaterBreathing.description: The light devourer can breathe only underwater.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The light devourer makes two Bite attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (5d6 + 4) piercing damage, or radiant damage if the light devourer is radiating light (see Light Absorption).

TacticalReadiness.name: Tactical Readiness
TacticalReadiness.description: Maggie and allies within 30 feet of her have advantage on initiative rolls, as long as Maggie isn't incapacitated.

GiantMaul.name: GiantMaul
GiantMaul.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature, Maggie can force it to make a DC 14 Strength saving throw; on a failed save, the target is pushed 5 feet away from Maggie and knocked prone.

HammerToss.name: HammerToss
HammerToss.description: rw 6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature, Maggie can force it to make a DC 14 Strength saving throw; on a failed save, the target is pushed 5 feet away from Maggie and knocked prone.

Push.name: Push
Push.description: Once during each of her turns, after hitting a creature with an attack, Maggie can force the target to make a DC 15 Strength saving throw; on a failed save, the target is pushed up to 10 feet horizontally away from Maggie and knocked prone.

TacticalReadiness.name: Tactical Readiness
TacticalReadiness.description: Maggie and allies within 30 feet of her have advantage on initiative rolls, as long as Maggie isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Maggie makes two Giant Maul or Hammer Toss attacks.

GiantMaul.name: GiantMaul
GiantMaul.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

HammerToss.name: HammerToss
HammerToss.description: rw 7 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

Push.name: Push
Push.description: Once during each of her turns, after hitting a creature with an attack, Maggie can force the target to make a DC 16 Strength saving throw; on a failed save, the target is pushed up to 15 feet horizontally away from Maggie and knocked prone.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Maggie wears a suit of ruidium armor (plate; see appendix B). If Maggie rolls a 1 on a saving throw while wearing the armor, she must succeed on a DC 20 Charisma saving throw or gain 1 level of exhaustion.

TacticalReadiness.name: Tactical Readiness
TacticalReadiness.description: Maggie and allies within 30 feet of her have advantage on initiative rolls, as long as Maggie isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
