Multiattack.description: Maggie makes two Heavy Greataxe or Hammer Toss attacks.

HeavyGreataxe.name: HeavyGreataxe
HeavyGreataxe.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d12 + 5) slashing damage.

HammerToss.name: HammerToss
HammerToss.description: rw 8 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (4d4 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

UnarmoredDefense.name: Unarmored Defense
UnarmoredDefense.description: While the high curator is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The high curator makes three Force Strike attacks and uses Brain Burn (if available).

ForceStrike.name: ForceStrike
ForceStrike.description: ms,rs 10 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 10 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) force damage.

BrainBurn{@recharge4}.name: BrainBurn{@recharge4}
BrainBurn{@recharge4}.description: The high curator targets up to two creatures it can see within 30 feet of itself. Each target must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target takes 28 (8d6) psychic damage and can't take reactions until the start of its next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and suffers no other effect.

GuardedMind.name: Guarded Mind
GuardedMind.description: Spells and other effects can't read the infiltrator's thoughts or determine if the infiltrator is lying. Creatures can communicate telepathically with the infiltrator only if it allows such contact.

UnarmoredDefense.name: Unarmored Defense
UnarmoredDefense.description: While the infiltrator is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The infiltrator makes three Unarmed Strike attacks.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) force damage.

UnarmoredDefense.name: Unarmored Defense
UnarmoredDefense.description: While the operative is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The operative makes three Unarmed Strike attacks, three Cobalt Dart attacks, or a combination thereof.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

CobaltDart.name: CobaltDart
CobaltDart.description: rw 7 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) force damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The extollant makes two Crimson Bolt attacks.

CrimsonBolt.name: CrimsonBolt
CrimsonBolt.description: ms,rs 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) psychic damage.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

ArcaneBlast{@recharge5}.name: ArcaneBlast{@recharge5}
ArcaneBlast{@recharge5}.description: The initiate creates an explosion of magical force in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point it can see within 120 feet of itself. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the creature takes 10 (3d6) force damage and is pushed 10 feet away from the center of the area. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

AlienMind.name: Alien Mind
AlienMind.description: If a creature tries to read the silvertongue's thoughts or deals psychic damage to the silvertongue, that creature must succeed on a DC 16 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until the start of its next turn.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The silvertongue has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

CrimsonBolt.name: CrimsonBolt
CrimsonBolt.description: ms,rs 8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one creature. on hit: 27 (4d10 + 5) psychic damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: Olara can breathe air and water.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Olara has advantage on saving throws to end the charmed condition on herself, and magic can't put her to sleep.

KeenHearingandSight.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
KeenHearingandSight.description: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Olara makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 4 to hit, ranged 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

TramplingCharge.name: Trampling Charge
TramplingCharge.description: If the elephant moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the elephant can make one Stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: mw 10 to hit (with advantage if the target is a creature missing any hit points), reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 25 (4d8 + 7) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

Stomp.name: Stomp
Stomp.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. on hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

ArcaneShock.name: ArcaneShock
ArcaneShock.description: ms,rs 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) lightning damage. If the target is a creature, it can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

SiegeExpert.name: Siege Expert
SiegeExpert.description: The excavator deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The excavator makes three Thunderous Warhammer attacks.

ThunderousWarhammer.name: ThunderousWarhammer
ThunderousWarhammer.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) thunder damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The mastermind makes two Arcane Shock or Dagger of the Poisoned Mind attacks.

ArcaneShock.name: ArcaneShock
ArcaneShock.description: ms,rs 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 26 (4d10 + 4) lightning damage. If the target is a creature, it can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

DaggerofthePoisonedMind.name: DaggerofthePoisonedMind
DaggerofthePoisonedMind.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The serpentmaw can breathe air and water.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The serpentmaw has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the serpentmaw's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The serpentmaw makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 17 (4d6 + 3) piercing damage if the serpentmaw had advantage on the attack roll.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

Club.name: Club
Club.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

DeathBurst.name: Death Burst
DeathBurst.description: When the bloodfin dies, it explodes in a cloud of toxic blood. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the exploding bloodfin, including any creature swallowed by the bloodfin, must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (3d6) poison damage. A creature inside the bloodfin when it explodes falls prone in the space formerly occupied by the bloodfin and is no longer blinded or restrained by it.

WaterBreathing.name: Water Breathing
WaterBreathing.description: The bloodfin can breathe only underwater.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The bloodfin makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit (with advantage if the target is a creature missing any hit points), reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the bloodfin can't bite another target.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 9 to hit (with advantage if the target is a creature missing any hit points), reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (4d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

BloodFrenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
BloodFrenzy.description: The sorrowfish has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

WaterBreathing.name: Water Breathing
WaterBreathing.description: The Sorrowfish can breathe only underwater.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 1 piercing damage.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through an opening as narrow as 1 foot wide. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

VirulentSorrow.name: Virulent Sorrow
VirulentSorrow.description: Each time the swarm takes damage, any creature within 5 feet of it must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the creature suffers the following effects until the end of its next turn: it has disadvantage on its attack rolls, it can't take reactions, and its speed is halved.

WaterBreathing.name: Water Breathing
WaterBreathing.description: The swarm can breathe only underwater.

SwarmofBites.name: SwarmofBites
SwarmofBites.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. on hit: 21 (6d6) piercing damage, or 10 (3d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half its hit points or fewer.

DesolateDrain{@recharge5}.name: DesolateDrain{@recharge5}
DesolateDrain{@recharge5}.description: Each creature in the swarm's space must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed saving throw, a creature takes 24 (7d6) psychic damage and is stunned until the end of its next turn. The effect ends on a creature if the swarm moves out of the creature's space or if another creature within 5 feet of the swarm uses an action to make a 14 Strength check, pulling the affected creature out of the swarm on a successful check. On a successful saving throw, a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Verin has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, Verin has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Verin makes three Glaive attacks.

Glaive.name: Glaive
Glaive.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage.

HandCrossbow.name: HandCrossbow
HandCrossbow.description: rw 7 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 22 (4d10) poison damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The young horizonback tortoise can breathe air and water.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

WaterBreathing.name: Water Breathing
WaterBreathing.description: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

Tentacles.name: Tentacles
Tentacles.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Tarak makes three Dagger attacks.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Varnoth makes three Shortsword attacks.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The anhkolox doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The anhkolox makes two Claw attacks and one Entrapping Rend attack.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet in a horizontal direction of the anhkolox's choice.

EntrappingRend.name: EntrappingRend
EntrappingRend.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 23 (5d6 + 6) piercing damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, the target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be trapped in the anhkolox's rib cage and grappled (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the anhkolox can't use Entrapping Rend on another target.

AuraofCommand.name: Aura of Command
AuraofCommand.description: The draconian radiates a commanding presence in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. A draconian in the aura that can see or hear the aurak can't be charmed and has advantage on saving throws made to avoid or end the frightened condition on itself.

DeathThroes.name: Death Throes
DeathThroes.description: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, its magical essence lashes out as a ball of lightning at the closest creature within 30 feet of it before arcing out to up to two other creatures within 15 feet of the first. Each creature must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 9 (2d8) lightning damage and is stunned until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The draconian makes three Rend or Energy Ray attacks.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d12 + 2) slashing damage.

EnergyRay.name: EnergyRay
EnergyRay.description: rs 6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) force damage.

NoxiousBreath{@recharge5}.name: NoxiousBreath{@recharge5}
NoxiousBreath{@recharge5}.description: The draconian exhales a 15-foot cone of noxious gas. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 21 (6d6) poison damage and gains 1 level of exhaustion. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage, doesn't gain exhaustion, and is immune to all draconians' Noxious Breath for 24 hours.

ControlledFall.name: Controlled Fall
ControlledFall.description: When the draconian falls and isn't incapacitated, it subtracts up to 100 feet from the fall when calculating the fall's damage.

DeathThroes.name: Death Throes
DeathThroes.description: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, its body turns to stone and releases a petrifying gas. Each creature within 5 feet of the draconian must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be restrained as it begins to turn to stone. The restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends; otherwise the creature is petrified for 1 minute. After 1 minute, the body of the draconian crumbles to dust.

DraconicDevotion.name: Draconic Devotion
DraconicDevotion.description: While the draconian can see a Dragon that isn't hostile to it, the draconian has advantage on attack rolls.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The draconian makes two Shortsword attacks.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

DeathThroes.name: Death Throes
DeathThroes.description: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, its scales and flesh immediately shrivel away, and then its bones explode. Each creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or take 9 (2d8) force damage.

Glide.name: Glide
Glide.description: When the draconian falls and isn't incapacitated, it subtracts up to 100 feet from the fall when calculating the fall's damage, and it can move up to 2 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it descends.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The draconian makes two Trident melee attacks or two Lightning Discharge attacks.

Trident.name: Trident
Trident.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

LightningDischarge.name: LightningDischarge
LightningDischarge.description: rs 4 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (3d6) lightning damage.

BoundHaunting.name: Bound Haunting
BoundHaunting.description: Caradoc's spirit is bound to Dargaard Keep. At the start of his turn, if he's outside the keep's walls and not possessing a creature using his Possession action, he must succeed on a DC 15 Charisma saving throw or vanish and reappear in an unoccupied space within the keep.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: Caradoc can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. He takes 5 (1d10) force damage if he ends his turn inside an object.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: If Caradoc dies, he reforms within Dargaard Keep in 2d6 days.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: Caradoc doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Caradoc makes two Withering Touch attacks.

WitheringTouch.name: WitheringTouch
WitheringTouch.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) necrotic damage.

Possession{@recharge5}.name: Possession{@recharge5}
Possession{@recharge5}.description: One Humanoid that Caradoc can see within 5 feet of himself must succeed on a DC 15 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by him; he then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. Caradoc now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. Caradoc can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn Undead, and he retains his alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma, immunity to being charmed and frightened, and his Divisive Whispers bonus action. He otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The dragonnel doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragonnel makes two Rend attacks.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

DraconicDevotion.name: Draconic Devotion
DraconicDevotion.description: While the officer can see a Dragon that isn't hostile to it, the officer has advantage on attack rolls.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The officer makes two Vicious Lance attacks and uses Assault Orders if it's available.

ViciousLance.name: ViciousLance
ViciousLance.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.

HeavyCrossbow.name: HeavyCrossbow
HeavyCrossbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) fire damage.

AssaultOrders{@recharge5}.name: AssaultOrders{@recharge5}
AssaultOrders{@recharge5}.description: The officer shouts orders and targets up to two other creatures within 60 feet of itself. If a target has the Draconic Devotion trait and can hear the officer, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack.

DraconicDevotion.name: Draconic Devotion
DraconicDevotion.description: While the soldier can see a Dragon that isn't hostile to it, the soldier has advantage on attack rolls.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The soldier makes two Longsword or Javelin attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.

Greatclub.name: Greatclub
Greatclub.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The dragon doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) necrotic damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the dragon can't bite a different target.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft. one target. on hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) slashing damage.

CataclysmicBreath{@recharge5}.name: CataclysmicBreath{@recharge5}
CataclysmicBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a wave of ghostly purple flames in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature dies if the breath reduces it to 0 hit points. Additionally, any Medium or smaller Humanoid killed by the breath's damage, as well as every corpse of such a creature within the cone, becomes a zombie (see the Monster Manual) under the dragon's control. The zombie acts on the dragon's initiative but immediately after the dragon's turn. Absent any other command, the zombie tries to kill any non-Undead creature it encounters.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The drone can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The drone doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The drone makes two Claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) lightning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 15). The drone has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

CrystallineSpit{@recharge5}.name: CrystallineSpit{@recharge5}
CrystallineSpit{@recharge5}.description: The drone spits crackling gel in a line 5 feet wide and 20 feet long. Each creature in the line must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 14 (4d6) lightning damage and is restrained by the gel, which hardens into crystal. The creature is restrained until the crystal is destroyed. The crystal has AC 15, 15 hit points, immunity to poison and psychic damage, and vulnerability to thunder damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't restrained.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The soldier makes two Longsword attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Kansaldi has a glowing ruby embedded in her left eye socket. The gem functions as her eye and grants her truesight (included above). The gem can't be removed while Kansaldi is alive. When she dies, a creature can remove the gem as an action. The gem then functions as a gem of seeing.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Kansaldi makes two Pike attacks and uses Flame Burst.

Pike.name: Pike
Pike.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) radiant damage.

FlameBurst.name: FlameBurst
FlameBurst.description: Kansaldi hurls magical flames at a creature she can see within 60 feet of herself. The target must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 11 (2d10) fire damage and catches fire; until a creature takes an action to put out the fire, the target takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of each of its turns. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and doesn't catch fire.

DeathThroes.name: Death Throes
DeathThroes.description: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, it dissolves into acid that splashes on those around it. Each creature within 5 feet of the draconian must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or be covered in acid for 1 minute. A creature covered in the acid takes 7 (2d6) acid damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature can use its action to scrape or wash the acid off itself or another creature.

Glide.name: Glide
Glide.description: When the draconian falls and isn't incapacitated, it subtracts up to 100 feet from the fall when calculating the fall's damage, and it can move up to 2 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it descends.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The draconian makes two Dagger attacks. If both attacks hit the same creature, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned until the end of the target's next turn. While poisoned in this way, the target is also paralyzed.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

Hoopak.name: Hoopak
Hoopak.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 40/160 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage if the kender used the hoopak's sling to make a ranged attack.

Taunt.name: Taunt
Taunt.description: The kender launches a barrage of insults at a creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. If the target can hear the kender, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

EtherealSight.name: Ethereal Sight
EtherealSight.description: Leedara can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when she is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: Leedara can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. She takes 5 (1d10) force damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

WitheringTouch.name: WitheringTouch
WitheringTouch.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) necrotic damage.

Etherealness.name: Etherealness
Etherealness.description: Leedara enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. She is visible on the Material Plane while she is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet she can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

HorrifyingVisage.name: HorrifyingVisage
HorrifyingVisage.description: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of Leedara that can see her must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. If the save fails by 5 or more, the target also ages 1d4  10 years. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the frightened condition on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to Leedara's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours. The aging effect can be reversed with a greater restoration spell, but only within 24 hours of it occurring.

Possession{@recharge}.name: Possession{@recharge}
Possession{@recharge}.description: One humanoid that the ghost can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 13 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by Leedara; Leedara then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. Leedara now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. Leedara can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn undead, and she retains her alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. She otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

ChangeShape.name: ChangeShape
ChangeShape.description: Leedara magically assumes the appearance she had in life, and her creature type changes to Humanoid, while retaining her other game statistics. This transformation ends if Leedara is reduced to 0 hit points or uses an action to end it.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The dragon doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft. one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. The dragon has two claws, each of which can grapple one target.

CataclysmicBreath{@recharge5}.name: CataclysmicBreath{@recharge5}
CataclysmicBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a wave of ghostly purple flames in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature dies if the breath reduces it to 0 hit points. Additionally, any Medium or smaller Humanoid killed by the breath's damage, as well as every corpse of such a creatures within the cone, becomes a zombie (see the Monster Manual) under the dragon's control. The zombie acts on the dragon's initiative but immediately after the dragon's turn. Absent any other command, the zombie tries to kill any non-Undead creature it encounters.

ToxicMastery.name: Toxic Mastery
ToxicMastery.description: Lohezet ignores a creature's resistance to poison damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Lohezet makes three Withering Blast attacks and uses Miasma if it's available. He can replace one of the attacks with a use of Spellcasting.

WitheringBlast.name: WitheringBlast
WitheringBlast.description: ms,rs 9 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (2d12 + 5) necrotic damage.

Miasma{@recharge4}.name: Miasma{@recharge4}
Miasma{@recharge4}.description: Lohezet magically conjures a billowing cloud of purple fog in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within 120 feet of himself. The area within the sphere is heavily obscured, and when a creature starts its turn in the sphere or enters the sphere for the first time on a turn, it must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 39 (6d12) poison damage and is poisoned until the start of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't poisoned. The cloud lasts for 1 minute, until Lohezet ends it early (no action required), or until Lohezet uses this action again. A strong wind disperses the cloud.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Soth fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Soth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MarshalUndead.name: Marshal Undead
MarshalUndead.description: Unless Soth is incapacitated, he and Undead creatures of his choice within 60 feet of him are immune to features that turn Undead.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: Soth doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Soth makes three Forsaken Brand attacks.

ForsakenBrand.name: ForsakenBrand
ForsakenBrand.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) necrotic damage, and if the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of Soth's next turn.

CataclysmicFire(1/Day).name: CataclysmicFire(1/Day)
CataclysmicFire(1/Day).description: Soth hurls a magical ball of fire that explodes at a point he can see within 120 feet of himself. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 35 (10d6) fire damage and 35 (10d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

WordofDeath(1/Day).name: WordofDeath(1/Day)
WordofDeath(1/Day).description: Soth points at a creature he can see within 60 feet of himself and magically commands it to die. The target must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw, taking 100 necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target dies.

DraconicDevotion.name: Draconic Devotion
DraconicDevotion.description: While Red Ruin can see a Dragon that isn't hostile to her, she has advantage on attack rolls.

MountedCombatMaster.name: Mounted Combat Master
MountedCombatMaster.description: When Red Ruin is mounted and a creature targets her mount with an attack, Red Ruin can cause the attack to target her instead.

MountedEvasion.name: Mounted Evasion
MountedEvasion.description: When Red Ruin or her mount makes a Dexterity saving throw to take half damage from an effect, they take no damage on a success and half damage on a failure.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Red Ruin makes three Ember Lance attacks.

EmberLance.name: EmberLance
EmberLance.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or fall prone.

ExplosiveHandCrossbow{@recharge5}.name: ExplosiveHandCrossbow{@recharge5}
ExplosiveHandCrossbow{@recharge5}.description: Red Ruin fires an explosive crossbow bolt at a point she can see within 120 feet of herself. When the bolt reaches that point, or if it hits an object early, it detonates in a 20-foot-radius sphere. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 (10d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

KeenHearingandSight.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
KeenHearingandSight.description: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: The scout has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

ChildoftheSea.name: Child of the Sea
ChildoftheSea.description: The scout can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 4 to hit, ranged 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

DeathThroes.name: Death Throes
DeathThroes.description: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points by a creature that is Large or smaller, the draconian crumbles into dust that then forms a spectral, shrieking image of the creature that killed it. The image lasts for 1 minute. Each creature hostile to the draconian within 10 feet of the image must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the spectral image for 1 minute. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The draconian makes two Serrated Sword attacks and one Tail attack.

SerratedSword.name: SerratedSword
SerratedSword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the skeletal knight to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is bludgeoning or from a critical hit. On a success, the skeletal knight drops to 1 hit point instead.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The skeletal knight doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The skeletal knight makes three Enervating Blade or Throwing Axe attacks in any combination.

EnervatingBlade.name: EnervatingBlade
EnervatingBlade.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) necrotic damage, and if the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of the skeletal knight's next turn.

ThrowingAxe.name: ThrowingAxe
ThrowingAxe.description: mw,rw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The dragonnel doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragonnel makes two Rend attacks.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

AcidSpit.name: AcidSpit
AcidSpit.description: rw 5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (5d6 + 3) acid damage.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces Wersten to 0 hit points, she must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is bludgeoning or from a critical hit. On a success, Wersten drops to 1 hit point instead.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: Wersten doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Wersten makes three Banner Pike attacks and uses Terrifying Litany if it's available.

BannerPike.name: BannerPike
BannerPike.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage. If the target is a Humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 16 Charisma saving throw or be cursed. The curse lasts until it is lifted by remove curse or similar magic. Black, thorny rose stems sprout from the creature's body while it is cursed, imposing disadvantage on the creature's ability checks and attack rolls and halving its speed. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw against the curse is immune to it for 24 hours.

TerrifyingLitany{@recharge5}.name: TerrifyingLitany{@recharge5}
TerrifyingLitany{@recharge5}.description: Wersten recites names of souls slain by Soth and his company, channeling their mortal terror. Each creature that isn't an Undead within 30 feet of her must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 22 (4d10) psychic damage and is frightened of Wersten for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't frightened. At the end of each of its turns, a frightened creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Lucky.name: Lucky
Lucky.description: When the medic rolls a 1 on the d20 of a D20 Test|XPHB, it can reroll the die, and it must use the new roll.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The medic makes two Radiant Burst attacks.

RadiantBurst.name: RadiantBurst
RadiantBurst.description: m,r 5, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft. on hit: 7 (2d6) Radiant damage, and the creature has the Blinded|XPHB condition until the start of the medic's next turn.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The warden has Advantage|XPHB on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The warden makes two Arcane Whip attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Shackling Glyph if available.

ArcaneWhip.name: ArcaneWhip
ArcaneWhip.description: m 6, reach 10 ft. on hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) Force damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Prone|XPHB condition. If the target already has the Prone|XPHB condition, the attack deals an extra 7 (2d6) Force damage.

ShacklingGlyph{@recharge}.name: ShacklingGlyph{@recharge}
ShacklingGlyph{@recharge}.description: str DC 14, one creature the warden can see within 60 feet. {@actSaveFail} The creature has the Grappled|XPHB condition (escape DC 14). While Grappled|XPHB, the creature has the Restrained|XPHB condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The scion makes two Thunderbolt attacks and uses Spellcasting.

Thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt
Thunderbolt.description: m,r 6, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Lightning damage plus 9 (2d8) Thunder damage. Critical on hit: The creature also has the Deafened|XPHB condition for 1 minute.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The inquisitive makes three Crooked Staff attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Inquisitive Eye.

CrookedStaff.name: CrookedStaff
CrookedStaff.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Prone|XPHB condition. If the target already has the Prone|XPHB condition, the attack deals an extra 7 (2d6) Radiant damage.

InquisitiveEye.name: InquisitiveEye
InquisitiveEye.description: wis DC 13, one creature the inquisitive can see within 60 feet. {@actSaveFail} 10 (3d6) Psychic damage, and the target is marked. The inquisitive has Advantage|XPHB on attack rolls against a target it has marked. While marked, the target can't become hidden from the inquisitive, and if it has the Invisible|XPHB condition, it gains no benefit from that condition against the inquisitive. The mark disappears after 1 minute or when the inquisitive uses this action again. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The enforcer makes three Dagger attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Lightning Cage if available.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: m,r 6, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. on hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

LightningCage{@recharge5}.name: LightningCage{@recharge5}
LightningCage{@recharge5}.description: con DC 13, each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere centered on a point the enforcer can see within 60 feet. {@actSaveFail} 13 (3d8) Lightning damage, and the creature can't take Reactions until the end of the enforcer's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The marshal makes three attacks, using Longsword or Pistol in any combination.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: m 7, reach 5 ft. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Slashing damage, and the target has Disadvantage|XPHB on the next attack roll it makes before the start of the marshal's next turn.

Pistol.name: Pistol
Pistol.description: r 7, range 30/90 ft. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) Piercing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The agent makes two Shadow Knife attacks.

ShadowKnife.name: ShadowKnife
ShadowKnife.description: m,r 8, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. on hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) Piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) Necrotic damage, and the target's Speed|XPHB is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

WordsofReason.name: Words of Reason
WordsofReason.description: Allies in a 10-foot Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation originating from the scribe have Advantage|XPHB on saving throws to avoid or end the Charmed|XPHB or Frightened|XPHB condition. This trait doesn't function if the scribe has the Incapacitated|XPHB condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The scribe makes two Bursting Sigil attacks.

BurstingSigil.name: BurstingSigil
BurstingSigil.description: m,r 5, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. on hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) Radiant damage.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If the marauder is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the marauder instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the save and only half as much damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it has the Incapacitated|XPHB condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The marauder makes three Aberrant Strike attacks.

AberrantStrike.name: AberrantStrike
AberrantStrike.description: m 7, reach 5 ft. on hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) Piercing damage, plus 21 (6d6) Force damage if the marauder had Advantage|XPHB on the attack roll.

AberrantSurge.name: Aberrant Surge
AberrantSurge.description: When the ruffian casts Witch Bolt|XPHB, roll 1d8. On an even number, the ruffian gains a number of Temporary Hit Points|XPHB equal to the number rolled. On an odd number, one creature of the ruffian's choice within 30 feet of it takes Force damage equal to the number rolled; if no other creatures are in range, it takes the damage.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: m,r 4, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Piercing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hunter makes three attacks, using Shortsword or Longbow in any combination.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: m 7, reach 5 ft. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage, and the target has Disadvantage|XPHB on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: r 7, range 150/600 ft. on hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) Piercing damage, and the target's Speed|XPHB is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Magic can't put the shadow walker to sleep.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the shadow walker has Disadvantage|XPHB on ability checks and attack rolls.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The shadow walker makes three Gloom Burst attacks and uses Shadow Cowl.

GloomBurst.name: GloomBurst
GloomBurst.description: m,r 9, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) Psychic damage.

ShadowCowl.name: ShadowCowl
ShadowCowl.description: wis DC 17, one creature the shadow walker can see within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} 14 (4d6) Necrotic damage, and the target has the  Blinded|XPHB condition until the start of the shadow walker's next turn.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The heir has Advantage|XPHB on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the heir's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated|XPHB condition.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The heir makes four attacks, using Scimitar or Lunar Wisp in any combination.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: m 5, reach 5 ft. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Poison damage.

LunarWisp.name: LunarWisp
LunarWisp.description: r 5, range 60 ft. on hit: 9 (2d8) Radiant damage, and the target emits Dim Light|XPHB in a 10-foot radius and can't benefit from the Invisible|XPHB condition until the end of the heir's next turn.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Magic can't put the stingblade to sleep.

Stingblade.name: Stingblade
Stingblade.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) Poison damage.

Boomerang.name: Boomerang
Boomerang.description: r 4, reach 30/120 ft. on hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Magic can't put the priest to sleep.

VenomStaff.name: VenomStaff
VenomStaff.description: m 4, reach 5 ft. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Poisoned|XPHB condition until the end of the priest's next turn.

BloodCurseofBinding(1/Day).name: Blood Curse of Binding
BloodCurseofBinding(1/Day).description: As a bonus action, the blood hunter targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or have its speed reduced to 0 and be unable to take reactions. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

BloodFrenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
BloodFrenzy.description: The blood hunter has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The blood hunter has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The blood hunter attacks twice with a weapon.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

HeavyCrossbow.name: HeavyCrossbow
HeavyCrossbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

DarkOne'sBlessing.name: Dark One's Blessing
DarkOne'sBlessing.description: When Bol'bara reduces a hostile creature to 0 hit points, she gains 6 temporary hit points.

NimbleEscape.name: Nimble Escape
NimbleEscape.description: Bol'bara can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of her turns.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Bol'bara makes two melee attacks.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

EldritchBlast(Cantrip).name: EldritchBlast(Cantrip)
EldritchBlast(Cantrip).description: rs 4 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) force damage.

BladedHide.name: Bladed Hide
BladedHide.description: At the start of each of its turns, the moorbounder deals 5 (2d4) piercing damage to any creature grappling it.

StandingLeap.name: Standing Leap
StandingLeap.description: The moorbounder's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The moorbounder makes two attacks: one with its blades and one with its claws.

Blades.name: Blades
Blades.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (4d4 + 4) slashing damage.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The crawler has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the crawler's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The crawler makes four attacks: one with its bite, two with its claws, and one with its tail.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened until the start of the crawler's next turn.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The emissary has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The emissary makes three talons attacks.

Talons.name: Talons
Talons.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) slashing damage.

AlluringThrum{@recharge5}.name: AlluringThrum{@recharge5}
AlluringThrum{@recharge5}.description: The emissary emits a dreadful yet alluring hum. Each creature within 20 feet of the emissary that can hear it and that isn't an aberration must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be charmed for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

CrystalSpores{@recharge}.name: CrystalSpores{@recharge}
CrystalSpores{@recharge}.description: A 15-foot-radius cloud of toxic crystalline spores extends out from the emissary. The spores spread around corners. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned. While poisoned in this way, a creature takes 11 (2d10) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

EarthGlide.name: Earth Glide
EarthGlide.description: The seer can traverse through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the seer doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The seer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The seer uses Fission Staff twice, Psychedelic Orb twice, or each one once.

FissionStaff.name: FissionStaff
FissionStaff.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 9 (1d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage, and the target is knocked prone.

PsychedelicOrb.name: PsychedelicOrb
PsychedelicOrb.description: The seer hurls a glimmering orb at one creature it can see within 120 of it. The target must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or take 27 (5d10) psychic damage and suffer a random condition until the start of the seer's next turn. Roll a d6 for the condition: (1-2) blinded, (3-4) frightened, or (5-6) stunned.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: The worm sheds dim light in a 20-foot radius.

RadiantMirror.name: Radiant Mirror
RadiantMirror.description: If the worm takes radiant damage, each creature within 20 feet of it takes that damage as well.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The worm makes two attacks: one with its barbed tentacles and one with its bite.

BarbedTentacles.name: BarbedTentacles
BarbedTentacles.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. on hit: 25 (5d6 + 8) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. The tentacles can grapple only one creature at a time.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 30 (5d8 + 8) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and takes 21 (6d6) fire damage at the start of each of the worm's turns.

NumbingAura.name: Numbing Aura
NumbingAura.description: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the zombie must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. Unless the save succeeds, the creature can't make more than one attack, or take a bonus action on that turn.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is fire, radiant, or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The zombie makes two weapon attacks.

Greataxe.name: Greataxe
Greataxe.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 25 (3d12 + 6) slashing damage.

HurlRock.name: HurlRock
HurlRock.description: rw 10 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

FreezingStare.name: FreezingStare
FreezingStare.description: The zombie targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or take 35 (10d6) cold damage and be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

FreezingBody.name: Freezing Body
FreezingBody.description: A creature that touches the worm or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 (3d6) cold damage.

DeathBurst.name: Death Burst
DeathBurst.description: When the worm dies, it explodes in a burst of frigid energy. Each creature within 60 feet of it must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures inside the worm when it dies automatically fail this saving throw.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The worm makes two bite attacks, or uses its Trill and makes a bite attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (3d8 + 9) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and takes 10 (3d6) acid damage and 10 (3d6) cold damage at the start of each of the worm's turns.

Trill.name: Trill
Trill.description: The frost worm emits a haunting cry. Each creature within 60 feet of the worm that can hear it must succeed on a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw each time it takes damage and at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once a creature successfully saves against this effect, or if this effect ends for it, that creature is immune to the Trill of all frost worms for the next 24 hours. Frost worms are immune to this effect.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The gearkeeper is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

RapidShifting.name: Rapid Shifting
RapidShifting.description: Opportunity attacks made against the gearkeeper have disadvantage.

WhirlingBlades.name: Whirling Blades
WhirlingBlades.description: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the gearkeeper takes 4 (1d8) slashing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The gearkeeper makes two Arm Blade attacks, or one Arm Blade attack and one Spear Launcher attack.

ArmBlade.name: ArmBlade
ArmBlade.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) slashing damage.

SpearLauncher.name: SpearLauncher
SpearLauncher.description: rw 9 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the target is knocked prone.

ShrapnelBlast{@recharge}.name: ShrapnelBlast{@recharge}
ShrapnelBlast{@recharge}.description: The gearkeeper jettisons a spray of jagged metal in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Shadowstep.name: Shadowstep
Shadowstep.description: As a bonus action, the gloomstalker can teleport up to 40 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the gloomstalker has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The gloomstalker makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

Snatch.name: Snatch
Snatch.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 17). While grappled in this way, the target is restrained.

Shriek{@recharge}.name: Shriek{@recharge}
Shriek{@recharge}.description: The gloomstalker emits a terrible shriek. Each enemy within 60 feet of the gloomstalker that can hear it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the end of the enemy's next turn.

KeenHearingandSmell.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
KeenHearingandSmell.description: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The wolf has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The wolf makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (1d10 + 6) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The tortoise can breathe air and water.

MassiveFrame.name: Massive Frame
MassiveFrame.description: The tortoise can carry up to 20,000 pounds of weight atop its shell, but moves at half speed if the weight exceeds 10,000 pounds. Medium or smaller creatures can move underneath the tortoise while it's not prone.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (3d12 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

ShellDefense{@recharge4}.name: ShellDefense{@recharge4}
ShellDefense{@recharge4}.description: The tortoise withdraws into its shell, falls prone, and gains a +5 bonus to AC. While the tortoise is in its shell, its speed is 0 and can't increase. The tortoise can emerge from its shell as an action, whereupon it is no longer prone.

CurseoftheHusk.name: Curse of the Husk
CurseoftheHusk.description: A humanoid slain by a melee attack from the zombie revives as a husk zombie on its next turn.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The zombie makes two claw attacks. For each of these attacks that reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the zombie can make an additional claw attack.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

MessyEnd.name: Messy End
MessyEnd.description: The kobold explodes 3 rounds after it dies, or immediately if it was killed by a critical hit. The explosion destroys the kobold's body, leaving its equipment behind. Each creature within 5 feet of the exploding kobold must make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

HandCrossbow.name: HandCrossbow
HandCrossbow.description: rw 5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The merrow can breathe air and water.

Harpoon.name: Harpoon
Harpoon.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the merrow can pull it 10 feet closer.

LightningBolt(3rd-LevelSpell;RequiresaSp.name: LightningBolt(3rd-LevelSpell;RequiresaSpellSlot)

value.value: Lightning Bolt (3rd-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)

LightningBolt(3rd-LevelSpell;RequiresaSp.description: The merrow unleashes a stroke of lightning in a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

StandingLeap.name: Standing Leap
StandingLeap.description: The moorbounder's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (4d4 + 4) slashing damage.

ShadowStealth.name: Shadow Stealth
ShadowStealth.description: While in dim light or darkness, the nergaliid can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

StandingLeap.name: Standing Leap
StandingLeap.description: The nergaliid's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. The poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

TongueLash.name: TongueLash
TongueLash.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

SiphonLife{@recharge4}.name: SiphonLife{@recharge4}
SiphonLife{@recharge4}.description: The nergaliid magically draws the life from a humanoid it can see within 40 feet of it. The target must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. An incapacitated target fails the save automatically. On a failed save, the creature takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage, and the nergaliid gains temporary hit points equal to the damage taken. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, and the nergaliid doesn't gain temporary hit points. If this damage kills the target, its body rises at the end of the nergaliid's current turn as a husk zombie|EGW (see earlier in this chapter).

BloodFrenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
BloodFrenzy.description: The warlock has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

LimitedAmphibiousness.name: Limited Amphibiousness
LimitedAmphibiousness.description: The warlock can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

SharkTelepathy.name: Shark Telepathy
SharkTelepathy.description: The warlock can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The warlock makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its Sword of Fathoms.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

SwordofFathoms.name: SwordofFathoms
SwordofFathoms.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or begin choking. The choking creature is incapacitated until the end of its next turn, when the effect ends on it.

EldritchBlast(Cantrip).name: EldritchBlast(Cantrip)
EldritchBlast(Cantrip).description: rs 5 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 5 (1d10) force damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The sea fury can breathe air and water.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the sea fury fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The sea fury has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The sea fury makes two attacks with its claws.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

DeathGlare.name: DeathGlare
DeathGlare.description: The sea fury targets one frightened creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or drop to 0 hit points.

Stench.name: Stench
Stench.description: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the shadowghast must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to this Stench for 24 hours.

ShadowStealth.name: Shadow Stealth
ShadowStealth.description: While in dim light or darkness, the shadowghast can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The shadowghast makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) necrotic damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

PowerfulBuild.name: Powerful Build
PowerfulBuild.description: Sken counts as one size larger when determining her carrying capacity and the weight she can push, drag, or lift.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Sken wears a ring of obscuring|EGW. With it, she can cast the fog cloud spell centered on herself three times per day. The cloud lasts for 1 minute (no concentration required).

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage when used with two hands.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The basilisk can breathe air and water.

PetrifyingSecretions.name: Petrifying Secretions
PetrifyingSecretions.description: A creature must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw if it hits the basilisk with a weapon attack while within 5 feet of it or if it starts its turn grappled by the basilisk. Unless the save succeeds, the creature magically begins to turn to stone and is restrained, and it must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrified.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The basilisk makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 12).

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: If the udaak moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a slam attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 27 (6d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet away from the udaak and knocked prone.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The udaak deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The udaak makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its slam.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 21 (2d12 + 8) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 21). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the udaak can't bite another target.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

Swallow.name: Swallow
Swallow.description: The udaak makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the udaak, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the udaak's turns.

VoiceLock.name: Voice Lock
VoiceLock.description: The vox seeker must move toward and attack the source of the nearest voice within 60 feet of it, to the exclusion of all other targets, for as long as it remains operational.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The vox seeker can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Pincer.name: Pincer
Pincer.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage plus 3 lightning damage.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Yinra has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

KeenHearingandSight.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
KeenHearingandSight.description: Yinra has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If the dolgaunt is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the dolgaunt instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it's incapacitated.

UnarmoredDefense.name: Unarmored Defense
UnarmoredDefense.description: While the dolgaunt is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dolgaunt makes two tentacle attacks and two unarmed strikes. Up to two tentacle attacks can be replaced by Vitality Drain.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. The target is grappled (escape DC 12) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the dolgaunt can't use the same tentacle on another target. The dolgaunt has two tentacles.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

VitalityDrain.name: VitalityDrain
VitalityDrain.description: One creature grappled by a tentacle of the dolgaunt must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 9 (2d8) necrotic damage, and the dolgaunt regains a number of hit points equal to half the necrotic damage taken.

DualConsciousness.name: Dual Consciousness
DualConsciousness.description: The dolgrim has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dolgrim makes three attacks.

Morningstar.name: Morningstar
Morningstar.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

HandCrossbow.name: HandCrossbow
HandCrossbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The hag has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hag makes two Nightmare Touch attacks.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

NightmareTouch.name: NightmareTouch
NightmareTouch.description: ms 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) psychic damage. If the target is unconscious, it takes an extra 10 (3d6) psychic damage and is cursed until the hag dies or the curse is removed. The cursed creature's hit point maximum decreases by 5 (1d10) whenever it finishes a long rest.

AlienMind.name: Alien Mind
AlienMind.description: If a creature tries to read Dyrrn's thoughts or deals psychic damage to it, that creature must succeed on a DC 23 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute. The stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Dyrrn fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
