MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Dyrrn has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Dyrrn regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If Dyrrn takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Dyrrn dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: As a bonus action, Dyrrn can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Dyrrn makes one Tentacle Whip attack and uses its Corruption once. Dyrrn can replace its Tentacle Whip attack with Extract Brain if it has a creature grappled.

TentacleWhip.name: TentacleWhip
TentacleWhip.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 24 (3d10 + 8) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 23), pulled into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of Dyrrn, and must succeed on a DC 23 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends. Dyrrn can't use the same tentacle whip on another target until this grapple ends. Dyrrn has two tentacle whips.

Corruption.name: Corruption
Corruption.description: Dyrrn targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 23 Constitution saving throw or take 22 (4d6 + 8) necrotic damage and become corrupted for 1 minute.

ExtractBrain.name: ExtractBrain
ExtractBrain.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated creature grappled by Dyrrn. on hit: 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, Dyrrn kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The messenger doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

TelepathicBond.name: Telepathic Bond
TelepathicBond.description: While the messenger is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

Quickness{@recharge5}.name: Quickness {@recharge 5}
Quickness{@recharge5}.description: The fastieth can take the Dodge action as a bonus action.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The quori uses its Mind Thrust twice.

IdyllicTouch.name: IdyllicTouch
IdyllicTouch.description: ms 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) force damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or fall prone in a fit of laughter.

MindThrust.name: MindThrust
MindThrust.description: The quori targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Possession{@recharge}.name: Possession{@recharge}
Possession{@recharge}.description: One humanoid that the quori can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 16 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the quori; the quori then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. The quori now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The quori can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

DualMind.name: Dual Mind
DualMind.description: The Inspired has advantage on Wisdom saving throws.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The Inspired makes two crysteel dagger attacks. It can replace one attack with vicious mockery.

CrysteelDagger.name: CrysteelDagger
CrysteelDagger.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) force damage.

ViciousMockery(Cantrip).name: ViciousMockery(Cantrip)
ViciousMockery(Cantrip).description: The Inspired unleashes a string of insults laced with subtle enchantments at one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can hear the Inspired, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or take 2 (1d4) psychic damage and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

KeenSenses.name: Keen Senses
KeenSenses.description: The defender has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks.

TelepathicBond.name: Telepathic Bond
TelepathicBond.description: While the defender is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or take an extra 3 (1d6) piercing damage and be grappled (escape DC 13). The defender can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

All-AroundVision.name: All-Around Vision
All-AroundVision.description: The quori can't be surprised while it isn't incapacitated.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The quori can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The quori has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The quori makes two Soul Binding attacks. Alternatively, it can make four attacks with Arcane Blast.

ArcaneBlast.name: ArcaneBlast
ArcaneBlast.description: rs 13 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (1d10 + 7) force damage.

SoulBinding.name: SoulBinding
SoulBinding.description: ms 13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) necrotic damage. A creature reduced to 0 hit points from this attack dies and has its soul imprisoned in one of the quori's eyes. The target can't be revived by any means short of a wish spell until the quori is destroyed.

MindSeed(1/Day).name: MindSeed(1/Day)
MindSeed(1/Day).description: The quori touches one humanoid, which must succeed on a DC 21 Intelligence saving throw or be cursed. The curse lasts until it's removed by a remove curse or greater restoration spell.

SwarmofEyes{@recharge}.name: SwarmofEyes{@recharge}
SwarmofEyes{@recharge}.description: The quori creates a swarm of spectral eyes that fills a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in that area must make a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 45 (10d8) psychic damage, and it is blinded for 1 minute. On a success, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't blinded. A blinded creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Possession{@recharge}.name: Possession{@recharge}
Possession{@recharge}.description: One humanoid that the quori can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 21 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the quori; the quori then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. The quori now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The quori can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

DualMind.name: Dual Mind
DualMind.description: The kalashtar has advantage on Wisdom saving throws.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

MindThrust.name: MindThrust
MindThrust.description: The kalashtar targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or take 11 (2d10) psychic damage.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The soldier has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the soldier's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the soldier to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the soldier drops to 1 hit point instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The soldier attacks three times with one of its weapons.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Illmarrow fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Illmarrow has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: Illmarrow's body turns to dust when she drops to 0 hit points, and her equipment is left behind. She gains a new body after 1d10 days, regaining all her hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within two hundred miles of the location at which she was destroyed.

ChillTouch(Cantrip).name: ChillTouch(Cantrip)
ChillTouch(Cantrip).description: rs 15 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 18 (4d8) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of Illmarrow's next turn. If the target is undead, it also has disadvantage on attack rolls against Illmarrow until the end of her next turn.

ParalyzingClaw.name: ParalyzingClaw
ParalyzingClaw.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

PoisonBreath{@recharge5}.name: PoisonBreath{@recharge5}
PoisonBreath{@recharge5}.description: Illmarrow exhales poisonous gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 20 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 35 (10d6) poison damage and is poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the creature can't regain hit points. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't poisoned.

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The living spell can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MagicalStrike.name: MagicalStrike
MagicalStrike.description: ms 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) fire damage.

SpellMimicry{@recharge5}.name: SpellMimicry{@recharge5}
SpellMimicry{@recharge5}.description: The living spell unleashes a thin sheet of flames in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The living spell can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The living spell makes two Magical Strike attacks.

MagicalStrike.name: MagicalStrike
MagicalStrike.description: ms 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (5d6 + 5) poison damage.

SpellMimicry{@recharge5}.name: SpellMimicry{@recharge5}
SpellMimicry{@recharge5}.description: The living spell creates a 40-foot-diameter sphere of fog within 60 feet of it (the fog spreads around corners). When a creature enters the fog for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The living spell can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The living spell makes two Magical Strike attacks.

MagicalStrike.name: MagicalStrike
MagicalStrike.description: ms 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (5d6 + 4) lightning damage.

SpellMimicry{@recharge5}.name: SpellMimicry{@recharge5}
SpellMimicry{@recharge5}.description: The living spell unleashes a stroke of lightning in a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

LimitedMagicImmunity.name: Limited Magic Immunity
LimitedMagicImmunity.description: Mordakhesh can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower unless he wishes to be. Mordakhesh has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfrommagicweaponswieldedbygoodcre.name: piercing from magic weapons wielded by good creatures

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Mordakhesh makes three greatsword attacks.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) force damage.

ChromaticOrb.name: ChromaticOrb
ChromaticOrb.description: rs 10 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 13 (3d8) damage of a type chosen by Mordakhesh: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder.

AuraofFalseDivinity.name: Aura of False Divinity
AuraofFalseDivinity.description: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the radiant idol must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw, provided the radiant idol isn't incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature is charmed by the radiant idol. A creature charmed in this way can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once it succeeds on the saving throw, a creature is immune to this radiant idol's Aura of False Divinity for 24 hours.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The radiant idol has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The radiant idol makes two melee attacks.

Flail.name: Flail
Flail.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage.

RadiantStrike(1/Day).name: RadiantStrike(1/Day)
RadiantStrike(1/Day).description: The radiant idol chooses a point on the ground it can see within 60 feet of it. A 30-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder of bright light appears there until the start of the radiant idol's next turn. Each creature in the cylinder when it appears or that ends its turn there must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

DeadlyCritical.name: Deadly Critical
DeadlyCritical.description: Rak Tulkhesh scores a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 and rolls the damage dice three times, instead of twice.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Rak Tulkhesh fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Rak Tulkhesh has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

WhirlwindofWeapons.name: Whirlwind of Weapons
WhirlwindofWeapons.description: A magical aura of weapons surrounds Rak Tulkhesh in a 10 foot radius. At the start of each of his turns, any other creature in the aura takes 14 (4d6) force damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Rak Tulkhesh makes four weapon attacks.

SpawnedMeleeWeapon.name: SpawnedMeleeWeapon
SpawnedMeleeWeapon.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (3d12 + 9) force damage.

SpawnedRangedWeapon.name: SpawnedRangedWeapon
SpawnedRangedWeapon.description: rw 12 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) force damage.

ChangeShape.name: ChangeShape
ChangeShape.description: Rak Tulkhesh magically polymorphs into a humanoid, beast, or giant that has a challenge rating no higher than his own, or back into his true form. He reverts to his true form if he dies. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (his choice).

Shifting(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).name: Shifting (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
Shifting(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).description: As a bonus action, the shifter takes on a more bestial form for 1 minute or until it dies. The shifter gains 5 temporary hit points. It can make a bite attack when it activates this trait and also as a bonus action on each of its turns while in its bestial form.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Sul Khatesh fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Sul Khatesh has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MasterofMagic.name: Master of Magic
MasterofMagic.description: Sul Khatesh has advantage on Constitution saving throws to maintain concentration.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Sul Khatesh makes four attacks with Arcane Blast.

ArcaneBlast.name: ArcaneBlast
ArcaneBlast.description: rs 18 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (1d10 + 10) force damage.

MagicStaff.name: MagicStaff
MagicStaff.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 36 (5d12 + 4) force damage.

ArcaneCataclysm(RechargesafteraLongRest).name: ArcaneCataclysm(RechargesafteraLongRest)

value.value: Arcane Cataclysm (Recharges after a Long Rest)

ArcaneCataclysm(RechargesafteraLongRest).description: Sul Khatesh conjures orbs of magical energy that plummet to the ground at three different points she can see within 1 mile of her. Each creature in a 40-foot-radius sphere centered on each point must make a DC 26 Dexterity saving throw, taking 71 (11d12) force damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature in the area of more than one arcane burst is affected only once. The area of each arcane burst then acts as an antimagic field for 1 hour. Sul Khatesh and spells she casts are unaffected by these fields.

ChangeShape.name: ChangeShape
ChangeShape.description: Sul Khatesh magically polymorphs into a humanoid, beast, or giant that has a challenge rating no higher than her own, or back into her true form. She reverts to her true form if she dies. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (Sul Khatesh's choice).

UnstableMark.name: Unstable Mark
UnstableMark.description: When the assassin casts an innate spell, each creature within 10 feet of the assassin must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 4 (1d8) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The assassin makes two shortsword attacks.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

FireBolt(Cantrip).name: FireBolt(Cantrip)
FireBolt(Cantrip).description: rs 4 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d10) fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.

ChromaticOrb(1/Day).name: ChromaticOrb(1/Day)
ChromaticOrb(1/Day).description: rs 4 to hit, range 90 ft., one creature. on hit: 18 (4d8) damage of a type chosen by the assassin: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder.

AdamantinePlating.name: Adamantine Plating
AdamantinePlating.description: Any critical hit against the Lord of Blades becomes a normal hit.

BladedArmor.name: Bladed Armor
BladedArmor.description: A creature that grapples the Lord of Blades or is grappled by him takes 13 (3d8) slashing damage. A creature takes 13 (3d8) slashing damage if it starts its turn grappling or being grappled by the Lord of Blades.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: If the Lord of Blades moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with his adamantine sixblade on the same turn, the target takes an extra 11 (2d10) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.

WarforgedResilience.name: Warforged Resilience
WarforgedResilience.description: The Lord of Blades has advantage on saving throws against being poisoned, is immune to disease, and magic can't put him to sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The Lord of Blades makes three attacks: two with his adamantine sixblade and one with his bladed wings.

AdamantineSixblade.name: AdamantineSixblade
AdamantineSixblade.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) force damage.

BladedWings.name: BladedWings
BladedWings.description: mw,rw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage.

FireBolt(Cantrip).name: FireBolt(Cantrip)
FireBolt(Cantrip).description: rs 10 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (4d10) fire damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The quori makes three attacks: one pincer attack, one attack with its claws, and one stinger attack.

Pincer.name: Pincer
Pincer.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage. The target is grappled (escape DC 14) if it is a Large or smaller creature. The quori has two pincers, each of which can grapple one target.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (4d4 + 3) slashing damage.

Stinger.name: Stinger
Stinger.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the quori for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Possession{@recharge}.name: Possession{@recharge}
Possession{@recharge}.description: One humanoid that the quori can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 14 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the quori; the quori then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. The quori now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The quori can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

AuraofRadiance.name: Aura of Radiance
AuraofRadiance.description: The councilor magically sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. The councilor can extinguish or restore this light as a bonus action. If the bright light overlaps with an area of darkness created by a spell of 3rd level or lower, the spell that created that darkness is dispelled.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The councilor has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The councilor makes two Radiant Touch attacks.

RadiantTouch.name: RadiantTouch
RadiantTouch.description: ms 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) radiant damage.

HealingTouch(3/Day).name: HealingTouch(3/Day)
HealingTouch(3/Day).description: The councilor touches another creature. The target magically regains 18 (3d8 + 5) hit points and is freed from one curse afflicting it (councilor's choice).

FlameStrike(5th-LevelSpell;RequiresaSpel.name: FlameStrike(5th-LevelSpell;RequiresaSpellSlot)

value.value: Flame Strike (5th-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)

FlameStrike(5th-LevelSpell;RequiresaSpel.description: The councilor chooses a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on that point must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 14 (4d6) fire damage and 14 (4d6) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the councilor casts this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the fire damage or the radiant damage (its choice) increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 5th.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: The soldier magically sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. The soldier can extinguish or restore this light as a bonus action.

TurnResistance.name: Turn Resistance
TurnResistance.description: The soldier has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

bludgeoningfromnonmagicalattacksthataren.name: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

piercingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

slashingfromnonmagicalattacksthataren'ts.name: slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The soldier makes two spear attacks.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 9 (2d8) radiant damage if the target is a fiend or undead.

Bonding.name: Bonding
Bonding.description: The hawk can magically bond with one creature it can see, immediately after spending at least 1 hour observing that creature while within 30 feet of it. The bond lasts until the hawk bonds with a different creature or until the bonded creature dies. While bonded, the hawk and the bonded creature can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 100 feet.

KeenSight.name: Keen Sight
KeenSight.description: The hawk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Talons.name: Talons
Talons.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage.

Bonding.name: Bonding
Bonding.description: The hound can magically bond with one creature it can see, immediately after spending at least 1 hour observing that creature while within 30 feet of it. The bond lasts until the hound bonds with a different creature or until the bonded creature dies. While bonded, the hound and the bonded creature can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 100 feet.

KeenHearingandSmell.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
KeenHearingandSmell.description: The hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Bonding.name: Bonding
Bonding.description: The steed can magically bond with one creature it can see, immediately after spending at least 1 hour observing that creature while within 30 feet of it. The bond lasts until the steed bonds with a different creature or until the bonded creature dies. While bonded, the steed and the bonded creature can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 100 feet.

Hooves.name: Hooves
Hooves.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The colossus is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the colossus fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The colossus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The colossus deals double damage to objects and structures.

ToweringTerror.name: Towering Terror
ToweringTerror.description: Any enemy outside the colossus that starts its turn within 30 feet of it must succeed on a DC 26 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the start of the enemy's next turn. If the enemy's saving throw is successful, it is immune to this colossus's Towering Terror for the next 24 hours.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The colossus makes three attacksone with its slam and two with its eldritch turretsand then uses Stomp.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 29 (3d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage, and the colossus can push the target up to 20 feet away from it.

EldritchTurret.name: EldritchTurret
EldritchTurret.description: rs 18 to hit, range 300 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (4d8) force damage, and if the target is a creature, it is knocked prone.

Stomp.name: Stomp
Stomp.description: The colossus stomps one of its feet at a point on the ground within 20 feet of it. Any creature in a 20-foot-radius, 20-foot-high cylinder centered on this point must succeed on a DC 26 Dexterity saving throw or take 33 (6d10) bludgeoning damage and fall prone. Until the colossus uses its Stomp again or moves, the creature is restrained. While restrained in this way, the creature (or another creature within 5 feet of it) can use its action to make a DC 26 Strength check. On a success, the creature relocates to an unoccupied space of its choice within 5 feet of the colossus and is no longer restrained.

IncineratingBeam{@recharge5}.name: IncineratingBeam{@recharge5}
IncineratingBeam{@recharge5}.description: The colossus fires a beam of light in a 150-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 26 Dexterity saving throw, taking 60 (11d10) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this beam is disintegrated, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

WarforgedResilience.name: Warforged Resilience
WarforgedResilience.description: The warforged has advantage on saving throws against being poisoned and is immune to disease. Magic can't put it to sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The warforged makes two armblade attacks.

Armblade.name: Armblade
Armblade.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

Platforms.name: Platforms
Platforms.description: The warforged titan has two platforms built into its chassis. One Medium or smaller creature can ride on each platform without squeezing. To make a melee attack against a target within 5 feet of the warforged, they must use spears or weapons with reach and the target must be Large or larger.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The warforged titan deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The warforged titan makes one axehand attack and one hammerfist attack.

Axehand.name: Axehand
Axehand.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) slashing damage, plus 11 (2d10) slashing damage if the target is prone.

Hammerfist.name: Hammerfist
Hammerfist.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

SweepingAxe{@recharge}.name: SweepingAxe{@recharge}
SweepingAxe{@recharge}.description: The warforged titan makes a sweep with its axehand, and each creature within 10 feet of it must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 19 (3d8 + 6) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

LimitedMagicImmunity.name: Limited Magic Immunity
LimitedMagicImmunity.description: The rakshasa can't be affected or detected by spells of 1st level or lower unless it wishes to be. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

MagicWeapons.name: Magic Weapons
MagicWeapons.description: The rakshasa's weapon attacks are magical.

MartialProwess(1/Turn).name: Martial Prowess (1/Turn)
MartialProwess(1/Turn).description: When the rakshasa hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 11 (2d10) damage of the weapon's type, and the creature must make a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure, the rakshasa can push the creature up to 10 feet away from it, knock the creature prone, or make the creature drop one item it is holding of the rakshasa's choice.

piercingfrommagicweaponswieldedbygoodcre.name: piercing from magic weapons wielded by good creatures

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The rakshasa makes three melee weapon attacks. Alternatively, it can make two ranged attacks with its javelins.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The blessed makes two Mace or Radiant Bolt attacks.

Mace.name: Mace
Mace.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage.

RadiantBolt.name: RadiantBolt
RadiantBolt.description: rs 6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (5d8) radiant damage, and the blessed regains 5 (1d10) hit points.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The chosen makes one Handaxe attack and two Shortsword attacks.

Handaxe.name: Handaxe
Handaxe.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage. {@hom}The handaxe magically returns to the chosen's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The speaker makes two Thunder Bolt attacks.

ThunderBolt.name: ThunderBolt
ThunderBolt.description: ms,rs 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (3d8) thunder damage, and the target is pushed horizontally up to 10 feet away from the speaker.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The dragon turtle can breathe air and water.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (1d12 + 3) piercing damage.

SteamBreath{@recharge5}.name: SteamBreath{@recharge5}
SteamBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon turtle exhales steam in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Being underwater doesn't grant resistance against this damage.

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The ooze can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ooze makes two Pseudopod attacks. The ooze can replace one Pseudopod attack with its Slime Breath, if available.

Pseudopod.name: Pseudopod
Pseudopod.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) acid damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target takes 7 (2d6) acid damage at the start of each of its turns.

SlimeBreath{@recharge}.name: SlimeBreath{@recharge}
SlimeBreath{@recharge}.description: The ooze expels a spray of its gelatinous mass in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 22 (4d10) acid damage and is pulled up to 30 feet straight toward the ooze. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pulled.

FearAura.name: Fear Aura
FearAura.description: Each creature of the golem's choice that starts its turn within 20 feet of the golem must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw unless the golem is incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature is frightened until the start of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this golem's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The golem doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The golem makes one Pinion attack and two Rend attacks.

Pinion.name: Pinion
Pinion.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is pinned beneath the bony pinion and restrained. The golem has two pinions, each of which can restrain one target. If a creature is restrained by one of the pinions, the golem can't attack with it. Any creature restrained by a pinion can free itself at the start of its turn with a successful DC 17 Strength (Athletics) check.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) necrotic damage.

PetrifyingBreath{@recharge5}.name: PetrifyingBreath{@recharge5}
PetrifyingBreath{@recharge5}.description: The golem emits a 60-foot cone of petrifying gas from its mouth. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 35 (10d6) poison damage and be restrained as it begins to turn to stone. The restrained target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the effect ends on the target. On a failed save, the target is petrified.

LegendaryResistance(1/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(1/Day).description: If the dragonborn fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragonborn makes three Longsword attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage. The dragonborn can cause the sword to flare with bright light, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the start of the dragonborn's next turn. The sword can flare in this way only once per turn.

HealingTouch(1/Day).name: HealingTouch(1/Day)
HealingTouch(1/Day).description: The dragonborn touches another creature within 5 feet of it. The target magically regains 40 hit points. In addition, all diseases and poisons affecting the target are removed.

RadiantBreath{@recharge}.name: RadiantBreath{@recharge}
RadiantBreath{@recharge}.description: The dragonborn exhales fiery radiance in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. When the dragonborn uses this action, it can choose up to three creatures in the cone. These creatures take no damage from the radiance and instead regain 22 (4d10) hit points each.

LegendaryResistance(1/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(1/Day).description: If the dragonborn fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MentalDefense.name: Mental Defense
MentalDefense.description: While the dragonborn is wearing no armor, its AC includes its Intelligence modifier.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragonborn makes three Mind Blade attacks.

MindBlade.name: MindBlade
MindBlade.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

HeatBreath{@recharge}.name: HeatBreath{@recharge}
HeatBreath{@recharge}.description: The dragonborn exhales a wave of intense heat in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Metal objects in that area glow red-hot until the end of the dragonborn's next turn. Any creature in physical contact with a heated object at the start of its turn must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 9 (2d8) fire damage and has disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of its next turn.

LegendaryResistance(1/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(1/Day).description: If the dragonborn fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragonborn makes two Greataxe attacks.

Greataxe.name: Greataxe
Greataxe.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (1d12 + 5) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.

NecroticBreath{@recharge}.name: NecroticBreath{@recharge}
NecroticBreath{@recharge}.description: The dragonborn exhales shadowy fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 36 (8d8) necrotic damage and is frightened of the dragonborn for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't frightened. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

CloyingMiasma.name: Cloying Miasma
CloyingMiasma.description: The abomination is surrounded by a noxious stench. At the start of the abomination's turn, any creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the abomination's next turn.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The abomination regains 10 hit points at the start of its turns if it has at least 1 hit point.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The abomination makes three attacks using Claw, Acidic Spit, or a combination of them. It can replace one of the attacks with a Tail attack.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) poison damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

AcidicSpit.name: AcidicSpit
AcidicSpit.description: rw 5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (3d6) acid damage.

AcidBelch{@recharge5}.name: AcidBelch{@recharge5}
AcidBelch{@recharge5}.description: The abomination belches forth a cloud of acidic gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The grafter makes one Claw attack and one Greatclub attack.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) poison damage.

Greatclub.name: Greatclub
Greatclub.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

AcidRetch{@recharge5}.name: AcidRetch{@recharge5}
AcidRetch{@recharge5}.description: The grafter retches forth a spray of acidic bile in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The dragonnel doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragonnel makes two Rend attacks.

Rend.name: Rend
Rend.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The egg hunter can breathe air and water.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: If the egg hunter is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the egg hunter move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the egg hunter is animate. Dragons have disadvantage on this check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The egg hunter makes two Barbed Proboscis attacks, and it can use Torpor Spores if it's available.

BarbedProboscis.name: BarbedProboscis
BarbedProboscis.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage, and the egg hunter regains hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt.

TorporSpores{@recharge5}.name: TorporSpores{@recharge5}
TorporSpores{@recharge5}.description: The egg hunter releases a billow of sparkling blue spores. Each creature in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on the egg hunter must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the creature can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn but not both, and it can't take reactions. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to this egg hunter's Torpor Spores for the next 24 hours.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The egg hunter can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The egg hunter makes two Egg Tooth attacks.

EggTooth.name: EggTooth
EggTooth.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 17 (4d6 + 3) piercing damage if the target is an object.

LegendaryResistance(4/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(4/Day).description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The dragon deals double damage to objects and structures.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The dragon doesn't require air or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack, two Claw attacks, and one Tentacle attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (2d10 + 8) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) psychic damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (1d6 + 8) slashing damage.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. on hit: 12 (1d8 + 8) psychic damage. If the target is Huge or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 18). The dragon can have up to four targets grappled at a time.

TadpoleBrineBreath{@recharge5}.name: TadpoleBrineBreath{@recharge5}
TadpoleBrineBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales brine in a 120-foot line that is 15 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a DC 22 Constitution saving throw, taking 55 (10d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a success or failure, if the creature isn't a Construct or an Undead, it becomes infested with illithid tadpoles.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The dragon can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and can leave a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) psychic damage.

DisorientingBreath{@recharge5}.name: DisorientingBreath{@recharge5}
DisorientingBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a wave of psychic dissonance in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 17 (5d6) psychic damage, and until the end of its next turn, when the creature makes an attack roll or an ability check, it must roll a d4 and reduce the total by the number rolled. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage with no additional effects.

GemAwakening(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.name: Gem Awakening (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
GemAwakening(RechargesafteraShortorLongR.description: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 400 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the greatwyrm can now use its Mass Telekinesis action during the next hour. Award a party an additional 90,000 XP (180,000 XP total) for defeating the greatwyrm after its Gem Awakening activates.

LegendaryResistance(4/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(4/Day).description: If the greatwyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The greatwyrm doesn't require food or drink.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (2d10 + 9) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) force damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (2d8 + 9) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 19) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The greatwyrm can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.name: BreathWeapon{@recharge5}
BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.description: The greatwyrm exhales crushing force in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 71 (11d12) force damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone. On a success or failure, the creature's speed becomes 0 until the end of its next turn.

MassTelekinesis(GemAwakeningOnly;Recharg.name: MassTelekinesis(GemAwakeningOnly;RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Mass Telekinesis (Gem Awakening Only; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

MassTelekinesis(GemAwakeningOnly;Recharg.description: The greatwyrm targets any number of creatures and objects it can see within 120 feet of it. No one target can weigh more than 4,000 pounds, and objects can't be targeted if they're being worn or carried. Each targeted creature must succeed on a DC 26 Strength saving throw or be restrained in the greatwyrm's telekinetic grip. At the end of a creature's turn, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The eyedrake doesn't require food or drink.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage.

AntimagicBreath{@recharge}.name: AntimagicBreath{@recharge}
AntimagicBreath{@recharge}.description: The eyedrake emits a magic wave in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 39 (6d12) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Every spell of 3rd level or lower ends on creatures and objects of the eyedrake's choice in that area.

EyeRays.name: EyeRays
EyeRays.description: The eyedrake shoots three of the following magical eye rays at random (reroll duplicates), each ray targeting one creature it can see within 60 feet of it:

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The gem stalker can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The gem stalker doesn't require food or drink.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The gem stalker makes four Claw attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The ghost dragon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the ghost dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The ghost dragon doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ghost dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 32 (6d8 + 5) cold damage, and the target's speed is halved until the start of the dragon's next turn.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) necrotic damage.

TerrifyingBreath{@recharge}.name: TerrifyingBreath{@recharge}
TerrifyingBreath{@recharge}.description: The ghost dragon exhales shadowy mist in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 40 (9d8) cold damage and is frightened of the ghost dragon for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't frightened.

Peck.name: Peck
Peck.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

LegendaryResistance(4/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(4/Day).description: If the greatwyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MetallicAwakening(RechargesafteraShortor.name: Metallic Awakening (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
MetallicAwakening(RechargesafteraShortor.description: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 450 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the greatwyrm can now use the options in the "Mythic Actions" section for 1 hour. Award a party an additional 120,000 XP (240,000 XP total) for defeating the greatwyrm after its Metallic Awakening activates.

UnusualNature.description: The greatwyrm doesn't require food or drink.

Tail.description: mw 18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (2d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 26 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.description: The greatwyrm uses one of the following breath weapons:

ChangeShape.name: ChangeShape
ChangeShape.description: The greatwyrm magically transforms into any creature that is Medium or Small, while retaining its game statistics (other than its size). This transformation ends if the dragon is reduced to 0 hit points or uses its action to end it.

LegendaryResistance(4/Day).description: If the greatwyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.description: The greatwyrm exhales a blast of energy in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 26 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 78 (12d12) poison damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

FalseAppearance(HoardFormOnly).name: False Appearance (Hoard Form Only)
FalseAppearance(HoardFormOnly).description: If the mimic is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the mimic move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the mimic is animate.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The mimic makes one Bite attack and two Pseudopod attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage.

Pseudopod.name: Pseudopod
Pseudopod.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the mimic adheres to the target. A creature adhered to the mimic is also grappled by it (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

CausticMist{@recharge5}.name: CausticMist{@recharge5}
CausticMist{@recharge5}.description: The mimic sprays a fine mist of acid in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 27 (6d8) acid damage and is blinded until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't blinded.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: The mimic transforms into a hoard or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

FalseAppearance.name: False Appearance
FalseAppearance.description: If the scarab is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the scarab move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the scarab is animate.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it has disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of its next turn.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the hollow dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Reconstruction.name: Reconstruction
Reconstruction.description: When the hollow dragon is reduced to 0 hit points, its body breaks into nine pieces: two arms, two legs, two wings, a tail, a torso, and a head. Each piece is a Large object with AC 19, 27 hit points, and immunity to psychic and poison damage. After 1d6 days, if all pieces are still within 6 miles of each other, they all teleport to the location of the head piece and merge with it, whereupon the hollow dragon regains all its hit points and becomes active again.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hollow dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks, and it can use Sapping Presence.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) radiant damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

SappingPresence.name: SappingPresence
SappingPresence.description: Each creature of the hollow dragon's choice within 60 feet of it must make a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature's speed is halved and it has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this hollow dragon's Sapping Presence for 24 hours.

RadiantBreath{@recharge5}.name: RadiantBreath{@recharge5}
RadiantBreath{@recharge5}.description: The hollow dragon exhales radiant flames in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The liondrake makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

Blood-ChillingRoar{@recharge4}.name: Blood-ChillingRoar{@recharge4}
Blood-ChillingRoar{@recharge4}.description: The liondrake lets out a terrifying roar audible out to 300 feet. Any creature within 30 feet of the liondrake that can hear its roar must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the liondrake for 1 minute. A creature that fails the save by 5 or more is also paralyzed for the same duration. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this liondrake's Blood-Chilling Roar for the next 24 hours.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The peacekeeper is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

TelepathicBond.name: Telepathic Bond
TelepathicBond.description: While the peacekeeper is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically with each other.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The peacekeeper makes two Slam attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (3d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

CalmingMist{@recharge5}.name: CalmingMist{@recharge5}
CalmingMist{@recharge5}.description: The peacekeeper releases a calming gas in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 14 Charisma saving throw or become charmed by the peacekeeper for 1 minute. While charmed in this way, the creature is incapacitated and has a speed of 0.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The warbler is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

TelepathicBond.name: Telepathic Bond
TelepathicBond.description: While the warbler is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically with each other.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

CalmingMist{@recharge5}.name: CalmingMist{@recharge5}
CalmingMist{@recharge5}.description: The warbler releases a calming gas in a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 11 Charisma saving throw or become charmed by the warbler for 1 minute. While charmed in this way, the creature is incapacitated and has a speed of 0.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) radiant damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) thunder damage.

DebilitatingBreath{@recharge5}.name: DebilitatingBreath{@recharge5}
DebilitatingBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a pulse of high-pitched, nearly inaudible sound in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 22 (4d10) thunder damage and is incapacitated until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't incapacitated.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny scarab. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

SwarmofBites.name: SwarmofBites
SwarmofBites.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. on hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage if the swarm is at half of its hit points or fewer, and the target has disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of its next turn.
