Multiattack.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) force damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage.

SingularityBreath{@recharge5}.name: SingularityBreath{@recharge5}
SingularityBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon creates a shining bead of gravitational force in its mouth, then releases the energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 36 (8d8) force damage, and its speed becomes 0 until the start of the dragon's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage, and its speed isn't reduced.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) radiant damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

ScintillatingBreath{@recharge5}.name: ScintillatingBreath{@recharge5}
ScintillatingBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a burst of brilliant radiance in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The dragon then gains 10 temporary hit points by absorbing a portion of the radiant energy.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The dragon turtle can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon turtle makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (1d12 + 5) piercing damage plus 6 (1d12) lightning damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage.

SteamBreath{@recharge5}.name: SteamBreath{@recharge5}
SteamBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon turtle exhales steam in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 42 (12d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Being underwater doesn't grant resistance against this damage.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The dragon can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and can leave a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) psychic damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage.

DisorientingBreath{@recharge5}.name: DisorientingBreath{@recharge5}
DisorientingBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a wave of psychic dissonance in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 31 (9d6) psychic damage, and until the end of its next turn, when the creature makes an attack roll or an ability check, it must roll a d6 and reduce the total by the number rolled. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage with no additional effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) radiant damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.name: BreathWeapon{@recharge5}
BreathWeapon{@recharge5}.description: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons:

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The dragon can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The dragon can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and can leave a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) thunder damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage.

DebilitatingBreath{@recharge5}.name: DebilitatingBreath{@recharge5}
DebilitatingBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a pulse of high-pitched, nearly inaudible sound in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 33 (6d10) thunder damage and is incapacitated until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't incapacitated.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The sea serpent can breathe air and water.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The sea serpent deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The sea serpent makes one Bite attack and one Constrict or Tail attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) cold damage.

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 20 ft., one creature. on hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the sea serpent can't constrict another target.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet away and knocked prone.

RimeBreath{@recharge5}.name: RimeBreath{@recharge5}
RimeBreath{@recharge5}.description: The sea serpent exhales a 30-foot cone of cold. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 38 (7d10) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The dragon can breathe both air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) necrotic damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

DesiccatingBreath{@recharge5}.name: DesiccatingBreath{@recharge5}
DesiccatingBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales yellowish necrotic energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 28 (8d6) necrotic damage and is weakened until the end of its next turn. A weakened creature has disadvantage on Strength-based ability checks and Strength saving throws, and the creature's weapon attacks that rely on Strength deal half damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't weakened.

AuraofMindErosion.name: Aura of Mind Erosion
AuraofMindErosion.description: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the sire must make a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature has disadvantage for 1 minute on Wisdom and Charisma checks and on Wisdom and Charisma saves. At the start of each of its turns, the sire can suppress this aura until the start of its next turn.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The sire has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The sire makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 25 (3d12 + 6) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) psychic damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) psychic damage.

SpiderClimb.name: Spider Climb
SpiderClimb.description: The horror can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the horror has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The horror can use its Maddening Presence and make three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 24 (4d8 + 6) slashing damage.

MaddeningPresence.name: MaddeningPresence
MaddeningPresence.description: The horror targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the horror, the target must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target becomes paralyzed until the end of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the horror's Maddening Presence for the next 24 hours.

KeenSight.name: Keen Sight
KeenSight.description: The roc has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The roc makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

Beak.name: Beak
Beak.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

Talons.name: Talons
Talons.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The skyswimmer can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The skyswimmer makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its slam.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the skyswimmer. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the skyswimmer, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the skyswimmer's turns. If the skyswimmer takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the skyswimmer must succeed on a 18 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls prone in a space within 10 feet of the skyswimmer. If the skyswimmer dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. on hit: 19 (2d12 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

FormationTactics.name: Formation Tactics
FormationTactics.description: The soldier has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, frightened, grappled, or restrained while it is within 5 feet of at least one ally.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The soldier makes two melee attacks.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Reckless.name: Reckless
Reckless.description: At the start of its turn, the giant can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The giant deals double damage to objects and structures.

StoneCamouflage.name: Stone Camouflage
StoneCamouflage.description: The giant has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The giant makes two slam attacks. The first of those attacks that hits deals an extra 18 (4d8) damage if the giant has taken damage since its last turn.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 24 (4d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 10 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. on hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

CunningAction.name: Cunning Action
CunningAction.description: On each of its turns, the thought spy can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The thought spy makes two melee attacks, or it makes three ranged attacks with its daggers.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Rapier.name: Rapier
Rapier.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Trostani fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Trostani has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SpeakwithBeastsandPlants.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
SpeakwithBeastsandPlants.description: Trostani can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

TreeStride.name: Tree Stride
TreeStride.description: Once on her turn, Trostani can use 10 feet of her movement to step magically into one living tree within her reach and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Trostani takes three actions: she uses Constrict and Touch of Order, and she casts a spell with a casting time of 1 action.

Constrict.name: Constrict
Constrict.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. Trostani can grapple no more than three targets at a time.

TouchofOrder.name: TouchofOrder
TouchofOrder.description: ms 16 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 23 (3d8 + 10) radiant damage, and Trostani can choose one magic item she can see in the target's possession. Unless it's an artifact, the item's magic is suppressed until the start of Trostani's next turn.

WrathofMat'Selesnya{@recharge5}.name: WrathofMat'Selesnya{@recharge5}
WrathofMat'Selesnya{@recharge5}.description: Trostani conjures a momentary whirl of branches and vines at a point she can see within 60 feet of her. Each creature in a 30-foot cube on that point must make a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage and 21 (6d6) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The medusa has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SurpriseAttack.name: Surprise Attack
SurpriseAttack.description: During the first round of combat, the medusa has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that is surprised, and it deals an extra 10 (3d6) damage each time it hits such a creature with an attack.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The medusa makes two claw attacks. It can also use Petrifying Gaze before or after making these attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

PetrifyingGaze.name: PetrifyingGaze
PetrifyingGaze.description: The medusa fixes its gaze on one creature within 60 feet of it that it can see and that can see its eyes. The target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly petrified. Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to stone and is restrained. The restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming petrified on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by a greater restoration spell or similar magic.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: rw 4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The wurm deals double damage to objects and structures.

EarthTremors.name: Earth Tremors
EarthTremors.description: The wurm creates earth tremors as it moves overland or underground. Any creature that comes within 30 feet of the moving wurm for the first time on a turn must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or take 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage and fall prone. Any structure or object anchored to the ground that comes within 30 feet of the moving wurm for the first time on a turn takes 10 (3d6) force damage.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The wurm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 24 (5d6 + 7) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the wurm. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the wurm, and takes 17 (5d6) acid damage at the start of each of the wurm's turns. If the wurm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the wurm must succeed on a 21 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the wurm. If the wurm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: Zegana can breathe air and water.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If Zegana fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Zegana has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

PrimeSpeaker'sTrident.name: PrimeSpeaker'sTrident
PrimeSpeaker'sTrident.description: mw,rw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the trident emits a thunderous boom. Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from the prongs of the trident must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 9 (2d8) thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from Zegana. If the creature is underwater, the damage is increased to 13 (3d8). On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

Deluge{@recharge4}.name: Deluge{@recharge4}
Deluge{@recharge4}.description: Zegana conjures a wave of water that crashes down on an area within 120 feet of her. The area can be up to 30 feet long, up to 10 feet wide, and up to 10 feet tall. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 (4d8) bludgeoning damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone. The water spreads out across the ground, extinguishing unprotected flames it comes in contact with, and then vanishes.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The croaker can breathe air and water.

SpeakwithFrogsandToads.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
SpeakwithFrogsandToads.description: The croaker can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

StandingLeap.name: Standing Leap
StandingLeap.description: The croaker's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

SwampCamouflage.name: Swamp Camouflage
SwampCamouflage.description: The croaker has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Glaaar-pat(3/Day).name: Glaaar-pat(3/Day)
Glaaar-pat(3/Day).description: The croaker sings a song of marshy doom. Each chosen creature within 30 feet of the croaker that can hear the song must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this saving throw also has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws until the end of its next turn.

Rooooo-glog(1/Day).name: Rooooo-glog(1/Day)
Rooooo-glog(1/Day).description: The croaker sings an ode to an elder froghemoth. Each bullywug within 30 feet of the croaker that can hear the song gains 10 temporary hit points.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The royal can breathe air and water.

Brute.name: Brute
Brute.description: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the royal hits with it (included in the attack).

FrogRider.name: Frog Rider
FrogRider.description: The royal has advantage on melee attacks made while riding a frog mount.

SpeakwithFrogsandToads.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
SpeakwithFrogsandToads.description: The royal can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

StandingLeap.name: Standing Leap
StandingLeap.description: The royal's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

SwampCamouflage.name: Swamp Camouflage
SwampCamouflage.description: The royal has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The royal makes two attacks: one with its royal spear and one with its bite.

RoyalSpear.name: RoyalSpear
RoyalSpear.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

CroakedDecree(1/Day).name: CroakedDecree(1/Day)
CroakedDecree(1/Day).description: The royal makes a loud pronouncement. Each bullywug within 60 feet of the royal that can hear the pronouncement has advantage on its next attack roll.

BottomTreader.name: Bottom Treader
BottomTreader.description: The drowned ascetic cannot swim, and it sinks to the bottom of any body of water. It takes no penalties to its movement or attacks underwater. It is immune to the effects of being underwater at a depth greater than 100 feet.

BoundTogether.name: Bound Together
BoundTogether.description: The drowned ascetic shares its mind with every other drowned one within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the drowned ascetic to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the drowned ascetic drops to 1 hit point instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The drowned ascetic makes three unarmed strikes.

UnarmedStrike.name: UnarmedStrike
UnarmedStrike.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or contract bluerot|GoS (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

BottomTreader.name: Bottom Treader
BottomTreader.description: The drowned assassin cannot swim, and it sinks to the bottom of any body of water. It takes no penalties to its movement or attacks underwater. It is immune to the effects of being underwater at a depth greater than 100 feet.

BoundTogether.name: Bound Together
BoundTogether.description: The drowned assassin shares its mind with every other drowned one within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the drowned assassin to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the drowned assassin drops to 1 hit point instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The drowned assassin makes two hand crossbow attacks or two dagger attacks. It can then take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

HandCrossbow.name: HandCrossbow
HandCrossbow.description: rw 5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or contract bluerot|GoS (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or contract bluerot|GoS (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

Reveal(1/Day).name: Reveal(1/Day)
Reveal(1/Day).description: The drowned assassin removes its mask, revealing its rotting face. Each creature of the assassin's choice within 30 feet of it that can see the assassin must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

BottomTreader.name: Bottom Treader
BottomTreader.description: The drowned blade cannot swim, and it sinks to the bottom of any body of water. It takes no penalties to its movement or attacks underwater. It is immune to the effects of being underwater at a depth greater than 100 feet.

BoundTogether.name: Bound Together
BoundTogether.description: The drowned blade shares its mind with every other drowned one within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the drowned blade to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the drowned blade drops to 1 hit point instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The drowned blade makes two rusted longsword attacks.

RustedLongsword.name: RustedLongsword
RustedLongsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or contract bluerot|GoS (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

BoundTogether.name: Bound Together
BoundTogether.description: The drowned master shares its mind with every other drowned one within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

ColdAura.name: Cold Aura
ColdAura.description: At the start of each of the drowned master's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) cold damage. A creature that touches the drowned master or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) cold damage.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the drowned master to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the drowned master drops to 1 hit point instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The drowned master makes two attacks: one with its greatsword and one with its Life-Draining Tentacle.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or contract bluerot|GoS (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

Life-DrainingTentacle.name: Life-DrainingTentacle
Life-DrainingTentacle.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have its hit point maximum reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. On a failed save, the target also contracts bluerot (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

NecroticInk{@recharge5}.name: NecroticInk{@recharge5}
NecroticInk{@recharge5}.description: The drowned master discharges foul ink in front of itself in a 30-foot cone. Each creature caught in the ink must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) necrotic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this saving throw is blinded until the end of its next turn and contracts bluerot (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn. On a failed save, the target begins to hallucinate and is afflicted with a short-term madness|DMG effect (determined randomly or by the DM; see "Madness" in chapter 8 of the Dungeon Master's Guide|dmg|8|madness). The effect lasts 10 minutes.

WaterBreathing.name: Water Breathing
WaterBreathing.description: The eel can breathe only underwater.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.

LuringMaestro.name: Luring Maestro
LuringMaestro.description: While within 60 feet of the matriarch, creatures have disadvantage on saving throws against the matriarch's Luring Song.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The matriarch has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The matriarch makes two claws attacks.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) slashing damage.

FleetingForm.name: FleetingForm
FleetingForm.description: The matriarch can magically disguise itself to resemble a humanoid of roughly similar size and shape for up to 1 hour. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. This illusion does not hold up to close scrutiny.

LuringSong.name: LuringSong
LuringSong.description: The matriarch sings a magical melody. Every humanoid and giant within 300 feet of the matriarch that can hear the song must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed until the song ends. The matriarch must take a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue singing. It can stop singing at any time. The song ends if the matriarch is incapacitated.

VisageofDesire(1/Day).name: VisageofDesire(1/Day)
VisageofDesire(1/Day).description: The matriarch projects a vision into the minds of creatures within 30 feet of it that aren't constructs or undead, showing each creature achieving whatever it most desires. An affected creature must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or drop whatever it is holding and become paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The kraken can breathe air and water.

FreedomofMovement.name: Freedom of Movement
FreedomofMovement.description: The kraken ignores difficult terrain||3, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be restrained. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being grappled.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The kraken makes two tentacle attacks, each of which it can replace with a use of Fling.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature grappled by the kraken, that creature is swallowed and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the kraken, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the kraken's turns. One Medium or two smaller creatures can be swallowed at the same time.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 20). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained. The kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

Fling.name: Fling
Fling.description: One Medium or smaller object held or creature grappled by the kraken is thrown up to 40 feet in a random direction and knocked prone. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked prone.

LightningStrike.name: LightningStrike
LightningStrike.description: The kraken magically create a bolt of lightning, which can strike a target the kraken can see within 90 feet of it. The target must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The koalinth can breathe air and water.

MartialAdvantage.name: Martial Advantage
MartialAdvantage.description: Once per turn, the koalinth can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the koalinth that isn't incapacitated.

Trident.name: Trident
Trident.description: mw,rw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The koalinth can breathe air and water.

MartialAdvantage.name: Martial Advantage
MartialAdvantage.description: Once per turn, the sergeant can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the sergeant that isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The sergeant makes two melee attacks with its trident.

Trident.name: Trident
Trident.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

HookedNet.name: HookedNet
HookedNet.description: rw 4 to hit, range 10/30 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage, and the target is restrained. A creature can use its action to make a DC 12 Strength check to free itself or another creature in a hooked net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 12) frees the target without harming it and destroys the net.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: Kysh can breathe air and water.

EmissaryoftheSea.name: Emissary of the Sea
EmissaryoftheSea.description: Kysh can communicate simple ideas with amphibious and water-breathing beasts. They understand the meaning of his words, but he cannot understand them in return.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Kysh makes two melee attacks with his spear.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft, one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The statue makes two attacks: one with its blade and one with its hammer.

Blade.name: Blade
Blade.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Hammer.name: Hammer
Hammer.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is knocked prone.

Whirl{@recharge5}.name: Whirl{@recharge5}
Whirl{@recharge5}.description: The statue can use its action to spin at the waist, targeting creatures of its choice within 10 feet of it. Each target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 19 (3d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

BloodFrenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
BloodFrenzy.description: The render has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The render can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The render makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its bite.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

RendtheField{@recharge5}.name: RendtheField{@recharge5}
RendtheField{@recharge5}.description: The render makes a claw attack against each creature of its choice within 10 feet of it. A creature hit by this attack must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The scaleshield can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The scaleshield makes two melee attacks, each one with a different weapon.

Morningstar.name: Morningstar
Morningstar.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

SpikedShield.name: SpikedShield
SpikedShield.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The subchief can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

ToothDagger.name: ToothDagger
ToothDagger.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

JawsofSemuanya{@recharge5}.name: JawsofSemuanya{@recharge5}
JawsofSemuanya{@recharge5}.description: The subchief invokes the primal magic of Semuanya, summoning a spectral maw around a target it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this saving throw is also frightened until the end of its next turn.

LeviathanWill.name: Leviathan Will
LeviathanWill.description: The locathah has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, stunned, or put to sleep.

LimitedAmphibiousness.name: Limited Amphibiousness
LimitedAmphibiousness.description: The locathah can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The locathah makes two melee attacks with its spear.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands.

LeviathanWill.name: Leviathan Will
LeviathanWill.description: The hunter has advantage on saving throws against spells and effects that control its actions.

LimitedAmphibiousness.name: Limited Amphibiousness
LimitedAmphibiousness.description: The hunter can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The hunter makes two attacks with its envenomed crossbow.

EnvenomedCrossbow.name: EnvenomedCrossbow
EnvenomedCrossbow.description: rw 4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

Club.name: Club
Club.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If the maw of Sekolah fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

WaterBreathing.name: Water Breathing
WaterBreathing.description: The maw of Sekolah can breathe only underwater.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The maw of Sekolah makes one attack with its bite and one attack with its tail smash.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage.

TailSmash.name: TailSmash
TailSmash.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The salvager can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The salvager makes two attacks with its coral rapier.

CoralRapier.name: CoralRapier
CoralRapier.description: m 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

InjectToxin(2/Day).name: InjectToxin(2/Day)
InjectToxin(2/Day).description: m 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage, and the creature must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The statue makes two attacks: one with its greataxe and one gore attack.

Greataxe.name: Greataxe
Greataxe.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) slashing damage.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

Flyby.name: Flyby
Flyby.description: The peryton doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

KeenSightandSmell.name: Keen Sight and Smell
KeenSightandSmell.description: The peryton has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the peryton fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The peryton makes two attacks: one with its gore and one with its talons.

Gore.name: Gore
Gore.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage.

Talons.name: Talons
Talons.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage.

WarpShadow.name: WarpShadow
WarpShadow.description: The peryton chooses up to three creatures within 60 feet of it that it can see. Each creature must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or become cursed. While cursed, whenever the creature makes an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, it must roll a d4 and subtract that number from the roll. A cursed creature can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a success. A creature that succeeds on this saving throw is immune to this peryton's Warp Shadow for 24 hours.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Mr. Dory has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

WaterDependency.name: Water Dependency
WaterDependency.description: Mr. Dory takes 6 (1d12) acid damage at the end of every hour he goes without exposure to water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Mr. Dory makes three attacks with his rapier.

Rapier.name: Rapier
Rapier.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage and 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

EyeofCorruption{@recharge5}.name: EyeofCorruption{@recharge5}
EyeofCorruption{@recharge5}.description: Mr. Dory glares at a creature he can see within 30 feet of him. The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 27 (5d10) necrotic damage and 27 (5d10) poison damage and then gains vulnerability to both necrotic and poison damage for 1 minute. On a successful save, it takes half damage and does not gain the vulnerabilities.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: Oceanus can breathe air and water.

FriendoftheSea.name: Friend of the Sea
FriendoftheSea.description: Using gestures and sounds, Oceanus can communicate simple ideas with any beast that has an innate swimming speed.

Trident.name: Trident
Trident.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

LightCrossbow.name: LightCrossbow
LightCrossbow.description: rw 3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

CargoHauler.name: Cargo Hauler
CargoHauler.description: The bosun has advantage on Strength checks.

SeaLegs.name: Sea Legs
SeaLegs.description: The bosun has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked prone.

LightHammer.name: LightHammer
LightHammer.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

Hook.name: Hook
Hook.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13).

SeaLegs.name: Sea Legs
SeaLegs.description: The deck wizard has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked prone.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

SeaLegs.name: Sea Legs
SeaLegs.description: The first mate has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked prone.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The first mate makes two attacks with its longsword.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands. If the target is a creature, the first mate can choose to deal no damage with the attack to disarm the target. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or drop one item it is holding on the ground.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

BloodFrenzy.description: The blademaster has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

LimitedAmphibiousness.description: The blademaster can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

SharkTelepathy.description: The blademaster can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

Multiattack.description: The blademaster makes three attacks with its wavecutter blade, or one attack with its bite and two with its claws.

WavecutterBlade.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

Claws.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

BloodFrenzy.description: The champion has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

LimitedAmphibiousness.name: Limited Amphibiousness
LimitedAmphibiousness.description: The champion can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

SharkTelepathy.description: The champion can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The champion makes three attacks with its spear, or one attack with its bite and two with its claws.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

BloodFrenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
BloodFrenzy.description: The coral smasher has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

LimitedAmphibiousness.name: Limited Amphibiousness
LimitedAmphibiousness.description: The coral smasher can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

SharkTelepathy.name: Shark Telepathy
SharkTelepathy.description: The coral smasher can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The coral smasher deals double damage to objects and structures.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The coral smasher makes two attacks with its warhammer, or one attack with its bite and one with its claws.

Warhammer.name: Warhammer
Warhammer.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage.

BloodFrenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
BloodFrenzy.description: The deep diver has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

BrineLurker.name: Brine Lurker
BrineLurker.description: The deep diver has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while submerged in water.

LimitedAmphibiousness.name: Limited Amphibiousness
LimitedAmphibiousness.description: The deep diver can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

Lure.name: Lure
Lure.description: The deep diver can cause its lure to light up or darken at will. While the lure is lit, the deep diver sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius centered on itself and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

SharkTelepathy.name: Shark Telepathy
SharkTelepathy.description: The deep diver can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The deep diver makes two attacks with its glaive, or one attack with its bite and two with its claws.

Glaive.name: Glaive
Glaive.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) slashing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.
