LightofSekolah.description: The deep diver pulses magical light from its lure. Any creature within 30 feet of the deep diver that can see the light must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed until the end of its next turn. A creature charmed in this way is incapacitated as it stares at the light.

BloodFrenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
BloodFrenzy.description: The swarm has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

Seething.name: Seething
Seething.description: Once it enters combat, the swarm deals 10 slashing damage to itself at the end of its turn if it did not make an attack on that turn. This damage ignores resistance, and it cannot reduce the swarm to 0 hit points.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and it can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny creature. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

WaterBreathing.name: Water Breathing
WaterBreathing.description: The swarm can breathe only underwater.

Bites.name: Bites
Bites.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. on hit: 14 (4d6) piercing damage, or 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

BloodFrenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
BloodFrenzy.description: The high priestess has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

LimitedAmphibiousness.name: Limited Amphibiousness
LimitedAmphibiousness.description: The high priestess can breathe air and water, but she needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

SharkTelepathy.name: Shark Telepathy
SharkTelepathy.description: The high priestess can magically command any shark within 120 feet of her, using a limited telepathy.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The high priestess makes two attacks with her toothsome staff, or one attack with her bite and one with her claws.

ToothsomeStaff.name: ToothsomeStaff
ToothsomeStaff.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

BloodFrenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
BloodFrenzy.description: The wave shaper has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

LimitedAmphibiousness.name: Limited Amphibiousness
LimitedAmphibiousness.description: The wave shaper can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

SharkTelepathy.name: Shark Telepathy
SharkTelepathy.description: The wave shaper can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The wave shaper makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d8 + 1) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) cold damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d8 + 1) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) cold damage.

Whirlpool(1/Day).name: Whirlpool(1/Day)
Whirlpool(1/Day).description: The wave shaper targets a body of water at least 50 feet square and 25 feet deep, causing a whirlpool to form in the center of the area. The whirlpool forms a vortex that is 5 feet wide at the base, up to 50 feet wide at the top, 25 feet tall, and lasts for 1 minute or until the wave shaper is incapacitated. Any creature or object in the water and within 25 feet of the vortex is pulled 10 feet toward it. A creature can swim away from the vortex by succeeding on a DC 14 Strength (Athletics) check.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

BloodFrenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
BloodFrenzy.description: The shark has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The shark has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

WaterBreathing.name: Water Breathing
WaterBreathing.description: The shark can breathe only underwater.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The shark makes two bite attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The skeletal alchemist has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The skeletal alchemist makes two Lob Acid attacks.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft. one target. on hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

LobAcid.name: LobAcid
LobAcid.description: rw 3 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) acid damage.

Disassemble.name: Disassemble
Disassemble.description: If the juggernaut is reduced to 0 hit points, twelve skeletons rise from its remains.

FallingApart.name: Falling Apart
FallingApart.description: If the juggernaut does not have all of its hit points at the start of its turn, it loses 10 hit points.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The juggernaut makes two claws attacks.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.

AvalancheofBones{@recharge5}.name: AvalancheofBones{@recharge5}
AvalancheofBones{@recharge5}.description: The juggernaut collapses into a large heap before quickly reforming. Each creature within 10 feet of the juggernaut must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this saving throw is also knocked prone.

DeafeningClatter.name: Deafening Clatter
DeafeningClatter.description: Creatures are deafened while in the swarm's space.

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Small humanoid. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

Slash.name: Slash
Slash.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. on hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

AbolethicVassal.name: Abolethic Vassal
AbolethicVassal.description: The skum is permanently charmed by its aboleth master.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The skum can breathe air and water.

PsychicConditioning.name: Psychic Conditioning
PsychicConditioning.description: The skum is immune to the frightened and charmed conditions unless they are from effects created by an aboleth.

WaterDependency.name: Water Dependency
WaterDependency.description: The skum takes 6 (1d12) acid damage every 10 minutes it goes without exposure to water.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The skum makes three attacks: two with its trident and one with its Mind-Breaking Touch.

Trident.name: Trident
Trident.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

Mind-BreakingTouch.name: Mind-BreakingTouch
Mind-BreakingTouch.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (4d8) psychic damage, and the target has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws until the end of the skum's next turn.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: Thousand Teeth can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

LegendaryResistance(2/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(2/Day).description: If Thousand Teeth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Thousand Teeth makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the statue fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The statue makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, that creature becomes cursed by the statue. The curse lasts for 10 minutes. While the creature is cursed, the statue has advantage on all attacks against it.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

ActionSurge(RechargesonaShortorLongRest).name: Action Surge (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
ActionSurge(RechargesonaShortorLongRest).description: On his turn, Othelstan can take one additional action.

Tiamat'sBlessingofRetribution.name: Tiamat's Blessing of Retribution
Tiamat'sBlessingofRetribution.description: When Othelstan takes damage that reduces him to 0 hit points, he immediately regains 20 hit points. If he has 20 hit points or fewer at the end of his next turn, he dies.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Othelstan attacks twice with his flail or spear, or makes two ranged attacks with his spears.

Flail.name: Flail
Flail.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

DragonFanatic.name: Dragon Fanatic
DragonFanatic.description: The dragonclaw has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened. While the dragonclaw can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, the dragonclaw ignores the effects of being charmed or frightened.

FanaticAdvantage.name: Fanatic Advantage
FanaticAdvantage.description: Once per turn, if the dragonclaw makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, it deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The dragonclaw has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonclaw's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragonclaw attacks twice with its scimitar.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

DragonFanatic.name: Dragon Fanatic
DragonFanatic.description: The dragonwing has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened. While the dragonwing can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, the dragonwing ignores the effects of being charmed or frightened.

FanaticAdvantage.name: Fanatic Advantage
FanaticAdvantage.description: Once per turn, if the dragonwing makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage.

LimitedFlight.name: Limited Flight
LimitedFlight.description: The dragonwing can use a bonus action to gain a flying speed of 30 feet until the end of its turn.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The dragonwing has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonwing's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragonwing attacks twice with its scimitar.

Scimitar.name: Scimitar
Scimitar.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) damage of the type to which the cultist has resistance.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Dralmorrer has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

WarMagic.name: War Magic
WarMagic.description: When Dralmorrer uses his action to cast a cantrip, he can also take a bonus action to make one weapon attack.

WeaponBond.name: Weapon Bond
WeaponBond.description: Provided his longsword is on the same plane Dralmorrer can take a bonus action to teleport it to his hand.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Dralmorrer attacks twice, either with his longsword or dagger.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Frulam attacks twice with her halberd.

Halberd.name: Halberd
Halberd.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage.

CunningAction.name: Cunning Action
CunningAction.description: Jamna can take a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

GnomeCunning.name: Gnome Cunning
GnomeCunning.description: Jamna has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma saving throws against magic.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Jamna attacks twice with her shortswords.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 9 (1d6 + 3) plus (1d6) piercing damage if the target is Medium or larger.

ActionSurge(RechargesonaShortorLongRest).name: Action Surge (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
ActionSurge(RechargesonaShortorLongRest).description: On his turn, Langdedrosa can take one additional action.

ImprovedCritical.name: Improved Critical
ImprovedCritical.description: Langdedrosa's weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Langdedrosa attacks twice, either with his greatsword or spear.

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

LightningBreath{@recharge5}.name: LightningBreath{@recharge5}
LightningBreath{@recharge5}.description: Langdedrosa breathes lightning in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: Pharblex can breathe air and water.

PoisonStrike(3/Day).name: Poison Strike
PoisonStrike(3/Day).description: Once per turn, when Pharblex hits with a melee attack, he can expend a use of this trait to deal an extra 9 (2d8) poison damage.

StandingLeap.name: Standing Leap
StandingLeap.description: As part of his movement and without a running start, Pharblex can long jump up to 20 feet and high jump up to 10 feet.

SwampCamouflage.name: Swamp Camouflage
SwampCamouflage.description: Pharblex has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Pharblex attacks twice. Once with his bite and once with his spear.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 5 to hit. reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Rath has a staff of fire, and scrolls of dimension door, feather fall, and fireball.

Quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
Quarterstaff.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Rezmir has the Black Dragon Mask|hotdq, Hazirawn|hotdq, and an insignia of claws|hotdq.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: Rezmir can breathe air and water.

DarkAdvantage.name: Dark Advantage
DarkAdvantage.description: Once per turn, Rezmir can deal an extra 10 (3d6) damage when she hits with a weapon attack, provided Rezmir has advantage on the attack roll.

DraconicMajesty.name: Draconic Majesty
DraconicMajesty.description: While wearing no armor and wearing the Black Dragon Mask, Rezmir adds her Charisma bonus to her AC (included).

Immolation.name: Immolation
Immolation.description: When Rezmir is reduced to 0 hit points, her body disintegrates into a pile of ash.

LegendaryResistance(1/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(1/Day).description: If Rezmir fails a saving throw while wearing the Black Dragon Mask, she can choose to succeed instead.

Greatsword(Hazirawn).name: Greatsword(Hazirawn)
Greatsword(Hazirawn).description: mw 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points for 1 minute. The target can make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending this effect early on a success.

CausticBolt.name: CausticBolt
CausticBolt.description: rs 8 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (4d8) acid damage.

AcidBreath{@recharge5}.name: AcidBreath{@recharge5}
AcidBreath{@recharge5}.description: Rezmir breathes acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Talis has +1 scale mail and a wand of winter|hotdq.

FeyAncestry.name: Fey Ancestry
FeyAncestry.description: Talis has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

WinterStrike(3/Day).name: Winter Strike
WinterStrike(3/Day).description: Once per turn, when Talis hits with a melee attack, she can expend a use of this trait to deal an extra 9 (2d8) cold damage.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The troll attacks five times, once with its bite and four times with its claws. If two or more claws hit the same target, the troll rends the target, dealing an extra 2d6 slashing damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

DivineBeing.name: Divine Being
DivineBeing.description: Auril can't be surprised and can't be changed into another form against her will.

DivineRejuvenation.name: Divine Rejuvenation
DivineRejuvenation.description: When Auril drops to 0 hit points, her body turns to slush and melts away. Auril instantly reappears in her Auril (second form)|IDRotF|second form, in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of where her first form disappeared. Her initiative count doesn't change.

LegendaryResistance(2/DayinThisForm).name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day in This Form)
LegendaryResistance(2/DayinThisForm).description: If Auril fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Auril has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: Auril doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Auril attacks twice with her talons.

Talons.name: Talons
Talons.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

TouchofFrost.name: TouchofFrost
TouchofFrost.description: ms 13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 13 (3d8) cold damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

ChromaticOrb.name: ChromaticOrb
ChromaticOrb.description: rs 13 to hit, range 90 ft., one creature. on hit: 13 (3d8) cold damage.

DivineBeing.name: Divine Being
DivineBeing.description: Auril can't be surprised and can't be changed into another form against her will.

DivineRejuvenation.name: Divine Rejuvenation
DivineRejuvenation.description: When Auril drops to 0 hit points, her body collapses into shards of ice, whereupon Auril instantly reappears in her Auril (third form)|IDRotF|third form, in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of where her second form was destroyed. Her initiative count doesn't change.

LegendaryResistance(2/DayinThisForm).name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day in This Form)
LegendaryResistance(2/DayinThisForm).description: If Auril fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Auril has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: Auril doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Auril attacks twice with her ice morningstar or hurls three ice darts.

IceMorningstar.name: IceMorningstar
IceMorningstar.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) cold damage.

IceDart.name: IceDart
IceDart.description: rw 7 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

ConeofCold(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.name: ConeofCold(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Cone of Cold (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

ConeofCold(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.description: Auril causes a magical blast of cold air to erupt from her hand. Each creature in a 60-foot cone must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

CreateIceMephit(3/Day).name: CreateIceMephit(3/Day)
CreateIceMephit(3/Day).description: Auril breaks off an icicle from her body and hurls it into an unoccupied space she can see within 20 feet of her, where it magically transforms into an ice mephit (see its entry in the Monster Manual). The mephit acts immediately after Auril in the initiative order and obeys her commands.

IceStasis{@recharge5}.name: IceStasis{@recharge5}
IceStasis{@recharge5}.description: Auril magically creates a gem-sized ice crystal that hovers in a space within 5 feet of her. Auril then targets a creature she can see within 60 feet of the crystal. The target must succeed on a DC 21 Charisma saving throw or become trapped in the crystal, which is immovable. If the saving throw succeeds, the crystal shatters and nothing else happens. A creature trapped in the crystal is stunned, has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the crystal, and takes 21 (6d6) cold damage at the start of each of its turns. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, freeing itself on a success. The creature is also freed if the crystal is destroyed, which is a Tiny object with AC 18, 9 hit points, and immunity to all damage except fire damage. The freed creature appears in an unoccupied space of its choice within 30 feet of the shattered crystal.

DivineBeing.name: Divine Being
DivineBeing.description: Auril can't be surprised and can't be changed into another form against her will.

DivineResurrection.name: Divine Resurrection
DivineResurrection.description: When Auril drops to 0 hit points, her crystalline form shatters and her divine spark vanishes. She is dead until the next winter solstice, when she reappears at full health in a cold, remote location of her choosing.

FrigidAura.name: Frigid Aura
FrigidAura.description: So long as Auril has at least 1 hit point in this form, each creature within 10 feet of her takes 10 cold damage at the start of each of her turns.

LegendaryResistance(1/DayinThisForm).name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day in This Form)
LegendaryResistance(1/DayinThisForm).description: If Auril fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Auril has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: Auril doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Auril uses Polar Ray twice.

PolarRay.name: PolarRay
PolarRay.description: rs 13 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (4d6) cold damage.

BlizzardVeil.name: BlizzardVeil
BlizzardVeil.description: Auril creates a magical blizzard in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on herself. The area within the sphere is heavily obscured, and the sphere moves with Auril. The effect lasts until Auril drops to 0 hit points in this form, until she chooses to end the effect (no action required), or until her concentration is broken (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell).

IcyDoom.name: Icy Doom
IcyDoom.description: When Avarice dies, her corpse freezes for 9 days, during which time it can't be thawed, harmed by fire, animated, or raised from the dead.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Avarice wields a staff of frost with 10 charges (see "Actions" below).

FireBolt(Cantrip).name: FireBolt(Cantrip)
FireBolt(Cantrip).description: rs 6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d10) fire damage.

StaffofFrost.name: StaffofFrost
StaffofFrost.description: While holding this staff, Avarice can expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it (spell save DC 14): cone of cold (5 charges), fog cloud (1 charge), ice storm (4 charges), or wall of ice (4 charges). The staff regains 1d6 + 4 charges daily at dawn. If its last charge is expended, roll a d20; on a 1, the staff turns to water and is destroyed.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: If the moose moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with an antlers attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Sure-Footed.name: Sure-Footed
Sure-Footed.description: The moose has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The moose makes two attacks: one with its antlers and one with its hooves.

Antlers.name: Antlers
Antlers.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

Hooves.name: Hooves
Hooves.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

Auril'sBlessing(3/Day).name: Auril's Blessing
Auril'sBlessing(3/Day).description: When Bjornhild hits a creature with a weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 11 (2d10) cold damage.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Bjornhild makes two melee attacks.

Greataxe.name: Greataxe
Greataxe.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage, plus 11 (2d10) cold damage if Bjornhild uses Auril's Blessing.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 11 (2d10) cold damage if Bjornhild uses Auril's Blessing.

ChardalynMadness.name: Chardalyn Madness
ChardalynMadness.description: The berserker must roll a d6 at the start of each of its turns. On a 1, the berserker does nothing on its turn except speak to a nonexistent, evil master whom it has pledged to serve.

Reckless.name: Reckless
Reckless.description: At the start of its turn, the berserker can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The berserker attacks three times with a melee weapon.

ChardalynFlail.name: ChardalynFlail
ChardalynFlail.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

ChardalynJavelin.name: ChardalynJavelin
ChardalynJavelin.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The dragon is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The dragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

SiegeMonster.name: Siege Monster
SiegeMonster.description: The dragon deals double damage to objects and structures.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The dragon doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep, and it gains no benefit from finishing a short or long rest.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The dragon uses its Malevolent Presence. It then makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its tail. If the dragon isn't flying, it can also make one attack with its wings.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

Wings.name: Wings
Wings.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d4 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

MalevolentPresence.name: MalevolentPresence
MalevolentPresence.description: Any creature with an Intelligence of 4 or more that is within 30 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by it for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Malevolent Presence for the next 24 hours. A creature charmed in this way fixates on another creature or object that the dragon mentally chooses and must, on each of its turns, move as close as it can to that target and use its action to make a melee attack against it. If the dragon doesn't choose a target, the charmed creature can act normally on its turn.

RadiantBreath{@recharge5}.name: RadiantBreath{@recharge5}
RadiantBreath{@recharge5}.description: The dragon exhales a ray of radiant energy in a 120-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 (7d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

BlindingLight.name: Blinding Light
BlindingLight.description: The walker sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. As a bonus action, the walker can target one creature in its bright light that it can see and force it to succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the start of the walker's next turn.

IcyDoom.name: Icy Doom
IcyDoom.description: Any creature killed by the walker freezes for 9 days, during which time it can't be thawed, harmed by fire, animated, or raised from the dead.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The walker doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The walker makes two attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) cold damage.

ColdRay.name: ColdRay

FieryEnd.name: Fiery End
FieryEnd.description: If the magen dies, its body disintegrates in a harmless burst of fire and smoke, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The magen doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

AcidSplash(Cantrip).name: AcidSplash(Cantrip)
AcidSplash(Cantrip).description: The simulacrum hurls a bubble of acid at one creature it can see within 60 feet of it, or at two such creatures that are within 5 feet of each other. A target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 7 (2d6) acid damage.

MagicMissile(1st-LevelSpell;RequiresaSpe.description: The simulacrum creates three darts of magical force. Each dart unerringly strikes one creature the simulacrum can see within 120 feet of it, dealing 3 (1d4 + 1) force damage. If the simulacrum casts this spell using a 2nd-level spell slot, it creates one more dart.

KeenHearing.name: Keen Hearing
KeenHearing.description: The fox has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the beast form (the druid's choice). It reverts to its humanoid form when it dies. The druid's statistics are the same in each form, except where noted in this stat block.

FieryEnd.name: Fiery End

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance

KeenSmell.description: The vampire has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Rampage.name: Rampage
Rampage.description: When it reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the vampire can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The vampire regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: If the vampire isn't in sunlight, it can use its action to polymorph into a Large hyena or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into its true form.

UnusualNature.description: The vampire doesn't require air.

The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. the target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

FrightfulCackle(HyenaorVampireFormOnly).description: The vampire emits a bone-chilling cackle. Each creature of the vampire's choice that is within 120 feet of the vampire and can hear its cackle must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the vampire's Frightful Cackle for the next 24 hours.

If the target can see the vampire, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw against this magic or be poisoned for 24 hours. A creature whose saving throw is successful is immune to this vampire's Sickening Gaze for 24 hours.

MagicResistance.description: The ceremorph has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

ExtractBrain.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated humanoid grappled by the ceremorph. on hit: 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the ceremorph kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

LaserPistol.description: rw 5 to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (3d6 + 2) radiant damage.

MindBlast{@recharge5}.description: The ceremorph magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 (4d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The squidling has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

ExtractBrain.description: mw 0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated creature grappled by the squidling. on hit: 27 (5d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the squidling kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

MindTickle{@recharge5}.description: The squidling magically emits psychic energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 7 Intelligence saving throw or take 2 (1d4) psychic damage and be stunned until the end of its next turn.

MountainBorn.name: Mountain Born
MountainBorn.description: The goliath is acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 20,000 feet.

PowerfulBuild.name: Powerful Build
PowerfulBuild.description: The goliath counts as one size larger when determining its carrying capacity and the weight it can push, drag, or lift.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The goliath makes two attacks with its greataxe or hurls two javelins.

Greataxe.name: Greataxe
Greataxe.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage.

KeenSmell.description: The werebear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

PowerfulBuild(HumanoidFormOnly).description: The werebear counts as one size larger when determining its carrying capacity and the weight it can push, drag, or lift.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: The werebear can use its action to polymorph into a Large bear-humanoid hybrid or into a Large polar bear, or back into its goliath form. Its statistics, other than its size and AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

Claw(BearorHybridFormOnly).name: Claw(BearorHybridFormOnly)
Claw(BearorHybridFormOnly).description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

Greataxe(HumanoidorHybridFormOnly).description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (1d12 + 5) slashing damage.

DuergarResilience.name: Duergar Resilience
DuergarResilience.description: Grandolpha has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, Grandolpha has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

PoisonSpray(Cantrip).name: PoisonSpray(Cantrip)
PoisonSpray(Cantrip).description: Grandolpha extends her hand toward a creature she can see within 10 feet of her and projects a puff of noxious gas from her palm. The creature must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 13 (2d12) poison damage.

Indomitable(3/Day).name: Indomitable
Indomitable(3/Day).description: Gunvald can reroll a saving throw he fails. He must use the new roll.

MenacingBlows(1/Turn).name: Menacing Blows (1/Turn)
MenacingBlows(1/Turn).description: Gunvald deals an extra 6 (1d12) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the start of Gunvald's next turn.

SecondWind(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
SecondWind(RechargesafteraShortorLongRes.description: As a bonus action, Gunvald can regain 15 hit points.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Gunvald makes three melee attacks.

Battleaxe.name: Battleaxe
Battleaxe.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage, or 10 (1d10 + 5) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 6 (1d12) slashing damage if Gunvald uses Menacing Blows.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 8 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage, plus 6 (1d12) piercing damage if Gunvald uses Menacing Blows.

Escape.name: Escape
Escape.description: The hare can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

FieryEnd.name: Fiery End
FieryEnd.description: If the magen dies, its body disintegrates in a harmless burst of fire and smoke, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The magen has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The magen doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

PsychicLash.name: PsychicLash
PsychicLash.description: The magen's eyes glow silver as it targets one creature that it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or take 11 (2d10) psychic damage.

Suggestion.name: Suggestion
Suggestion.description: The magen casts the suggestion spell (save DC 12), requiring no material components. The target must be a creature that the magen can communicate with telepathically. If it succeeds on its saving throw, the target is immune to this magen's suggestion spell for the next 24 hours. The magen's spellcasting ability is Intelligence.

ColdAura.name: Cold Aura
ColdAura.description: While it's alive, the troll generates an aura of bitter cold that fills the area within 10 feet of it. At the start of the troll's turn, all nonmagical flames in the aura are extinguished. Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the troll takes 10 (3d6) cold damage.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The ice troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The ice troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The ice troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) cold damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) cold damage. If the target takes any of the cold damage, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage on its attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 0 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 1 (1d6 - 2) piercing damage.

UndeadFortitude.name: Undead Fortitude
UndeadFortitude.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The zombie doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) piercing damage.

BloodFrenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
BloodFrenzy.description: Isarr has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

Indomitable(3/Day).name: Indomitable
Indomitable(3/Day).description: Isarr can reroll a saving throw he fails. He must use the new roll.

KeenHearingandSmell.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
KeenHearingandSmell.description: Isarr has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Isarr makes three melee attacks.

Sickle.name: Sickle
Sickle.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, plus 13 (2d12) piercing damage if the target has no allies it can see within 10 feet of it.

HeavyCrossbow.name: HeavyCrossbow
HeavyCrossbow.description: rw 6 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. on hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.
