Brute.description: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Jarund hits with it (included in the attack).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Jarund makes three melee attacks.

Warhammer.name: Warhammer
Warhammer.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and Jarund pushes the target 5 feet away from him if it's Large or smaller. Jarund then enters the space vacated by the target. If the target is pushed to within 5 feet of a creature friendly to Jarund, that creature can make an attack against the target as a reaction.

Javelin.name: Javelin
Javelin.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: Kingsport can hold its breath for 20 minutes.

Beak.name: Beak
Beak.description: mw 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

WaterBreathing.name: Water Breathing
WaterBreathing.description: The trout can breathe only underwater.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

PackTactics.name: Pack Tactics
PackTactics.description: The vampire has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vampire's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The vampire regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The vampire doesn't require air.

VampireWeaknesses.name: Vampire Weaknesses
VampireWeaknesses.description: The vampire has the following flaws:

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The living spell doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

ForceFist.name: ForceFist
ForceFist.description: ms 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 26 (4d8 + 8) force damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the living spell can move it up to 5 feet and move with it, without provoking opportunity attacks.

GraspingHand.name: GraspingHand
GraspingHand.description: The living spell attempts to grab a Huge or smaller creature within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or be grappled (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 15 (2d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns. The living spell can grapple only one creature at a time and can't use Force Fist until the grapple ends.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Unfettered.name: Unfettered
Unfettered.description: The living spell can move through any barrier, even a wall of magical force.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The living spell doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

ForceBlade.name: ForceBlade
ForceBlade.description: ms 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 26 (4d12) force damage, unless the living spell rolled an 18 or higher on the d20 for the attack, in which case the attack is a critical hit that deals 78 (12d12) force damage instead.

DimensionalForm.name: Dimensional Form
DimensionalForm.description: The living spell can enter another creature's space and vice versa, and it can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. The living spell can't detach from a solid surface, such as a wall, ceiling, or floor. If it has no surface to attach to, the living spell is destroyed (see "Planar Destruction" below).

ExtradimensionalChamber.name: Extradimensional Chamber
ExtradimensionalChamber.description: When the living spell enters another creature's space (or vice versa) for the first time on a turn, the other creature must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or be pulled into the living spell's extradimensional space, an unfurnished stone chamber 30 feet in every dimension. A creature too big to fit in this space succeeds on the saving throw automatically. Creatures in the chamber never run out of breathable air. Magic that enables transit between planes, such as plane shift, can be used to escape the chamber, which has no exits otherwise. Creatures trapped inside the extradimensional chamber can't see, target, or deal damage to the living spell; however, they can damage the room around them. Each 5-foot-square section of ceiling, wall, and floor in the chamber has AC 17, 50 hit points, immunity to poison and psychic damage, and immunity to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage that is nonmagical. If any section is reduced to 0 hit points, the living spell and its chamber are destroyed (see "Planar Destruction" below).

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

PlanarDestruction.name: Planar Destruction
PlanarDestruction.description: The living spell is destroyed when it or a 5-foot-square section of its extradimensional chamber is reduced to 0 hit points, or when the living spell has no surface to attach to. When the living spell is destroyed, the contents of its extradimensional chamber are expelled, appearing as close to the living spell's previous location as possible. Each expelled creature appears in a randomly determined unoccupied space, along with whatever it is wearing or carrying.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The living spell doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: If the goat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Sure-Footed.name: Sure-Footed
Sure-Footed.description: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

Ram.name: Ram
Ram.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

EtherealSight.name: Ethereal Sight
EtherealSight.description: The ghost can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

IncorporealMovement.name: Incorporeal Movement
IncorporealMovement.description: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain||3. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

WitheringTouch.name: WitheringTouch
WitheringTouch.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) necrotic damage.

Etherealness.name: Etherealness
Etherealness.description: The ghost enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

HorrifyingVisage.name: HorrifyingVisage
HorrifyingVisage.description: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of the ghost that can see it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. If the save fails by 5 or more, the target also ages 1d4  10 years. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the frightened condition on itself on a success. If the target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this ghost's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours. The aging effect can be reversed by a greater restoration spell, but only if it is cast within 24 hours.

Possession{@recharge}.name: Possession{@recharge}
Possession{@recharge}.description: One humanoid that the ghost can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 14 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the ghost; the ghost then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. The ghost now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The ghost can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn undead, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies. The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the ghost ends it as a bonus action, or the ghost is turned or forced out by an effect like the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the ghost reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body. The target is immune to this ghost's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

ShockingGrasp(Cantrip).name: ShockingGrasp(Cantrip)
ShockingGrasp(Cantrip).description: ms 5 to hit (with advantage on the attack if the target is wearing armor made of metal), reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 9 (2d8) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The seal can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The seal has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 1 piercing damage.

ColdRegeneration.name: Cold Regeneration
ColdRegeneration.description: If the temperature around him is 0 degrees Fahrenheit or lower, Sephek regains 5 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of Sephek's next turn. Sephek dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Sephek attacks twice with a weapon.

IceLongsword.name: IceLongsword
IceLongsword.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if Sephek uses the weapon with two hands, plus 5 (2d4) cold damage.

IceDagger.name: IceDagger
IceDagger.description: rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) cold damage.

ColdAbsorption.name: Cold Absorption
ColdAbsorption.description: Whenever the golem is subjected to cold damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the cold damage dealt.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

Melt.name: Melt
Melt.description: While in an area of extreme heat, the golem loses 1d6 hit points at the start of each of its turns.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The golem doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The golem makes three melee attacks.

Slam.name: Slam
Slam.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.

Snowball.name: Snowball
Snowball.description: rw 0 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) cold damage.

GnomeCunning.name: Gnome Cunning
GnomeCunning.description: Spellix has advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

ShockingGrasp(Cantrip).name: ShockingGrasp(Cantrip)
ShockingGrasp(Cantrip).description: ms 5 to hit (with advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal), reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 4 (1d8) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

FireBolt(Cantrip).name: FireBolt(Cantrip)
FireBolt(Cantrip).description: rs 5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d10) fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.

Echolocation.name: Echolocation
Echolocation.description: The whale can't use its blindsight while deafened.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The whale can hold its breath for 90 minutes.

KeenHearing.name: Keen Hearing
KeenHearing.description: The whale has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The whale makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the whale. A swallowed creature has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the whale, and it takes 3 (1d6) acid damage at the start of each of the whale's turns. If the whale takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the whale must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the whale. If the whale dies, a swallowed creature can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: mw 11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 18 (3d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage, or 37 (6d6 + 16) bludgeoning damage if the target is an object.

Shapechanger.name: Shapechanger
Shapechanger.description: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

Adhesive(ObjectFormOnly).name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
Adhesive(ObjectFormOnly).description: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic is also grappled by it (escape DC 16). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

FalseAppearance(ObjectFormOnly).name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
FalseAppearance(ObjectFormOnly).description: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

Grappler.name: Grappler
Grappler.description: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: The mimic has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The mimic attacks three times: twice with its pseudopods and once with its bite.

Pseudopods.name: Pseudopods
Pseudopods.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage.

SpitAcid{@recharge5}.name: SpitAcid{@recharge5}
SpitAcid{@recharge5}.description: The mimic spits acid at one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 32 (9d6 + 1) acid damage on failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

PetrifiedDeath.name: Petrified Death
PetrifiedDeath.description: A tomb tapper reduced to 0 hit points turns into a lifeless stone statue. Anything it's wearing or carrying is not transformed.

SenseMagic.name: Sense Magic
SenseMagic.description: The tomb tapper senses magic within 30 feet of it and can use an action to pinpoint the location of any creature, object, or area in that range that bears magic. This sense penetrates barriers but is blocked by a thin sheet of lead.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The tomb tapper can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-wide, 20-foot-tall tunnel in its wake.

UnusualNature.name: Unusual Nature
UnusualNature.description: The tomb tapper doesn't require air or sleep.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The tomb tapper makes two melee attacks with its sledgehammer or with its claws. If it hits the same creature with both claws, it can pull that creature within 5 feet of its mouth and make a bite attack against it.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) slashing damage.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) slashing damage.

Sledgehammer.name: Sledgehammer
Sledgehammer.description: mw,rw 10 to hit, reach 15 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 27 (6d6 + 6) bludgeoning or force damage (tomb tapper's choice). If thrown, the hammer returns to the tomb tapper at the end of its turn, landing at the tomb tapper's feet if it doesn't have a hand free to catch the weapon.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Vellynne wears bracers of defense and carries a wand of magic missiles (see "Actions" below).

VampiricTouch(3rd-LevelSpell;RequiresaSp.name: VampiricTouch(3rd-LevelSpell;RequiresaSpellSlot)

value.value: Vampiric Touch (3rd-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)

VampiricTouch(3rd-LevelSpell;RequiresaSp.description: ms 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. on hit: 10 (3d6) necrotic damage, and Vellynne regains hit points equal to half the necrotic damage dealt. If Vellynne casts this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the necrotic damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 3rd.

ChillTouch(Cantrip).name: ChillTouch(Cantrip)
ChillTouch(Cantrip).description: rs 6 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 9 (2d8) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of Vellynne's next turn.

WandofMagicMissiles.name: WandofMagicMissiles
WandofMagicMissiles.description: While holding this wand, Vellynne can expend 1 or more of its 7 charges to cast the magic missile spell from it. She can expend 1 charge to cast the 1st-level version of the spell. She can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge she expends. The wand regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. If the wand's last charge is expended, roll a d20; on a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

SimpleWeaponWielder.name: Simple Weapon Wielder
SimpleWeaponWielder.description: A simple weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the verbeeg hits with it (included in the attack).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The verbeeg makes two melee attacks.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 17 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage if used to make a ranged attack or used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Sling.name: Sling
Sling.description: rw 5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (3d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

SimpleWeaponWielder.name: Simple Weapon Wielder
SimpleWeaponWielder.description: A simple weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the verbeeg hits with it (included in the attack).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The verbeeg makes two melee attacks.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 17 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage if used to make a ranged attack or used with two hands to make a melee attack.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The walrus can hold its breath for 10 minutes.

Tusks.name: Tusks
Tusks.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

DuergarResilience.name: Duergar Resilience
DuergarResilience.description: Xardorok has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

SunlightSensitivity.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
SunlightSensitivity.description: While in sunlight, Xardorok has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Xardorok attacks twice with a weapon or casts eldritch blast twice.

SpikedGauntlet.name: SpikedGauntlet
SpikedGauntlet.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, or 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage while Xardorok is enlarged.

EldritchBlast(Cantrip).name: EldritchBlast(Cantrip)
EldritchBlast(Cantrip).description: rs 7 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. on hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) force damage.

Enlarge(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).name: Enlarge(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest)

value.value: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

Enlarge(RechargesafteraShortorLongRest).description: For 1 minute, Xardorok magically increases in size, along with anything he is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, Xardorok is Large, doubles his damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in his attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If Xardorok lacks the room to become Large, he attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

Invisibility{@recharge4}.name: Invisibility{@recharge4}
Invisibility{@recharge4}.description: Xardorok magically turns invisible until he attacks, he casts a spell, he uses his Enlarge, or his concentration is broken (as if concentration||concentrating on a spell). Any equipment Xardorok wears or carries is invisible with him.

KeenSmell.name: Keen Smell
KeenSmell.description: The yeti tyke has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

SnowCamouflage.name: Snow Camouflage
SnowCamouflage.description: The yeti tyke has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage, plus 2 (1d4) cold damage. Claw does both slashing and cold damage.

RustMonsterCloak.name: Rust Monster Cloak
RustMonsterCloak.description: Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits Barbatos corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits Barbatos is destroyed after dealing damage.

HeartoftheTroll.name: Heart of the Troll
HeartoftheTroll.description: Barbatos regains 10 hit points at the start of his turn. If Barbatos takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of Barbatos's next turn. Barbatos dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Barbatos makes two bone shortsword attacks.

BoneShortsword.name: BoneShortsword
BoneShortsword.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

LightCrossbow.name: LightCrossbow
LightCrossbow.description: rw 6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also unconscious. The target regains consciousness if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it.

CloakSweep.name: CloakSweep
CloakSweep.description: Barbatos corrodes a nonmagical ferrous metal object he can see within 5 feet of himself. If the object isn't being worn or carried, the touch destroys a 1-foot cube of it. If the object is being worn or carried by a creature, the creature can make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw to avoid Barbatos's touch.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Lynx's crystal eye is a magically shrunken crystal ball of true seeing. One of her teeth is a refashioned ring of mind shielding, while another has been magicked to place her under a permanent Nystul's magic aura spell, concealing the magic of these items and hiding her true nature from magic or features that can detect undead.

AversionofFire.name: Aversion of Fire
AversionofFire.description: If Lynx takes fire damage, she has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of her next turn.

ImmutableForm.name: Immutable Form
ImmutableForm.description: Lynx is immune to any spell or effect that would alter her form.

LightningAbsorption.name: Lightning Absorption
LightningAbsorption.description: Whenever Lynx is subjected to lightning damage, she takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

MagicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
MagicResistance.description: Lynx has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: Lynx regains 10 hit points at the start of her turn. If she takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of her next turn. Lynx's body is destroyed only if she starts her turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

TurnImmunity.name: Turn Immunity
TurnImmunity.description: Lynx is immune to effects that turn undead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Lynx makes two shortsword attacks.

Shortsword.name: Shortsword
Shortsword.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Moghadam wields Ruinblade|IMR (see appendix C).

ArtificialMind.name: Artificial Mind
ArtificialMind.description: Moghadam can manifest an artificial mind as a floating spectral image of a demilich's jeweled skull. Moghadam can communicate telepathically with this mind, send it up to 300 feet away from him, and see and hear through it.

Infoportation(1/Day).name: Infoportation
Infoportation(1/Day).description: Moghadam can teleport himself into an unoccupied space next to his artificial mind.

Ruinblade.name: Ruinblade
Ruinblade.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.

Blight(1/Day).name: Blight(1/Day)
Blight(1/Day).description: While wielding Ruinblade|IMR, Moghadam can cast the blight spell (DC 15).

Disintegrate(1/7Days).name: Disintegrate(1/7Days)
Disintegrate(1/7Days).description: While wielding Ruinblade|IMR, Moghadam can cast the disintegrate spell against any nonmagical object or creation of magical force.

InformationOverload{@recharge5}.name: InformationOverload{@recharge5}
InformationOverload{@recharge5}.description: Moghadam overloads the thoughts of one creature within 5 feet of either himself or his artificial mind. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 (4d8 + 4) psychic damage, and the next attack roll made against the target before the end of Moghadam's next turn has advantage.

LimitedTelepathy.name: Limited Telepathy
LimitedTelepathy.description: The otyugh can magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within 120 feet of it that can understand a language. This form of telepathy doesn't allow the receiving creature to telepathically respond.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The neo-otyugh makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its tentacles.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw against disease or become poisoned until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the target must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5 (1d10) on a failure. The disease is cured on a success. The target dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the disease is cured.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 8 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 16) and restrained until the grapple ends. The neo-otyugh has two tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

TentacleSlam.name: TentacleSlam
TentacleSlam.description: The neo-otyugh slams creatures grappled by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or take 15 (3d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage and be stunned until the end of the neo-otyugh's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't stunned.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Sir Ursas wears a ring of mind shielding and plate armor of fire resistance.

Brave.name: Brave
Brave.description: Sir Ursas has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

Brute.name: Brute
Brute.description: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Sir Ursas hits with it (included in his attack).

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: Sir Ursas makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: mw,rw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft. and range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

ShieldBash.name: ShieldBash
ShieldBash.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

SpecialEquipment.name: Special Equipment
SpecialEquipment.description: Thessalar wields a +1 dagger coated with Thessaltoxin|IMR|thessaltoxin poison (see appendix C).

AlchemicalHomunculus.name: Alchemical Homunculus
AlchemicalHomunculus.description: Thessalar is accompanied by his Thessalar's homunculus|IMR. If the mending spell is cast on it, the homunculus regains 2d6 hit points.

HealingToxicity.name: Healing Toxicity
HealingToxicity.description: Any magic item that restores hit points and can be applied to a piercing or slashing weapon (a potion, an ointment, and so forth) causes a hit with that weapon to deal extra damage to Thessalar equal to the amount the item would normally heal.

GreaterRestoration(1/Day).name: Greater Restoration
GreaterRestoration(1/Day).description: Thessalar can cast greater restoration if he has access to Alchemist's Supplies|phb|alchemical supplies.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: mw,rw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. on hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is affected as if by the polymorph spell, transforming into a random beast|bestiary|type=beast|miscellaneous=!swarm or a creature it has seen within the last 24 hours (as chosen by the DM). This effect lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

TelepathicBond.name: Telepathic Bond
TelepathicBond.description: While the construct is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 1 slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is instead poisoned for 5 (1d10) minutes and unconscious while poisoned in this way.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The thessalkraken can breathe air and water.

FreedomofMovement.name: Freedom of Movement
FreedomofMovement.description: The thessalkraken ignores difficult terrain||3, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be restrained. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being grappled.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The thessalkraken makes one bite attack and two tentacle attacks. It can replace each tentacle attack with one use of Fling.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) acid damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature grappled by the thessalkraken, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the thessalkraken, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the thessalkraken's turns.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: mw 12 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. on hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) slashing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. The thessalkraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

Fling.name: Fling
Fling.description: One Medium or smaller object held or creature grappled by the thessalkraken is thrown up to 40 feet in a random direction and knocked prone. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked prone.

AcidSaliva{@recharge5}.name: AcidSaliva{@recharge5}
AcidSaliva{@recharge5}.description: The thessalkraken spits a glob of acid at a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

HoldBreath.name: Hold Breath
HoldBreath.description: The two-headed crocodile can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

TwoHeads.name: Two Heads
TwoHeads.description: The two-headed crocodile has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

Wakeful.name: Wakeful
Wakeful.description: When one of the crocodile's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The two-headed crocodile makes two attacks with its bite.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and that head of the crocodile can't bite another target.

TwoHeads.name: Two Heads
TwoHeads.description: The two-headed owlbear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

Wakeful.name: Wakeful
Wakeful.description: When one of the owlbear's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The two-headed owlbear makes three attacks: two with its beaks and one with its claws.

Beak.name: Beak
Beak.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: mw 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The aurumvorax can burrow through solid rock and metal at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The aurumvorax makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature wearing armor of any type, the aurumvorax regains 4 (1d6 + 1) hit points.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the aurumvorax can't use its Claw attack on another target, and when it moves, it can drag the grappled creature with it, without the aurumvorax's speed being halved.

PackLeader.name: Pack Leader
PackLeader.description: The aurumvorax's allies have advantage on attack rolls while within 10 feet of the aurumvorax, provided it isn't incapacitated.

Tunneler.name: Tunneler
Tunneler.description: The aurumvorax can burrow through solid rock and metal at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The aurumvorax makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a creature wearing armor of any type, the aurumvorax gains one of the following benefits of its choice:

Frenzy.name: Frenzy
Frenzy.description: The aurumvorax has advantage on attack rolls until start of its next turn.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: mw 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. on hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the aurumvorax can't use its Claw attack on another target, and when it moves, it can drag the grappled creature with it, without the aurumvorax's speed being halved.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The bakunawa can breathe air and water.

LegendaryResistance(3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance
LegendaryResistance(3/Day).description: If the bakunawa fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The bakunawa makes one Bite attack and one Storm Slam attack.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) lightning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be swallowed by the bakunawa. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, and it has Cover||3||total cover against attacks and other effects outside the bakunawa. At the start of each of the bakunawa's turns, each swallowed creature takes 10 (3d6) lightning damage.

StormSlam.name: StormSlam
StormSlam.description: mw 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. on hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (1d10) thunder damage, and the target is pushed up to 10 feet in a horizontal direction away from the bakunawa.
